A senhora Gertudes de 48 anos , é  comerciante, casada mae de  07 filhos, dos quais 01 a trabalhar e 6 a estudar sustenta 4 netos que vivem com ela na casa propria .
Diz que com este credito ira comprar  mantas , duvets, bolsas para cadeiras plasticas  reforçando o seu negocio que e deito na sua casa. 
Crescer no negocio,  ter um estabelecimento condigno na sua casa para melhoresa servicos aos seus clientes e com os emprestimos anteriores conseguiu manter seus filhos na escola e legalizou um espaco..
Principais desafios insufienciencia de fundos , doencas , e elevado custo de vida para ultrapassa los  ira levantar mais creditos como forma de alcancar seus objectivos.
texts.en:
Gertudes is 48 years old. She is a businesswoman, married with 7 children, 1 of them is working and 6 are going to school and she also supports 4 children who live with her in a house that she owns.
She will use this loan to buy blankets, comforters, and covers for plastic chairs to restock the business she runs out of her home. 
She wants to grow her business and own an improved establishment, as well as provide better services to her customers. She used her previous loans to keep her children in school and secure a spot for them.
She doesn't have enough funds and she has health problems, and her cost of living is high, but she will overcome by asking for more loans that will help her reach her dreams.

loans.use: to buy blankets, comforters, and covers for plastic chairs

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is a 40 years old, married and has two children to provide for. To earn a living she has engaged in an internet cafe business for seven years already.

This business helps them a lot for their daily needs. She aims to increase her income because of the increasing needs of her family, so she decided to borrow a loan to pay labor costs for repairing the computer so that she can continue to operate her internet cafe and can earn better income.

Cristina's plan for the future is to save money to sustain the educational needs of her children.

loans.use: to pay labor costs for repairing the computer.

loans.name: Zebiniso

texts.ru: Зебинисо образованная женщина. Она из района Шахристон. Зебинисо замужем и мать троих детей. Детям 21,17 и 13 лет. Старшая дочка студентка. Младший сын в этом году стал студентом.  Сама Зебинисо работает преподавателем алгебры и геометрии в лицее. Она уже 20 лет занята своей любимой работой. Ее муж тоже работает учителем в лицее. Зебинисо обратилась за кредитом, по причине, что ей надо оплачивать за учебы сына. С такими планами она просит кредит. Вы можете поддержать Зебинисо!
texts.en:
Zebiniso is an educated woman. She is from the Shahriston region. Zebiniso is married and is the mother of three children. They are 21, 17 and 13 years old. The eldest daughter is a student. The youngest son became a student this year.

Zebiniso works as an algebra and geometry teacher at the Lyceum (secondary school). She has worked with this, her favourite work, for 20 years already. Her husband is also a teacher at the Lyceum.

Zebiniso applied for a loan because she needs to pay her son's tuition. With this in mind she requests a loan. You can help Zebiniso!

loans.use: To pay her son's tuition

loans.name: Fabiola Ramona

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Buenas Amigas se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Fabiola, tiene 28 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 12, 9 y 5 años, los dos mayores estudian en escuela y el menor en inicial. El marido es chofer.
Doña Fabiola es una mujer que le gusta valerse por sí misma y con sus ganancias solventar parte de los gastos que genera el hogar y los estudios de sus pequeños, ella para obtener sus ingresos se dedica a la venta de zapatos, bisuterías, ropa y ropa interior, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta ella sale a recorrer tres  cuatro días a la semana ofreciendo sus productos los mismos que  deja a crédito y cobra  cada 8 días, ella viaja a Colombia a comprar su mercadería razón por lo cual vende muy rápido porque esta es de buena calidad y con diseños exclusivos,  tiene más de 5 años dedicada a esta actividad la cual comenzó con los créditos razón por lo cual está muy agradecida con la institución.
Este crédito es para comprar zapatos, pantalones, camisas, blusas, ropa interior, bisutería entre otros. Es fundadora del Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos sale adelante. Sus sueños son que nunca les falte nada a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Buenas Amigas [Good Friends] Credit Group meets every 15 days in the Montecristi Canton, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its artisanry, which is recognized on a national and international level. It is home of the famous Panama hat.

This is where Fabiola lives. She is 28 years old and married with three children who are 12, 9, and 5 years old. The older two attend school, and the younger is in preschool. Her husband is a driver.

Fabiola is a woman who likes to be self-sufficient, with her earnings making up for part of the general household expenses and her children's education. In order to obtain her income she works selling shoes, costume jewelry, clothing, and underwear door-to-door. She goes out to make her rounds three or four days a week, offering her products by credit that is repaid every 8 days.

She travels to Colombia to buy her merchandise since it is very high quality with exclusive designs and so it sells quickly. For over 5 years she has worked this job, which was started on loans, for which she is grateful to the institution.

Fabiola will use this loan to buy shoes, pants, shirts, blouses, underwear, costume jewelry, and other items. She is a founder of the Credit Group, and she likes it because the loans get her ahead. Her dream is that her children never lack anything.

loans.use: to buy shoes, pants, shirts, blouses, underwear, costume jewelry, etc.

loans.name: Niño Jesús De Las Orquídeas  (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Las Orquídeas  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito Niño Jesús De Las Orquídeas el cual está formado por 10 mujeres y 2 hombres todos ellos muy trabajadores y que con la ayuda de los créditos están sacando adelante sus negocios y han mejorando la calidad de vida de sus familias, ellos se dedican a varias actividades en su mayoría al comercio. 
Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Inés, tiene 51 años de edad, está casada y de relación tiene seis hijos, cinco mayores de edad y uno de 16 años el  cual  estudia en colegio. El marido trabaja en una empresa del estado. 
Doña Inés es una mujer muy luchadora que  le gusta ganar sus propios recursos a base de esfuerzo, ella tiene en su casa un negocio de venta de bebidas, allí ella vende aguas, sodas, cervezas, energizantes  y otras bebidas, así como también ciertos bocaditos y cosas de picar, también en los ratos libres ella sale a vender sabanas  ya tiene sus clientes a quienes les entrega su mercadería la misma que vende a crédito y cobra cada 15 días, por lo general esto lo realiza en las mañanas ya que en las tardes y noche se dedica al negocio en su casa, lleva 5 años dedicada a esta actividad la cual le da lo necesario para salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar aguas, sodas, cervezas, sabanas y todo lo que ella vende. Lleva tres ciclos  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son muy buenos para ella razón por lo cual está muy agradecida. Sus sueños son mejorar su negocio día a día.
texts.en:
The Niño Jesús De Las Orquídeas (Infant Jesus of the Orchids) communal bank meets every two weeks in the residential community of Las Orquídeas (The Orchids) in the city of Portoviejo. It is made up of 10 women and 2 men, all very hard-working, and with the help of the loans they are moving their businesses forward and have improved their families' quality of life. They do various kinds of work; the majority have a store.

One of the members of this group is Inés. She is 51 years old and is married with six children. Five of them are grown and one, 16 years old, is a student. Her husband works at a state business.

Inés is a fighter who likes to earn her own resources through effort. She has a business selling drinks in her home. There she sells water, soda, beer, energy drinks, and other drinks, as well as certain snacks and things to nibble on. Also, in her free time, she goes out to sell sheets, since she has her customers, to whom she delivers their merchandise. She sells on credit and collects every 15 days. She generally does this in the mornings, since in the afternoons and nights she works at the business in her house. She has been doing this work for 5 years and it gives her what is necessary to move forward.

This loan is to buy water, soda, beer, sheets, and everything she sells. She has been with the communal bank for three loan cycles, and she likes it because the loans are very good for her, which is why she is very thankful. Her dream is to improve her business day by day.

loans.use: to buy water, soda, beer, sheets, etc.

loans.name: Romelie

texts.en:
Romelie is married, and she works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a cafeteria. Romelie is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF in order to buy additional groceries to sell to customers.

Romelie has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF, and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Seval

texts.en:
Seval is married and a mother of three. Together with her husband she sells glassware, kitchenware, dishes, glasses etc. in the local and city bazaars. Seval is a support to her husband and also a support to the family budget. She wants to prepare a good future for her children. This is her fourth loan from MAYA. She wants to open a glassware store of her own.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Seval Hanım evli ve 3 çocuk annesi. Eşiyle birlikte semt ve ilçe pazarlarında züccaciye ürünleri (mutfak eşyaları tabak, bardak vs.)satıyor. Seval Hanım hem eşine destek oluyor hem de aile bütçesine katkı sağlıyor. Seval Hanım çocuklarına iyi bir gelecek sağlamak istiyor. MAYA’dan 4’üncü kredisini kullanan Seval Hanım züccaciye dükkânı açmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy kitchenware, plastic and glass crisper, plates, pots and pans to sell.

loans.name: Adjovi

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de deux enfants, Adjovi  est une femme âgée de 51 ans résidant à Tokoin. Adjo est une marchande  de produits d’alimentations générales qui s’approvisionne de ses marchandises sept fois par mois au marché et les revendent à la devanture de son domicile. Adjovi sollicite ce prêt pour commander des cartons de macaronis, des dizaines de sachets et de l’insecticide  en vue d’avoir un stock important et maximiser son profit afin d’aider son mari dans l’éducation de ses enfants et à subvenir aux charges quotidiennes éprouvées par sa famille.
texts.en: Adjovi is 51 and she lives in Tokoin. She is married with two children. Adjovi sells general groceries, she buys her stock seven times each month at the market and sells her goods in front of her home. Adjovi requests this loan to buy several tens of cartons of macaroni, and insecticide to have a large stock and maximise her profit. Her aim is to make more profit to help her husband pay for their children's education and provide for the daily family expenses.

loans.use: To buy 02 boxes of macaronis, 50 sachets and 01 insecticide.

loans.name: Viola

texts.en:
Viola is a first-year student at Kepler. She grew up in Rwanda's capital of Kigali with her mother, after her father passed away. After a rigorous application process based on grades, test scores, and personal interviews, she was accepted from over 6,000 applicants this year. Viola chose Kepler because it offered her the ability to develop her critical thinking skills. 

Viola plans to major in Business and Communications, and will graduate Kepler with a BA from an accredited US university. After graduating, she wants to either work in business or become a journalist. A naturally hard worker, she wants to succeed enough in her career to set up her own NGO to help children in Rwanda. She also wants to provide a house for her mother.

loans.use: to pay for a laptop required for a US college degree.

loans.name: Pioneros Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PIONEROS” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Tejada, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Anabel es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ollas, venta de mantas, venta de pañales, venta de comida, venta de ropa, venta de flores.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Anabel es integrante, ella indica que ingreso a Pro Mujer  por la invitación de una amiga que es clienta de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de flores; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de una amiga hace más de un año.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de flores por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de Cochabamba y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Pioneros [Pioneers] Communal Bank will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Villa Tejada regional office. The group is composed of nine members, and is run by a board of directors of which Anabel is the president.

The businesses that the communal bank members run are varied, including pots and pans sales, blanket sales, diaper sales, food sales, clothing sales, and flower sales. The loan that they take will benefit small business owners.

Anabel is a member, and she mentions that she joined Pro Mujer by invitation from a friend who is a client of the institution. Currently, she has a business selling flowers. She learned this business from a friend just over a year ago.

The loan that she is taking will be to increase her stock (by buying flowers in bulk), which she will acquire from the wholesale vendors in Cochabamba and then sell in her space. This work allows her to generate resources to economically support her family, as she is single with two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the healthcare offered by the institution.

loans.use: to buy flowers in bulk.

loans.name: Mayra Alexandra

texts.es:
Mayra es una empresaria muy inquieta, le gusta emplear su tiempo en labores productivas, tiene su negocio de venta de productos de la canasta familiar y ahora quiere tener un negocio alterno para generar mayores ingresos, quiere incursionar en la cría de ganado porcino, por ello solicita tu apoyo para sacar adelante este proyecto.
Ella es cabeza de familia, tiene 4 hijos lo que busca es brindarle un mejor futuro y buenas oportunidades a sus amados muchachos.
texts.en:
Mayra is a very active businesswoman, she likes to use her time in productive work. She has her business selling basic pantry items and now wants to have an additional business to generate more income. She wants to get into raising pigs, so she asks for your support to get this project ahead.

She is the head of the household, has 4 children, and what she seeks is to offer her beloved children a better future and good opportunities.

loans.use: to have a business raising pigs; she will purchase pigs, vitamins, vaccines, and fattening feed.

loans.name: Mukharamkhon

texts.ru: Мухарамхон доброжелательная и скромная женщина. Проживает в городе Худжанде. Она замужем и имеет единственного сына. Еще с юных лет Мухарамхон видела, как ее мать занимается шитьем. Любовь к этому ремеслу передалось ей по наследству. 9 лет назад Мухарамхон успешно прошла курсы кройки и шитья, и теперь свободно может шить как национальную, так и европейскую одежду. Теперь она обучает свою невестку. Однако в данный момент у нее возникли проблемы с работой ее швейной машинки. Мухарамхон обращается к Вам в надежде, что Вы поможете ей приобрести новую швейную машинку для вышивки.
texts.en:
Mukharamkhon is a friendly and modest woman. She lives in the city of Khujand. She is married and has one son. Already in her youth, Mukharamkhon observed how her mother worked with sewing. The love of this craft was passed along to her by inheritance.

9 years ago Mukharamkhon successfully took a course in cutting and sewing, and now she can freely sew both traditional and european clothing. Currently she is also teaching this to her daughter-in-law.

Currently she has gotten problems with her sewing machine. Mukharamkhon has turned to you with the hope that you will help her to purchase a new embroidering machine.

loans.use: to purchase an embroidery machine.

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.en:
Tatyana lives with her son, daughter-in-law and two little grandchildren in Ijevan town.
She and her family have been involved in agriculture for many years. Their main activity are horticulture and poultry. The livestock the family currently owns includes 4 piglets, 120 hens and 5 turkeys. Tatyana also takes care of their orchard where large variety of fruit trees are grown (peach, apricot, quinces, fig, walnut, apple, pear and hazelnut). Tatyana's son sells the gathered harvest in local markets and gets income for his family's living.

Because agribusiness is very important for family, Tatyana wants to develop it. She needs to purchase 60 hens, forage for feeding them and wheat for selling.

This is her first loan and it has been approved within the framework of the joint initiative of Kiva and SEF. This first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have prior access to loans because they had no credit history. Tatyana and her family hope for the good will of the lenders to support them to gather the needed financial resources to develop their farm.

loans.use: to pay for 60 hens, forage for feeding them and wheat for selling.

loans.name: Ines Maria

texts.es:
Inés es una empresaria de 60 años de edad, una mujer activa que trabaja vendiendo mercancía por catálogo, debido a su avanzada edad le es difícil conseguir trabajo, por ello se siente tan feliz de desempeñar una profesión que le ayuda a ocuparse en algo y además de generar recursos para su hogar y tener una vida digna.
Inés quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de productos en promoción, quiere tener buen inventario y vender ya que se acerca la temporada de amor y amistad en Colombia.
texts.en:
Inés is a 60-year-old businesswoman. She is an active woman who works selling catalog merchandise. Due to her advanced age, it is difficult to find work. Because of this, she is so happy to be able to work at a profession that helps her occupy herself with something and also generate resources for her home and have a dignified life.

Inés wants to request a loan to buy products on sale. She wants to have a good inventory and sell since the season of love and friendship in Colombia is approaching.

loans.use: to buy personal care products

loans.name: Denis

texts.en:
Denis is 25 year old single man and still lives with his mother. He does boda boda (motor bike taxi) as his major source of income. He has done this business for over 4 years, however he has been working for others. Denis wants to own his motorcycle but he didn’t have enough money and he decided to join Ugafode for financial assistance to buy a motorcycle.

Denis has applied for a loan of ugx1,400,000 to top up on the little money he had and be able to buy a motorcycle. Denis thanks Ugafode for its financial support with has improved lives of the people in his location and praises it for it quick response to peoples’ needs.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario operates an eatery business at the nearby market. He is 66 years old, a widower with three adult-age children. He continued the operations of his business even after the death of his wife. He believes that the eatery business is the legacy that his wife wanted to leave.

As a MIGS (member in good standing) member of Paglaum MPC, he enjoys the benefits of fast loan approval. Currently, he is availing himself of a loan to purchase meat, spices, and condiments for his eatery business.

loans.use: to purchase meat, spices, and condiments for his eatery business.

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Buenas Amigas se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 27 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de  de 9 y 4 años que estudian en escuela. Su esposo realiza trabajos de limpieza de piscinas.
Doña María es una mujer que le gusta sentirse independiente y lograr sus propios recursos a base de trabajo duro y honrado, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, sale casi todos los días por la localidad ofreciendo sus productos y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, ella deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada fin de semana. Lleva más de 8  años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le permite ganar algo por el bien de su familia, ella está muy agradecida con las personas que le ayudan para que pueda recibir su crédito.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son muy buenos. Sus sueños es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Buenas Amigas communal bank meets every 15 days in the Montecristi Canton, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts, which are recognized nationally and internationally. It is home of the famous Panama hat.

This is where Maria lives. She is 27 years old and married with two children, who are 9 and 4 years old and attend school. Her husband does work cleaning pools.

Maria is a woman who likes to feel independent and earn her own resources through hard, honest work. She works selling clothing of all types door-to-door. She goes out every day through her area, offering her products. She also sells from her house, where her better-known customers come. She lets her customers buy by credit and repay every weekend.

She has been working this job for more than 8 years. It allows to to earn something for the good of her family, and so she is thankful to the people that help enable her to receive a loan. She will use this loan to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children's clothing.

Maria has been with this credit group since its origin, and she likes it because the loans are good. Her dream is to give the best to her children.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children's clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy machinery and fabric to expand her production and sales to the public and obtain better income for her daughter

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment for her fishing business.

Maribel successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is presenting Maribel's business for funding of another loan in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
Chona is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a coconut-grinding business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF in order to buy new tools and equipment for her coconut-grinding business.

Chona successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is presenting Chona's business for funding of another loan in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for her coconut-grinding business.

loans.name: Sixto

texts.es:
Sixto es un hombre de 60 años de edad, padre de 5 hijos todos ellos mayores de edad, vive y depende de un negocio de tienda de productos de la canasta familiar, es muy feliz realizando su profesión, no pide ni un centavo a sus hijos ya que está en la capacidad de producir su propio dinero.
Ya que la tienda es su única entrada de dinero la valora y la cuida como su más preciado tesoro.
Sixto quiere solicitar un préstamo para abastecer su negocio, necesita comprar refrescos, cervezas y abarrotes.
texts.en:
Sixto is a 60 year old man, the father of five children, now all adults. He lives and depends on a business which is a basic food basket store. He is happy carrying out his profession, he doesn't need to ask his children for anything as he has the capacity to produce his own income.

As his store is his only source of income he values it and cares for it like his most precious treasure.

Sixto wants to request a loan to stock his business. He needs to buy soft drinks, beer and groceries.

loans.use: to stock his business, investing in soft drinks, beer and groceries.

loans.name: Valeria

texts.es:
La señorita Valeria es una joven de 25 años de edad, se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir para mujeres, hombres y niños, contando con su propia herramienta de trabajo y de conocimiento en el rubro ya que cuenta con certificados de capacitación de cursos realizados como técnico medio en el rubro que ahora se dedica. La señorita Valeria cuenta con buenas expectativas ya que a ella lo que más le motiva es salir adelante y con varias metas por realizar ya que ella es soltera y quiere llegar a formar un capital de trabajo que le pueda brindar la apertura de negocios con sus productos que fabrica donde la mayor parte son para mujeres.
La señorita Valeria viene de una familia humilde y sobre todo trabajadora la cual esta inculcada con los valores de humildad, buena administración de recursos, respeto, con una visión de emprendimiento y alcanzar los objetivos que ella misma se traza a lo largo de su carrera técnica.
La señorita Valeria requiere un préstamo para la compra de insumos y expandir su producción y mejorar sus ventas al publico y tener una mejora calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Valeria is a young woman, 25 years old, who works sewing clothing for women, men, and children. She has her own work tools and knowledge of the field since she has training certificates from courses she has taken as a technician in the field in which she works now. Valeria has good expectations since what motivates her the most is getting ahead and with various goals to achieve, since she is single and wants to get working capital that will allow her to offer the opening of businesses with her products which the greater amount of she makes is for women.

Valeria comes from a humble and, above all, hard-working family which instilled in her the values of humility, good resource management, respect, with a vision of entrepreneurship and achieving the objectives that she herself establishes during her technical career.

Valeria needs a loan to purchase supplies and expand her production and improve her sales to the public and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and expand her production and improve her sales to the public and have a better quality of life.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de 51 años de edad, separado de su esposa y padre de dos hijos, su sentido de responsabilidad hacia su familia lo hacen solicitar un préstamo para fortalecer su negocio de tienda general, también para iniciar un negocio de venta de fritos como empanadas, pasteles y papas rellenas ya que necesita generar mayores ingresos para ayudar a sus hijos y poder sostenerse así mismo.
Jorge sueña con el día que logre una estabilidad económica y pueda disfrutar los frutos de su arduo trabajo.
texts.en:
Jorge is a 51-year-old man who is separated from his wife and is the father of two children. His sense of responsibility towards his family drives him to request a loan to strengthen his general store business and also to start a business selling fried foods like empanadas, pastries and stuffed potatoes. He needs to generate greater income to help his children and to be able to support himself.

Jorge dreams of the day that he will achieve financial stability and be able to enjoy the fruits of his hard work.

loans.use: to start a parallel business to his store selling food and to buy the equipment and necessary supplies to prepare empanadas, pastries and stuffed potatoes.

loans.name: Bình

texts.en:
Mrs. Bình is 33 years old and married. She has operated a food stall selling crabs for more than ten years.

Bình lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, this region often suffers from natural disasters such as floods and drought. So, it is very difficult for her to cover living costs and do what she really wants to have comfort in her life.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is that her latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a new toilet.

Bình joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. She hopes that this loan can make her little dream come true.

With her business profit, Bình hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a new toilet.

loans.name: Esthella María

texts.es:
Esthella es una mujer emprendedora, inteligente, responsable y capaz, ella vive en la zona rural de Córdoba, un municipio bastante afectado por la pobreza, pero lleno de empresarios que con emprendimiento y actitud, ganas y entusiasmo quieren salir adelante, ella es separada y tuvo que asumir las riendas económicas del hogar, pero eso no la preocupa porque se siente capaz y en condiciones de asumir dicha responsabilidad.
Esthella quiere solicitar un apoyo económico para potenciar su negocio de cría de cerdos, pensando en la temporada alta de esta actividad que es la época navideña, donde se logran el mayor número de ventas que en cualquier mes del año.
texts.en:
Esthella is an enterprising woman, intelligent, responsible, and capable. She lives in a rural area in Cordoba, an area high in poverty but full of enterprising people who with knowledge and attitude, will, and enthusiasm want to be successful. She is separated and had to assume responsibility for supporting herself, but this doesn't worry her because she feels capable and in a position to assume that responsibility.

Esthella wants to ask for a loan to support her business raising pigs, anticipating the high season during Christmas, when there will be the greatest number of sales of any month of the year.

loans.use: anticipating the Christmas season, she wants to buy pigs, vaccines, vitamins, and animal feed.

loans.name: Nolverta

texts.es:
La señora Nolverta nació en 1974 en la localidad de Tucuspaya provincia Chayanta del Departamento de Potosi. tuvo su pareja desde muy joven llegaron al trópico del Departamento de Cochabamba donde trabajaron de jornaleros en diferentes actividades, gracias al esfuerzo de ambos llegaron a obtener un lote donde actualmente viven.
La señora Nolverta es madre de familia de 3 niños, esta concubinada con el señor Benjamin, la señora junto a su esposo se esfuerza día a día por darle mejores condiciones de vida, alimentación, salud y educación a sus hijos. emprendiendo diferentes actividades que le generen economía, para ingresos estables y sostenible en bien de su bienestar familiar, desde hace 12 años viene trabajando en la producción de cítricos como ser naranja y piña estas producciones le brinda ingresos económicos favorables para la sostenibilidad de su negocio y mejorar las condiciones de vida familiar. la señora a adquirido habilidades en la actividad administrativa de la producción agrícola y en vista de mejorar el negocio la señora necesita un préstamo para el acabado de su vivienda para darle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Nolverta was born in 1974 in the town of Tucuspaya, Chayanta province, of the department of Potosi. She has been partnered since she was very young, they came to the tropics of the department of Cochabamba, where they worked as day laborers in different jobs. Thanks to the efforts of the two, they managed to get a plot of land where they currently live.

Nolverta is the mother of a family of 3 children, she is in a common-law marriage with Benjamin. She, with her husband, works hard day by day to give their children the best life conditions, food, health, and education. She undertakes different jobs which generate income. For stable and sustainable income for the well-being of her family, for the past 12 years she has been working in producing citrus fruits such as oranges and pineapples. This production offers her good income to sustain the business and improve the family's living conditions. She has gotten the skills in managing the agricultural production and in light of improving her business, she needs a loan to finish her house to give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to improve her house to be able to offer her products of oranges and pineapple in better conditions to her customers and improve her income for her family.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
Paulina is busy in her farming activity, especially now that she's heading into this cropping season and at the same time supervising her house completion.

She is a 62-year-old widow with 5 adult-age children who are now working on their different chosen fields.

Paulina wanted to live in a comfortable house as a treat to herself for all her hard work through the years. Recently, she took a loan amount to purchase bags of cement for house completion.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement for house completion.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 65 years old and a widow with 2 adult-age children from Jimenez, Misamis Occidental.

She is a pensioner member of Paglaum MPC and at the same time operates a fishing business. She is supported with her monthly pension and income from her business ventures, which she and her husband had ventured into together way back before.

Recently, she availed herself of a loan to purchase plywood, bags of cement, and galvanized iron sheets for house repair.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, bags of cement, and galvanized iron sheets for house repair.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Kafui est une femme mariée dynamique qui vit à Tokoin  avec ses deux enfants  et son mari. Kafui est une femme âgée de 36 ans qui  s’active parfaitement  pour avoir une bonne situation financière. Kafui est une revendeuse de pagnes et de basins qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pour atteindre ses objectifs, Kfui  nécessite ce prêt pour commander des pièces de pagnes et de basins afin de répondre favorablement aux attentes de ses clients et avoir une autonomie financière remarquable  pour aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire.
texts.en: Kafui is a dynamic married lady who lives in Tokoin  with her husband and two children. Kafui is 36 and works hard to have a good financial situation. Kafui sells pagne dresses and bazin fabric and stocks up twice a month at the market. To reach her objectives, Kafui needs this loan to order pagne dresses and bazin fabric to satisfy her customers, and to attain a notable financial autonomy to help her children through their education.

loans.use: to buy 04 units of bazin fabric and 05 pagne dresses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Eustaquia

texts.es: La señora Eustaquia tiene 32 años de edad, trabaja actualmente terreno propio, tiene dos hijos que depende de ella, tiene su esposo, viven en el departamento de Chuquisaca municipio Monteagudo. Su principal actividad de la solicitante es el cultivo de maíz y experiencia en el rubro de la miel de abeja es por ello que emprenderá una nueva actividad, la señora requiere un préstamo para la producción de miel de abejas, mismo que será destinado para la compra  de materiales y equipamiento para la apicultura ya que en la zona tiene un buen rendimiento la producción de miel de abeja, con la compra de la misma el solicitante empezara su actividad ya que tiene la necesidad de facilitar su trabajo con la producción de miel por lo tanto podrá generar buenos ingresos y mejorar sus condiciones de vida en su hogar y su diario vivir con sus hijos y su esposo ya que esta actividad requiere de menor inversión y menos trabajo en mano de obra una vez establecida la actividad.
texts.en: Eustaquia is 32 years old and works on her own land. She has two dependent children, is married, and lives in Chuquisaca department, Monteagudo municipality. Her primary work is growing corn an dshe has experience in honey bees therefore she will launch this new work. She needs a loan for the production of honey, and the loan will be used to buy materials and supplies for her honey bee production as the zone has a good yield for the production of honey. With the purchases she will launch her business as she needs to expand her work with the honey in order to generate good income and improve her family's living conditions and daily life with her children and husband. This business requires minor investment and less labor once it is established.

loans.use: to buy materials and supplies for her honey bee production to sell to her customers in order to improve income for her family.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: La señora Rosa vive en el área rural con su pareja en calidad de concubinos, alcanzó a estudiar hasta el nivel primario, su vivienda  es rustica de adobe con techo de teja española, que carece de algunos servicios básicos, la señora Rosa es una persona trabajadora y con mucho optimismo trabajan día a día junto a su conyugue para obtener ingresos económicos para el propio sustento. Se dedica primordialmente a la agricultura,  en esta actividad lleva 5 años aproximadamente, donde produce y comercializa sus producción. Lo que obtienen lo lleva a la venta en ferias provinciales de la región y pueblos aledaños, los productos principales que siembra son papa en mayor cantidad, cebada, avena y otros en menor cantidad generalmente para consumo propio. La señora Rosa se ve en la necesidad de solicitar el préstamo para la compra de abono orgánico gallinaza y semilla de papa, de esta manera poder ampliar su producción, continuar con su comercialización y obtener ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rosa lives in the rural area with her partner in a common-law marriage. She managed to study up to the level of primary school, her home is rustic and made of adobe with a roof of Spanish tile which lacks some basic services. Rosa is a hard-working person and with a lot of optimism, she works day by day alongside her partner to get income for their own sustenance. She works basically in agriculture and has been doing this work for approximately 5 years, where she produces and sells her products. What they get, they bring to sell at the provincial markets in the area and nearby towns. The products she primarily grows are potatoes in the greatest quantity, barley, wheat and others in smaller quantities generally for their own consumption. Rosa needs to ask for a loan to purchase organic chicken manure and potato seeds, in this way to be able to expand her production, continue with her sales and get income to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase organic chicken manure and potato seeds to be able to expand her production and sales and get income to improve her quality of life.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.es: La señora Erlinda vive en el área rural con su pareja en calidad de casada, la señora alcanzó a estudiar hasta el nivel primario, su vivienda  es rustica de adobe con techo de teja española que carece de algunos servicios básicos, la señora Erlinda es una persona trabajadora y con mucho optimismo trabajan día a día junto a su conyugue para obtener ingresos económicos para el propio sustento. Se dedica primordialmente a la agricultura,  en esta actividad lleva 20 años aproximadamente, donde produce y comercializa su producción. Lo que obtienen lo lleva a la venta en ferias provinciales de la región y pueblos aledaños, los productos principales que siembra son papa en mayor cantidad, cebada, avena y otros en menor cantidad generalmente para consumo propio. La señora Erlinda se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo económico para la compra de abono orgánico (gallinaza), de esta manera poder ampliar su producción, continuar con su comercialización y obtener ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Erlinda lives in the rural area with her partner in a relationship like marriage. She managed to study up to the primary level, her house is rustic and made of adobe with a roof of Spanish tile which lacks some basic services. Erlinda is a hard-working person and with a lot of optimism she works alongside her partner day by day to get the income for their own sustenance.  She works basically in agriculture, she has done this work for 20 years approximately, where she produces and sells her production. What they get they bring to sell at provincial markets in the region and nearby towns. The products which they grow primarily are potatoes, in the greatest quantity, barley, wheat and others in small quantities, generally for their own consumption.  Erlinda sees the need to ask for a loan to purchase organic manure (from chickens), in this way to be able to expand her production, continue with her sales and get income to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase organic manure (from chickens) to expand her production to improve her sales and get income to improve her quality of life.

loans.name: Hiền

texts.en:
Mrs Hiền is 34 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 10 years.

Hiền lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her household was recognized by local government as poor. Moreover, this region often suffered natural disasters such as storms because it is near the sea, and the income from her business is not high enough to do what she really wants to comfort her life.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is that her latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

In 2015, Hiền joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She hopes that this loan could make her little dream come true. With her business profit, Hiền hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and to travel internationally for a vacation.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr: Mr DRISSA est un éleveur analphabète, âgé de 43 ans qui réside au Mali. Il vit avec sa conjointe et ses 8 enfants (5 filles et 3 garçons) dont un garçon scolarisé, sa conjointe fait le commerce de lait pour gagner sa vie. Il fait l’élevage il y’a 30ans ce qui lui permet de gagner jusqu’à 50 000FCFA de bénéfice par mois ; en voulant reussir son activité, il sollicite un prêt pour acheter beaucoup de bœufs dans le but de les élever et les revendre afin de gagner plus de bénéfice lui permettant de couvrir les frais de scolarité de l’enfant, les soins de santé et de réserver d’autres têtes pour la famille.
texts.en: Mr. Drissa is an illiterate livestock farmer aged 43 who lives in Mali. He lives with his spouse and their eight children (five girls and three boys), one boy goes to school. His spouse sells milk to earn a living. He raises livestock, he has been doing this for 30 years and this profession enables him to earn up to 50-000FCFA profits a month. He wants to do well in his business and he requests a loan to buy many bullocks to raise and sell again to make more profit which would enable him to cover school fees for his child and health care, and to put aside some of the livestock for the family.

loans.use: to buy bullocks for resale.

loans.name: Dellanira

texts.es: Ella es Dellanira una empresaria humilde pero con los mejores deseos de progresar, se dedica a la fabricación y venta de alimentos los cuales realiza en su modesto hogar, los bajos recursos y la falta de oportunidades nunca fueron una excusa para esta empresaria que hoy necesita de tu apoyo para la compra de alimentos, como abarrotes, pescados y verduras para mejorar su profesión, ella tiene un deseo, una convicción de construir su vivienda en material )concreto y adobe) y demostrara a toda la comunidad que con ganas y trabajo honesto puede lograrlo, por ello está tan decidida al préstamo.
texts.en:
This is Dellanira, a humble businesswoman with the best desires to progress She works making and selling food which she prepares in her modest house. Few resources and a lack of opportunity were never an excuse for this businesswoman who today needs your help to buy foods like groceries, fish and vegetables to improve her profession.

She has a desire, a belief to build a house out of concrete and adobe and demonstrate to her community that with the desire and honest work you can do it. For this reason she is very determined to get the loan.

loans.use: to improve her food sale business buying fish, groceries and vegetables.

loans.name: Ines

texts.es: La señora Ines es una persona de 52 años de edad de estado civil casada, alcanzo a estudiar hasta la primaria, cuenta con tres dependientes económicos a su cargo, vive en casa propia, es de construcción rustica con material local ubicado en la comunidad de Kaspi cancha  Bajo - Tiraque, su actividad económica es la agrícola produce papa, haba en vaina verde y avena (forraje), todos los productos mencionados son cultivados aproximadamente en una superficie de 2 has. Los cuales cuentan con riego. El dinero que tenía anteriormente fue destinado para la compra de dos toros para utilizar como yunta, en ese sentido la señora Ines se ve con una necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para poder comprar abono orgánico (gallinaza), con la producción en el futuro, con la intención de que se mejore  sus ingresos y al mismo tiempo mejorara, una mejor vivencia familiar con sus dependientes económicos
texts.en: Ines is a 52-year-old person who is married. She managed to study up through primary school, she has three economic dependents in her care, lives in her own house, which is built rustically of local material in the community of Kaspi Cancha Bajo - Tiraque, her work is agriculture, she grows potatoes, green beans in pods, and wheat (fodder), all the products mentioned are grown in an area of 2 hectares which has irrigation. The money that she previously had was used to purchase two bulls to use as a working team. In this way, Ines sees the need to ask for a loan to be able to purchase organic manure (from chickens), with the future production with the intention of increasing her income and at the same time an improvement, a better family experience with her economic dependents.

loans.use: to purchase organic manure (from chickens) and seeds to improve her production and sales in such as way as to generate more income for her family.

loans.name: Leona

texts.es: La señora Leona vive en el trópico de Cochabamba-Bulo Bulo, con sus hijos y su concubino, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, trabaja juntamente con la ayuda de su marido en el área pecuaria y agrícola, en su terreno propio lo cual lo adquirieron con mucho sacrificio después de años de trabajo como jornaleros, en ese terreno ellos se dedican a la cría de ganado vacuno de engorde y a la producción de yuca, el ingreso de estas actividades es su fuente de sustento económico, el ganado una vez que llega a la etapa de comercialización es comercializado a los carniceros de la zona y la yuca es vendida a comerciantes, venden en su misma actividad económica los productos mencionados, doña Leona pudo ver en el transcurso de los años que la actividad ganadera es de fácil manejo y le genera buenos ingresos por lo cual quiere seguir comprando mas ganado vacuno por tal motivo la señora Leona necesita un préstamo para la compra de ganado para mejorar su producción agrícola y así mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Leona lives in the tropics of Cochabamba-Bulo Bulo, with her children and partner. She is a very hardworking and entrepreneurial woman. She works, along with the help of her husband, in farming and ranching on their own land, which they acquired through much sacrifice after years of work as day laborers. On this land, they raise cattle and grow cassava. The income from this work is their primary economic source. When the cattle reaches the stage of selling, it is sold to the butchers in the area, and the cassava is sold to vendors. They sell these products as part of the same job.

Leona has been able to see over the years that ranching is an easy job that generates good income, so she keeps buying more cattle. For this reason, she needs a loan to buy cattle and to increase her agricultural production, which will improve her economic income.

loans.use: to buy cattle and to increase her agricultural production, which will improve her economic income.

loans.name: Amélé

texts.fr: Veuve et mère de trois enfants, Amélé est une femme âgée de 48 ans résidant à Tokoin. Amélé est une marchande de produits d’alimentations générales qui achète ses marchandises quatre fois par mois au marché et les revendent à la devanture de son domicile. Amélé sollicite ce prêt pour commander de l’huile, du riz et des paniers de tomates fraîches en vue de stocker une plus grande quantité de marchandises et de maximiser son profit afin d’aider ses enfants dans leur éducation et de subvenir à certaines charges quotidiennes éprouvées.
texts.en: Amélé is a widow with three children. She is 48 and lives in Tokoin. Amélé sells general grocery products which she buys four times each month at the market and sells in front of her home. Amélé requests this loan to order oil, rice, and baskets of fresh tomatoes in order to have a bigger stock of merchandise and to maximise her profits. She wishes to help her children with their education, and to provide for certain daily expenses that she must assume.

loans.use: to buy one can of oil, one sack of rice, and four baskets of fresh tomatoes.

loans.name: Maria Abelina

texts.es: maria de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años, tambien se dedica a la crianza de pollos, comercializa sus prodcutos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un credito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, sulfato, etc. para tener una buena cosecha.
texts.en: Maria, 41 years old, lives in her own house with her three children. She has worked in agriculture for 20 years, and also works raising chickens, selling her products in the nearby areas to the zone where she lives. With the sales that she makes, she manages to cover some of the household expenses. The borrower is asking for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, sulfate, etc. to have a good harvest.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticides, sulfate, etc.

loans.name: Christian Enmanuel

texts.es: Christian de 28 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida. Él es un hombre muy trabajador que se gana la vida como brindando sus servicios como vendedor en una empresa privada además los fines de semana vende ropa para dama y caballeros, es así como genera sus ingresos económicos con los que ha salido adelante cumpliendo así cada una de las metas que se ha propuesto con su dedicación. Christian desea realizar unas mejoras en su vivienda construyendo unas paredes que actualmente son de lámina y así poder brindarle mayor seguridad a él y a su compañera de vida, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en:  cemento, ladrillos, varillas de hierro, arena, grava, etc., para mejorar la seguridad de su vivienda y su familia.
texts.en: Christian, 28 years old, lives in his own house with his life partner. He is a very hard-working man who earns his living offering his services as a salesman in a private business. In addition, on the weekends he sells clothing for women and men, and in this way he generates the income with which he has gotten ahead, achieving each of the goals that he has established for himself with his dedication. Christian wants to make some improvements to his house, building some walls that currently are of metal sheeting and, so, to be able to offer better security to him and his life partner. For this, he asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in cement, bricks, metal bars, sand, gravel, etc., to improve the security of his house and his family.

loans.use: to invest in cement, bricks, iron bars, sand, gravel, etc. to improve the security of his house and his family.

loans.name: Fransisca

texts.es: La señora francisca siempre mantuvo la esperanza de mejorar su calidad de vida con trabajo y esfuerzo junto a su conyugue quien juntamente trabajan la tierra producciendo papa y demas derivados del sector agricola y asi poder mantenerse economicamente, actualmente no cuenta con dependientes ya que sus hijos son mayores de edad y cuentan con sus propias familias y negocios se puede hacer notar que siempre van mejorando la calidad de su producto por el cual etapa tras etapa de produccion van mejorando su calidad de produccion, es por ello que la señora Fransisca necesita un préstamno para ampliar su producción y en mejora de semillas y demas insumos, con la inversion que realizaran podran mejorar de gran magnitud la produccion y asi mismo estara satisfecha al cubrir una de sus necesidades que requiere para el sector de su fuente de ingresos, durante bastante tiempo se capacitaron con programas que ofrece la municipalidad de sacaba hacia los agricultores donde alli nace las ideas y tecnicas de mejoramiento de la actividad agricola y asi mismo optan por buscar fuentes de financiamiento para asi cumplir una de sus necesidades primordiales
texts.en:
Fransisca has always hoped to improve her quality of life through work and effort. She and her husband work together farming potatoes and other agricultural products. This supports them economically, and they currently have no dependents since their children are adults with their own families and businesses.

One can see that they are always improving the quality of their product, so that season after season their production is higher quality. For this reason, Fransisca needs a loan to increase her production and improve her seeds and other goods. With the investment, she will be able to greatly improve her production. She will be satisfied to cover one of the necessities for this job that is her primary source of income.

Over much time, they became certified through agricultural programs offered by the city. This is where ideas are born and agricultural technique is improved. Likewise they chose to look for funding in order to fulfill their fundamental needs.

loans.use: to buy seeds and supplies in order to improve her production or market offering, which will generate better income for her family.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: La señora Carmen  y su esposo Félix viven en Cochabamba provincia chapare;  tienen 41 y 42 años de edad respectivamente, convivientes más 11 años, económicamente son independiente, ambos se dedican a la actividad de agricultura siembran papa, haba y papaliza. En una superficie de 3 hectáreas. Para la venta de sus productos cuenta con un mercado consolidado la feria semanal de Sacaba, La señora Carmen requieren un préstamo para la compra de abono orgánico, semilla de papa y productos agroquímicos, ya que sus ahorros lo invirtieron en la compra de terreno agrícola.                                                                                                                                                                       Por último, la señora Carmen y su esposo se sintieron contentos al tener la oportunidad de acceder a un préstamo, porque con la compra de abono orgánico, semilla de papa y productos agroquímicos, va tener mejores ingresos y incrementará su patrimonio familiar y de esa manera podrá mejorar su nivel de vida en beneficio de su familia hacia futuro.
texts.en:
Carmen and her husband Félix live in Cochabamba, Chapare province. They are 41 and 42 years old, respectively, have been together for more than 11 years, are economically independent, both work in agriculture growing potatoes, green beans and papalisa in an area of 3 hectares. To sell their products, they have a consolidated market at the weekly market in Sacaba. Carmen needs the loan to purchase organic manure, potato seeds and agrochemicals, since with their savings they invested in the purchase of agricultural land.

Finally, Carmen and her husband are happy to have the opportunity to access a loan because with the purchase of organic manure, potato seeds and agrochemical products, they will have more income and will increase the family legacy and in this way will be able to improve their standard of living to benefit their family into the future.

loans.use: to purchase organic manure, potato seeds, and agrochemical products to improve her products and get better income for her family.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a hardworking entrepreneur, with five children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines, and she has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of items to sell, like soap, shampoo, canned goods, milk, and sugar.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures, like farming rice.

She successfully paid back her 11 previous loans. Now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Erlinda dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of items to sell, like soap, shampoo, canned goods, milk, and sugar

loans.name: Bernadette

texts.en:
As the married mother of four children, Bernadette works hard to support her family.

She has a business making dried fish in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from selling food. 

Bernadette is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fish to make more dried fish for her business.  She has sustained her business through her past 25 loans from NWTF. 

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to make dried fish

loans.name: Dina

texts.es: Dina de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de medicina popular desde hace 3 años inicio con capital propio, vende de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas medicina popular por mayor para poder seguir con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Dina is 33 years old and lives in her own house with her three children. She works selling popular medicine. She started the business three years ago with her own funds. She conducts traveling sales through the different communities. With the earnings, she is able to cover some of the household expenses. She is requesting a loan to by popular medicine in bulk, in order to continue her sales and have better income.

loans.use: to buy more popular medicine in bulk.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: Doña Maria de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos desde hace 7 años, su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de reidencia y posee muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de maiz, verduras, platanos, azucar, leche, entre otros ingredientes para seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en: Maria, 53 years old, lives in her own house with her son. She has worked selling snacks for the past 7 years. Her business is located in her home and she has many customers. With what she gets from her earnings, she manages to cover some household expenses. She is asking for a loan to purchase corn, vegetables, plantains, sugar, milk, and other ingredients to continue with her work.

loans.use: to purchase corn, vegetables, plantains, sugar, milk, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Deisy Aracely

texts.es: Deisy es una mujer de 37 años de edad que se esfuerza cada día para sacar adelante a sus hijos, con el apoyo de su esposo y de su trabajo en una empresa cercana, además siempre buscando la manera de tener más ingresos para costear los gastos de la educación de sus hijos, vende productos de belleza por catálogo. Deisy hace algunos años vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos una niña de 16 años y un varón de 20 años de edad. Deisy desea invertir en más productos de belleza, al contado, ya que desea brindar una mejor a sus clientes, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lociones, desodorantes, cremas corporales, maquillaje, entre otros productos para mejorar sus ingresos y continuar apoyando a sus hijos con sus estudios.
texts.en: Deisy is a 37-year-old woman who works hard each day to get her children ahead. With the support of her husband and his work in a nearby business, in addition always seeking the means to have more income to pay her children's education expenses, she sells beauty products from catalogs. For some years, Deisy has lived in a house that she owns with her husband and with their two children, a 16-year-old girl and a 20-year-old boy. Deisy wants to invest in more beauty products in cash, since she wants to offer better services to her customers, so she asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in lotions, deodorants, body creams, makeup and other products to improve her income and continue supporting her children with their schooling.

loans.use: to invest in lotions, deodorants, body creams, makeup, and other products to improve her income.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 38 years old and married with school age kids. She lives in Caticugan, Siquijor. She operates a fishing business together with her husband.

Rosalie once hoped for an additional fishing boat, and it came true with support from Paglaum MPC. This time, she wants a loan to purchase new fishing nets for her fishing business.

loans.use: to purchase new fishing nets.

loans.name: Marinel

texts.en: Marinel is 43 years old and lives in Lilo-an, Maria, Siquijor. She needs to stand on her own feet since her husband left her. She cultivates her land and grows various root crops and spices and is making good proceeds from it. Recently, she availed a loan to purchase bags of fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en:
Beatriz works hard to support her family.  She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional fishing net.

Beatriz has been in this business for 6 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net

loans.name: Bella

texts.en:
Bella is 48 years old and married.  She has five children who are in school.  Bella works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines, and she has requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell like canned goods, noodles, coffee, and sugar.

Bella has been in this business for 8 years. 

In the future Bella would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell, like canned goods, noodles, coffee, and sugar

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita  is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling rice in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 11000 through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice for her rice business.

Conchita has been in this business for 5 years. She earns other income from farming rice and operating a rice mill.

She has sustained her business through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Anameth

texts.en:
Anameth is 44 years old and married.  She works hard to provide for her family. 

She runs a general store in the Philippines, and she has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, like canned goods, soft drinks, coffee, milk, and sugar.

Anameth has borrowed and repaid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running her general store for three years, and she also earns income from buying and selling vegetables.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like canned goods, soft drinks, coffee, milk, and sugar.

loans.name: Anabelle

texts.en:
Anabelle is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 30 years old, and both of her children are in school.

Anabelle has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell.

Anabelle has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Jose Rene

texts.es:
José, de 58 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de asistir a la escuela, por falta de recursos económicos; está acompañado, junto a su esposa han procreado dos hijos que están estudiando y cada día José, sale a trabajar al campo, para poder cubrir los gastos de la familia y darles la oportunidad a sus hijos que sigan estudiando. 

José, toda su vida se ha dedicado a cultivar la tierra y a criar ganado, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre y ahora es de ahí de donde obtiene ganancias para poder darle lo necesario a su familia. 

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas para sembrar milpa postrera, porque la milpa de invierno la perdió debido al fenómeno de la sequía que atraviesa nuestro país, es por eso que solo va cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz.

José, sueña con ver a sus hijos preparados académicamente y que puedan tener otro nivel de vida que el que tienen actualmente.
texts.en:
José is 58 years old. He did not have the opportunity to go to school due to a lack of economic resources. He is in a realtionship and together with his wife have two children who are studying. Every day José goes out to work in the fields to cover the family's expenses and give his children the opportunity to continue studying.

All his life José has worked cultivating the land and raising cattle. He learned this from his father and now it is how he makes earnings to provide for his family's needs.

He needs the loan to buy agricultural inputs to plant his second corn crop as he lost the winter corn crop due to the drought that the country is experiencing. So he is only going to plant 14,000 square meters of corn.

José dreams of seeing his children get their education so they can have a better standard of living than what he now has.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs to plant the second crop of corn.

loans.name: Ana Milena

texts.en:
Ana is 35 years old and lives in the municipality of Sincelejo. She has three children, two beautiful daughters and one son, whom she loves very much and they are the reason why she’s making big plans for now and the near future. She’s an entrepreneur who has decided to start her own business selling clothes and shoes.

She expects that this new business will allow her to support her family which really needs it right now, and to keep a business that her mother taught her once. She wants to have many clients and offer many products. She’s asking for a loan so she can buy inputs like clothes and shoes so she can start selling.

Ana dreams of paying for her children's education, and this is the main reason for this new business, so they can grow up with a good quality of life. She also wishes she can fix her house because it has some problems. You can help Ana with this loan and let her accomplish big things.

loans.use: to buy inputs like clothes and shoes so she can start selling.

loans.name: Edemia

texts.pt:
A  senhora Edemia de52 anos de idade   é pensionista militar  casada, mãe de 7 filhos todos já maiores de idade  porém, sustenta 2 2 filhos e os restantes  estão nos seus lares e sustenta também 4 netos que frequentam o ensino primário e e responsável por uma nora, vive em casa própria.
Diz que com este crédito irá comprar cimento, varões, areia, pedra, portas e janelas, para dar continuidade a construção de  sua casa.
O seu sonho é terminar a obra, mobilar para oferecer um lar melhor  a sua família e futuramente comprar uma viatura para uso pessoal.
Tem como desafios financeiros tem  estado a fazer machambas e com os créditos anteriores adquiriu alguns bens e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as mesmas e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Edemia is 52 years old. She lives in a military pension, married with 7 children all of age, but she still supports two of them. The rest have left the home. She also supports 4 grandchildren who go to grade school and she is responsible for a daughter-in-law. She lives in a house that she owns.
She will use this loan to buy cement, rods, sand, stone, doors and windows to continune building her home.
Her dream is to finish the works, furnish the house and offer her family a better place to live and in the future, buy a car for personal use.
She struggles financially, but she's been working small jobs and with the help of her previous loans she was able to make progress. She wants to ask for more loans in the future to be able to reach her dreams.

loans.use: to buy cement, rods, sand, stone, doors and windows

loans.name: Ana Lissette

texts.es: Con 47 años de edad Ana se caracteriza por esforzarse cada día para sacar adelante a su familia, ya que desde hace 12 años se dedica a la elaboración de platos típicos de su país entre los cuales se encuentran: empanadas, enchiladas, pastelitos de carne, yuca frita, entre otros. Ana vive hace ya varios años en casa de su propiedad junto a sus 3 hijos que son mayores de edad y le apoyan, ya que ella los ha logrado sacar adelante como madre soltera. La cocina en la que Ana prepara sus alimentos y los platos típicos que vende, pero esta está bastante deteriorada, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos, maíz, yuca, entre otros para mejorar su cocina y los ingredientes para su negocio.
texts.en:
At 47 years old, Ana is characterized by the effort she makes every day to get her family ahead. For 12 years she has worked preparing traditional dishes such as empanadas, enchiladas, meat pastries, fried cassava, and others.

Ana has lived in her own house for several years along with her 3 children who are adults and support her, since she managed as a single mother to get them ahead.

The kitchen in which Ana prepares her food and traditional dishes is very dilapidated, so she is requesting a loan to buy galvanized metal, wood, nails, corn, cassava, other items to improve her kitchen, and other ingredients for her business.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal, wood, nails, corn, cassava, other items to improve her kitchen, and other ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Nellie

texts.en:
Nellie has mastered her hog raising business, in existence for ten years now. She's doing well with this business, and she has opened a meat shop on the local public market. 

Recently, she has borrowed PHP 12,000 to purchase bags of animal feed and vitamins.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feed and vitamins

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita is a transportation operator at Ozamiz City with her husband as one of the drivers. She is 47 years old.

Mercedita is a member in good standing of Paglaum MPC, where she can turn whenever she needs financial assistance. Recently, she took a loan to purchase a slightly used motorcycle for her transportation business. She wants an additional motorcycle to increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase a slightly used motorcycle for her transportation business.

loans.name: Elvie

texts.en:
Elvie is a corn farmer in Ibabao, Siquijor. She is 40 years old and married, with school-age children. 

She cultivates her own land and has mastered the skills in farming. 

Heading into this cropping season, she has applied for a loan to pay for land preparation. 

She is a microfinance member of Paglaum MPC, and she has nurtured her membership without defaults in payments.

loans.use: to pay for land preparation

loans.name: Elnora

texts.en:
Elnora is 43 years old.  She is married and has six children, three of whom are in school.  

She has an agricultural business farming vegetables in the Philippines.  She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Elnora has been farming vegetables for 3 years now, and she has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Elnora would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Florel

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Florel works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from fattening pigs and selling rice. 

Florel is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy more sacks of charcoal for her charcoal business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Florel has sustained her business activities through her past 8 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en: Last June 20, Adelaida signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC, where she has enjoyed the benefits of being a member. She availed herself of various products and services, including insurance services. Now she asks for a loan to purchase ingredients such as bananas, bags of flour, sugar, butter, margarine, cheese and milk. She wants to increase her production at this time because she was permitted by a school canteen to display her food products. She hopes for success and business expansion.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as bananas, bags of flour, sugar, butter, margarine, cheese and milk.

loans.name: Natalia Andrea

texts.en:
Natalia is 32 years old and lives in the municipality of Girardota, near Medellín. She has a son who is 11 years old and is her reason to work hard and search for how to succeed in life. She owns a business selling food, something that she started to do for the needs that her family had.

She expects to increase her clients so it impacts her sales and consequently her profits start to grow. She wishes that someday she can open her own restaurant, but for now she wants to invest so it starts to grow. She asked for a loan so she can buy a refrigerator that she needs and some inputs for cooking.

Natalia’s house has some structure problems in front, so she dreams of being able to fix those and let her family live better. She’s a devoted mother who wants to give her son a great life. Help her accomplish this and more with a loan that will do a lot for her.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator that she needs and some inputs for cooking.

loans.name: Tadita Audila

texts.es:
La Sra. Tadita tiene 26 años y 2 hijos de (1 - 5)años los cuales van a a la escuela, es casada y su esposo en profesor  Tadita es técnico agropecuario. Tiene 6 años en el negocio de la tara y le gusta porque es un negocio rentable que no necesita de mucha inversión; sus sueños a futuro son incrementar el área de plantación y brindar una carrera profesional a sus menores hijos. 
Tadita asegura que el negocio sea rentable aplicando todos los conocimientos aprendidos en su formación profesional como técnico agropecuario.
texts.en: Tadita is 26 years old and has two children ages 1 and 5, who attend school. She is married and her husband is a professor. Tadita is an agricultural technician. She has had a tara business for 6 years and she likes it because it is profitable and doesn't require a lot of investment. (Tara trees provide tannins.) Her dreams for the future are to increase her cultivated area and provide a professional career education to her children. Tadita assures that the business is profitable, applying the knowledge she learned professionally as an agricultural technician.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for her tara trees.

loans.name: Maria Albertina

texts.es:
Albertina, de 63 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado, es viuda, su esposo murió durante el conflicto armado de los años 80´s, tuvo 3 hijos con su esposo, pero solo uno depende economicamente de ella, porque tiene capacidades especiales, aunque sus otros 2 hijos viven en su casa con sus respectivas familias.

Albertina, tiene un negocio de venta de huevo y producto omnilife desde hace 7 años, anteriormente trabajaba en casas ajenas haciendo oficios domésticos, pero por su edad y el cuido de su hijo se le dificultó continuar trabajando de esa manera, es por eso que ahora toda su actividad la realiza desde su casa, donde ofrece sus productos todo el día y puede cuidar a su hijo sin problemas.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprar más productos omnilife y más huevos, porque está teniendo mayor demanda, esto le ayudará a obtener mejores ingresos en su negocio.

Albertina, desea seguir ofreciendo sus productos para mantener a su hijo, con el préstamo podrá darle a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y también le ayudará a ampliar más su negocio.
texts.en:
Albertina is 63 years old and left school after the third grade. She is a widow; her husband died in the armed conflict during the eighties.
