She and her husband had three sons but only one of them who has special needs relies on her for financial support. Her two other sons live in her home with their respective families.
For the past 7 seven years Albertina has run a business selling eggs and Omnilife products. Previously she used to do housework in nearby homes , however her age and the need to care for her son made working in this way difficult. Now she does all her business from her home where she sells products all day and can care for her son without difficulty.
The loan will be used to buy more eggs and Omnilife products to meet growing demand, this will help her increase the income from her business.
Albertina wishes to continue to sell her products so she can care for her son.The loan will allow her to improve her sons quality of life and help grow her business.

loans.use: to buy more eggs and Omnilife products.

loans.name: Sandra Maribel

texts.es:
Sandra, de 22 años de edad, es una mujer joven, es madre soltera y vive con sus padres y su pequeña hija, sus padres le ayudan a cuidar de su hija, mientras ella trabaja.
 
Sandra, es empleada en un negocio de artículos para el hogar en la capital, ella viaja todos los días para llegar a su trabajo, tiene varios años trabajando ahí y aunque es pesado, necesita el trabajo para poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hija.
 
Sandra, necesita el préstamo para colocar una tienda de productos para el hogar como granos básicos, azúcar, aceite, etc. en fin todo lo que necesitan las personas de su comunidad.
 
Sandra, desea que en el futuro su negocio sea un éxito y le dé una buena rentabilidad, para poder mantener a su hija y darle siempre lo mejor.
texts.en:
Sandra is a 22-year-old young woman. She is a single mother and lives with her parents and her little daughter. Her parents help care for her daughter while she works.

Sandra is emplyed at a business which sells home products in the capital, and she travels every day to get to work. She has been working there for several years even though it is tiring. She needs the work in order to give a better quality of life to her daughter.

Sandra needs this loan to open a store with home products such as basic grains, sugar, oil, etc., and everything else that the people of her community need.

Sandra hopes that in the future, her business is a great success and has a high profitability, so that she may support her daughter and always give her the best.

loans.use: to open a store with home products such as basic grains, sugar, oil, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 28 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee un taller de estructuras metalicas desde hace 15 años, elabora puertas, balcones, rejas entre otros, tiene mucha clientela y con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra salir adelante, el joven vive en casa propia con su madre, su esposa y su hija, el solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hierro, metal, herramienta etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
The young man, whose face has been blurred in the photo because he is 28 years old and lives in a high-risk area, owns a metal shop. 

For the past 15 years, he has been making doors, balconies, and grilles, among other structures. He has a wide customer base, and with what he makes, he manages to get ahead.

This young man lives in his own home with his mother, his wife, and their daughter. 

He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase iron, other metals, tools, and the like so that he can obtain a better income.

loans.use: to buy iron, other metals, tools, and the like.

loans.name: Gilma Leticia

texts.es: Gilma de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee un taller de costura ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace 15 años el cual inicio con cpaital propio, posee muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza la ropa, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Gilma está solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos, agujas, variedad de tela, botones, elásticos, etc. y así poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Gilma is 39 years old and lives in her own house with her family. She has had a sewing workshop, located in the city where she lives for 15 years. She started the business with her own capital. She has many clients because of the quality of the clothing she makes. With what she earns from her work, she succeeds in covering some of the household expenses.

Gilma is requesting a loan to buy thread, needles, a variety of fabric, buttons, elastic, etc. Thus, she will be able to continue with her work, which generates good earnings for her.

loans.use: to buy thread, needles, a variety of fabric, buttons, elastic, etc.

loans.name: Maria Santana

texts.es: maria vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica al cultivo de maiz y platano desde hace varios años, vende sus productos en los alrededores de la zona y ya tiene clientes establecidos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de insumos agricolas para el cultivo de maiz y asi poder tener una buena cosecha y mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Maria lives in her own house with her family. She has been dedicated to growing corn and bananas for many years. She sells her products in the neighboring areas and already has many established clients. With what she earns from her sales, she succeeds in covering some of the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies for her corn crop. Thus, she will be able to have a good harvest and a better income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her corn crop.

loans.name: Isabel Teresita

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Buenas Amigas se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Isabel, tiene 62 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos mayores de edad,  uno de ellos  aun vive con ella. Su esposo trabaja en una fábrica en Manta.
Doña Isabel es una mujer que le gusta de alguna forma colaborar con los gastos que genera el hogar, ella para obtener sus recursos desde hace mas de 10 años se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo, zapatos, sobrecamas, edredones, entre otras cosas, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, ella  deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días, de esta forma ella logra obtener sus propios recursos que le ayudan a salir adelante, ella está muy agradecida con la fundación ya que les da la oportunidad de los créditos para poder financiar su negocio.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: ropa, zapatos,  sabanas, edredones y todo de lo que ella vende. Lleva más de 3 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por los servicios que les ofrece la institución. Sus sueños es ir mejorando su vida y su negocio.
texts.en:
The Buenas Amigas Credit Group meets every 15 days in the canton of Montecristi, known for its rich precolonial culture and its handicrafts, where are recognized at the national and international level. This is the home of the famous straw hats (Panamanian hats).

This is where Señora Isabel lives. She is 62 years old, she is married, and she has 3 grown children from this relationship, one of which still lives with her. Her husband works in a factory in Manta.

Doña Isabel is a woman who likes to help out with household expenses in some way. She has been working in sales for the last 10 years in order to make money. She sells all types of clothing, shoes, bedspreads and quilts, among other things. She sells door to door and also from her home to her best known clients. She sells on credit and collects every 15 days. This is how she is able to have her own income that helps her get by. She is very thankful to the foundation for giving her the opportunity to get loans to finance her business. 

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise such as: clothing, shoes, sheets, bedspreads, and everything else that she sells. She has been in the Grupo De Crédito for more than three years and she likes it because of the services the institution offers. Her dream is to improve her life and her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, sheets, quilts, etc.

loans.name: Clara Luz

texts.es: Clara es una mujer de 50 años de edad que todos los días se despierta desde muy temprano para preparar los ingredientes necesarios para su negocio de venta de comida la cual realiza en una zona de mucha afluencia de personas. Clara en su vivienda habita junto a sus 2 hijas de 20 y 17 años de edad, además de su esposo, por lo que se siente feliz de poder brindarles un lugar donde vivir. Clara desea ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: tomates, cebollas, chile verde, pollo, carne, pescado, chicharrón para su venta de comida y pupusas.
texts.en: Clara is a 50-year-old woman who gets up very early every day to prepare the necessary ingredients for her business selling food, which she does in an area where there are a lot of people. Clara lives in her house with her two daughters, aged 17 and 20, as well as her husband, so she feels happy to be able to provide them with a place to live. Clara wants to offer her customers a greater variety of products, so she is asking FUSAI for a loan in order to invest in tomatoes, onions, green chiles, chicken, meat, fish, and pork cracklings for her sales of food and pupusas.

loans.use: to invest in tomatoes, onions, green chiles, chicken, meat, fish, and pork cracklings for her sales of food and pupusas

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 27 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee un taller de estructuras metalicas desde hace mas de 3 años, su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes por su buen trabajo, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de hierro, metal, herramienta etc. y así poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: The young person with his face blurred due to being 27 years old and living in a high risk zone, has had a metal structure shop since over three years ago. His business is located in his place of residence and he has many customers due to his good work. He is requesting a loan to buy iron, metal, tools, etc., and in that way be able to continue with his work since that is his only source of income.

loans.use: to buy iron, metal, tools, etc.

loans.name: Felicito

texts.es: Don felicito de 53 años de edad se dedica desde hace 25 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su esposa en casa propia, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Felicito, 53 years old, has been a farmer for 25 years. He grows corn and beans. He sells his products at the various markets that are near his house. He lives with his spouse in his own house. He is asking for a loan in order to buy seed, fertilizer, manure, pest control, etc. and to improve the land, which is shown in the photograph, in order to be able to continue with his work and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, manure, pest control, etc. and to improve the land

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es: El señor Vicente es casado tiene dos hijos mayores de 28 años  y 22 años, vive en alquiler y ya tiene nietos, cuenta con un negocio de elaboración de maquinaria industrial que recién pudo instalar en la ciudad de El Alto, después de haber trabajado en la planta de Francesa (elaboración de pan ) como asistente mecánico industrial, el señor Vicente requiere un préstamo para comprar componentes, puesto que el realiza operaciones avanzadas como elaboración de circuitos y programación de secuencias con materiales simples y que por lo general necesitan de una gran inversión, como se ve en la fotografía, su ingenio  le ayudo a desarrollar maquinas con  de embalaje automático, maquinas de cortado y separación de productos además de hornos de alta temperatura con sensores. la esposa también le ayuda con esta labor con el control y prueba de las maquinas y hasta ahora sus maquinas no presentaron ninguna clase de fallas al ser el mejor muy requerido en la pequeña industria de la cuidad de el alto.
texts.en:
Mr. Vicente is married and has two older children, who are 28 and 22 years old. He lives in a rental and already has grandchildren. He has an industrial production business, that he recently was able to start in the city of El Alta, after having worked in the factory (making bread) as an assistant industrial mechanic.

Mr. Vicente requires a loan to buy components, since he does advanced operations, such as making circuits and programming sequences with simple materials. In general, these activities require a big investment.

As you can see in the photograph, his ingenuity helps him to develop machines with automatic packaging, machines to cut and separate products, and high-temperature ovens with sensors. His wife also helps him with this work, by working on the control and testing machines. Up till now, their machines don't have any faults, and they are known as the best and are in the highest demand in the small industry in the city of El Alto.

loans.use: to grow and improve his packing, cutting, and separating machinery and to buy assembly materials so that he can improve his family's income.

loans.name: Rober Antonio

texts.es:
Rober es un hombre soltero con 29 años de edad, trabajador y muy humilde, la adversidad que lo ha perseguido no ha sido obstáculo para querer continuar con sus sueños y metas.
Se dedica a la cría y venta de ganado, lo hace todos los dias durante 3 horas diarias.

Trabaja con el propósito de algún día tener su casa propia.
Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de los materiales necesarios para la construcción de nuevos corrales para cerdos.

Su actitud positiva y los deseos de progresar permiten ver, en este hombre,  unas ganas inmensas de superarse y por supuesto una respuesta favorable a su petición.
texts.en:
Rober is a single, 29-year-old man who is hardworking and very humble. The adversity that has pursued him has not been an obstacle to wanting to continue on with his dreams and goals. He makes a living raising and selling livestock, doing it every day for three hours a day. He works with the goal of one day having his own house.

He is requesting a loan which he will invest in the purchase of the necessary materials for the construction of new pigpens. His positive attitude and desire to progress allow the immense desires to get ahead and, of course, to get a favorable response to his request, to be seen in this man.

loans.use: to buy materials for the construction of a pigpen.

loans.name: Albey De Jesus

texts.en:
Albey is 40 years old and lives in the municipality of Amaga. He has one little son who is only five years old. He lives with him and his partner. He loves his family very much and for that has a big responsibility for them, to support them and give them everything so they can have a good quality of life. For this reason, he wants to start his own business. He wants to raise pigs so he can sell them later.

Right now he’s focused on starting with the right focus in his business. He takes this very seriously because he’s aware it can be the answer to his family needs. He has the knowledge thanks to his father and he wants to benefit from that. He’s asking for a loan so he can start his business and buy some pigs, food for them and some vaccines that they need.

Albey has many dreams, one of which is seeing his new business succeed and let him support his family. He also has been dreaming of buying a house to give his family a home where they can have a good life. You can help this devoted father to accomplish all his dreams with just a loan.

loans.use: to start his business and buy some pigs, food for them and some vaccines that they need.

loans.name: Armando

texts.pt:
O senhor Armando de 43 anos de idade   é trabalhada  como auxiliar de oficina, casado pai de 8 filhos 1 1 que frequenta o ensino primário, 4 no ensino secundário 3 já maiores  de idade vive na casa de seus pais e sustenta também os mesmos.
Diz que com este crédito irá comprar uma moto-cerra para a sua carpintaria. 
O seu sonho é adquirir um espaco construir casas para seus filhos forma-los.
Tem como desafios financeiros tem  estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as mesmas e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Armando is 43 years old. He is an office assistant and he is married with 8 children, 1 in grade school, 4 in high school and 3 older children. He lives in his parent's house who he also supports.
He will use this loan to buy a chainsaw to use in his woodworking business. 
His dream is to find his own place to build a home for his children.
He struggles financially, but he is determined to work and he wants to ask for more loans to cover his needs and reach his deams.

loans.use: to buy a chainsaw

loans.name: Aurora

texts.pt:
A senhora Aurora de 43 anos de idade   trabalha como operária agrícola, é mãe solteira de 3 filhos dos quais 01 frequenta o ensino  secundário 2 já maiores de idade , vive em casa própria.
Diz que com este crédito irá comprar portas, janelas, cimento e pagar mão de obra para dar continuidade a construção da sua casa .
O seu sonho é terminar a obra, mobilar,  fazer uma mercearia com capacidade de fornecer todo o seu bairro.
Tem como desafios financeiros tem  estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as mesmas e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Aurora is 43 years old. She is a farm worker and she is a single mother of three children, 1 of them in high school and the other 2 older children. She lives in a house that she owns.
She will use this loan to buy doors, windows and cement, and also to pay for manual labor to continue building her home.
Her dream is to finish the works, furnish the house and build a grocery store with capacity to provide items for the whole neighborhood.
She struggles financially, but she is determined to work and she wants to ask for more loans to cover her needs and reach her dreams.

loans.use: to buy doors, windows and cement, and also to pay for manual labor

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Don Miguel de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, el se dedica al cultivo de granos basicos desde hace 31 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Miguel, 55 years old, lives in his own house with his wife. He has grown staple grains for 31 years. He sells his products in the various markets that are near his house. He is asking for the loan in order to buy seed, fertilizer, manure, pest control, etc. and to improve the land, which is shown in the photograph, in order to be able to continue with his work and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, manure, pest control, etc., and to improve the land

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cattle, feed, and vitamins to improve his sales and to continue supporting his daughters in their higher education

loans.name: Zoila Magdalena

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito Buenas Amigas se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Zoila, tiene 55 años de edad, hace algunos años su esposo falleció y quedo viuda pero de esta relación tuvo cinco hijos  mayores de edad, una aun vive con ella.
Doña Zoila es una mujer que le toca trabajar muy duro para salir adelante, ella se dedica a la venta de pescado,  todos los días en la madrugada se va hasta las playas de Manta, allí  compra el mejor pescado  a los pescadores que llegan hasta el lugar y luego se desplaza a Picoaza, Los Bajos y otros lugares dentro de la localidad  vendiendo el pescado, ya sea pescado por libras o pequeños, ella se traslada en  su propio carro y ya son más de 20 años dedicada a esta actividad la cual le ha permitido ganar mucha clientela con el paso de los años.
Este crédito es para comprar pescado. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho, ella agradece a las personas que la apoyan con los créditos ya que es así como puede seguir en su negocio. Sus sueños son tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The Buenas Amigas Credit Group meets every 15 days in the canton of Montecristi. It is known for its rich precolonial culture and its handicrafts, which are recognized at the national and international level. This is the home of the famous straw hat (Panamanian hats).

This is where Señora Zoila lives. She is 55 years old. Her husband passed away a few years ago and she became a widow. She had five children from this relationship, one of which still lives with her.

Doña Zoila is a woman who has had to work very hard to get by. She makes a living selling fish. Everyday at dawn she goes to the Manta beaches, where she buys the best fish from the fishermen there and then she goes to Picoaza, Los Bajos, and other places in town selling fish by pound or whole. She travels in her own car. She has worked in this field for more than 20 years and it has allowed her to find many customers over the years.

This loan is to buy fish. She has been a part of the Grupo De Crédito from the beginning and she likes it because the loans help her a lot. She is thankful to the people who support her with these loans, allowing her to continue her business. Her dream is to be in good health.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Claudia Elena

texts.es: Claudia de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hija, ella se dedica a vender huevos en las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace 3 años con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar solventar los gastos de su hogar, tiene mucha clientela pues su producto es muy vendible y lo da  a un precio muy accesible ella quiere acrecentar su negocio comprando huevos al por mayor, por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo antes mencionado y así obtener mejores ganancias y poderle dar a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Claudia, 49 years old, lives in her own home with her life partner and their daughter. She has worked selling eggs to the different communities near her place of residence for three years. With the earnings that she obtains from her sales, she is able to settle the expenses of her home. She has a lot of customers since her product is very sellable and she gives it at a very accessible price. She wants to increase her business buying wholesale eggs. That is why she requests a loan that will allow her to buy the previously mentioned, and in that way obtain better earnings and be able to give her family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy cartons of wholesale eggs.

loans.name: Angela María

texts.es:
En la calle San Eduardo vía a Santa Ana, en la ciudad de Portoviejo, conocida como la Ciudad de Los Reales Tamarindos desde épocas coloniales se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito 16 de Julio.
En este lugar vive la señora Ángela, tiene 25 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tiene un hijo de 7 años de edad, el mismo que estudia en escuela. Su esposo es cerrajero.
Doña Ángela se dedica a la venta de productos de  Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta ella sale tres o cuatro veces por semana a vender sus productos los mismos que deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días, tiene mucha clientela a pesar de que recién lleva un año dedicada a estas ventas lo cual le deja muy buenos ingresos que le ayudan a salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar perfumes, cremas, bisuterías sobretodo productos de ofertas que es lo que más ganancias le dejan. Lleva 3 ciclos en el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y de mucha ayuda. Sus sueños seguir mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
On San Eduardo Street on the way to Santa Ana, in the city of Portoviejo, known as the Ciudad de Los Reales Tamarindos since colonial times, the Credit Group "July 16" meets every 15 days.

This is where Señora Angela lives. She is 25 years old, lives in a common law marriage, and has one 7 year old son from this relationship. He is in school. Her husband is a locksmith.

Doña Angela makes a living selling Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and accessories for women). She sells door to door. She goes out 3 or 4 times a week to sell her product. She sells them on credit and collects 8 days later. She has many customers despite only working in this field for a year. This business gives her a good income and helps her to get by.

She will use this loan to buy perfumes, creams, costume jewelry, and products that are on sale which will give her the largest profit. She has been in the Grupo De Crédito for 3 cycles and she likes it because the loans are fast and help her a lot. Her dream is to continue improving her business.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Wendi Cristina

texts.es: Wendi de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, calzado y cosmeticos desde hace 15 años, su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia en una zona muy transitada con las ganancis que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas mercaderia por mayor para poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Wendi, 33 years old, lives in her own home with her two children. She has worked selling clothing, shoes, and cosmetics for 15 years. Her business is located near her place of residence in a zone that is well-traveled. With the earnings that she obtains she is able to settle some expenses of her home. She is requesting a loan to buy more wholesale merchandise in order to have better income.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en:
Isabel wants to thank dear lenders for the monetary support they’ve provided. She was able to buy additional products for her variety store resulting in a sales increase. Isabel has been managing the business for five years already, with the help of her husband, Jose.

Since Isabel loves to cook; she took advantage of that, as she also sells food for breakfast. She has one table and an umbrella as a protection against sunlight and rain.

Competition in the same business line became a challenge for her, as other stores have complete items to sell and the store itself is very appealing.

Despite of some challenges in the business, Isabel is not running out of courage since she has her children to support. However, she knows that she has God as her greatest foundation. She believes that the Center for Community Transformation (CCT), Kiva and all of the lenders are God’s, sent to help entrepreneurs who lack supporting capital for their business.

With this, since she is planning to add more products for her business, Isabel wants to buy grocery items for her variety store and ingredients to be used daily for her mini-food stall. That’s why she applied for another loan of P12, 000.

Isabel regularly meets with her co-fellowship members to share her life’s testimony, experience on the business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and listen to the Word of God. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 members. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social relationship with other partners, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy grocery items for her variety store and ingredients to be used daily for her mini-food stall.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria is 66 years old, married, with 5 adult age children. She lives in Ozamiz City where she operates a convenience store. This business venture gives her a monthly net income of PHP 6,000.00 that sufficiently meets her needs and those of her husband. Gloria is an active member of Paglaum MPC and actively participates in various educational trainings like Financial Literacy Training. This time, she applies for a loan to restock her store with consumable goods like canned goods, noodles, milk, sugar, coffee and others.

loans.use: to restock her store with consumable goods like canned goods, noodles, milk, sugar, coffee and others

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en: Julieta has switched from selling snacks to selling "longganisa" (processed meat). Her business is doing well since she doubled her time perfecting her own "longganisa" recipe. With her husband's help, she has maximized her profits and keeps pursuing her goals for the good of her family. She requests another loan from PMPC to buy more kilos of meat for her "longganisa" business. Today, Julieta is able to help others do retail business selling her "longganisa" and they earned for their own families as well.

loans.use: to buy more meat for her "longganisa" business

loans.name: Neilen

texts.en:
Neilen is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Neilen is 37 years old and has three children who are in school.

Neilen has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines. Neilen requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy spare parts, and to do other maintenance for her business.

Neilen has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and to do other maintenance for her business.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 66 years old, widowed woman with nine children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Teresita has a general store business in the Philippines. Teresita requested a PHP 24,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Teresita has been in this business for five years. In the future, Teresita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en: Harriet, a 47-year-old woman, is married with six children, living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She has a retail shop and she is a very hardworking woman. She has stayed in this business for a long time and has managed it well. She is, however, limited by capital and seasonal factors. She hopes to have all her children educated. She intends to use the loan to buy merchandise such as bread, sugar and cooking oil among other items to sell. She used the first loan to restock her retail shop with the same items. She sold to her customers and made good profits.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as bread, sugar and cooking oil among other things to sell.

loans.name: Dairo Francisco

texts.en:
Dairo is 30 years and lives in the municipality of Sahagun. Since 2009 this man has been running a business raising fish, something that some years ago, his brother taught him how to do. Now he has his own business that allows him to help in his house and improve his quality of life.

He wants to be more competitive in the market and see his business last in time, so he can assure his family support for many years. The sales are very important too as they are what makes the business a success. He asked for a loan so he can improve his business by paying for an excavation, the workers and some food for the fishes.

Dairo has many dreams; among them, there’s one that he really wants, and it’s fixing the house where his family lives, because it has some problems and they don’t have the money to repair them. You can help Dairo to accomplish his dreams with just a loan.

loans.use: to improve his business by paying for an excavation, the workers and some food for the fishes.

loans.name: Madalena

texts.en:
A $ 1500 loan is offered to Madalena to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day.

She will buy some additional supplies such as noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, water, Fanta, Coca-Cola, Sagiko, beer, coffee, biscuits and soap oils.

She has been involving herself in business activities since 2002. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Madalena independent, because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, water, Fanta, Coca-Cola, Sagiko, beer, coffee, biscuits and soap oils.

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es: Don Francisco de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa,el se dedica desde hace 20 años a la agricultura al cultivo de granos basicos, cuando ya está su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Francisco is 53 years old and lives in his own home with his wife.

For the past 20 years, he has been earning a living in agriculture, growing basic grains. When his harvest is ready, he goes to the neighbouring towns to sell it. He already has a wide customer base.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, inorganic and organic fertilizers, pest-control products, herbicides, and the like to be able to continue growing his crops and, thus, have a better income as this is his only source of employment.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, inorganic and organic fertilizers, pest-control products, herbicides, and the like.

loans.name: Abel

texts.pt:
O senhor Abel de 37 anos de idade   é professor,  casado,  pai de 2 filhos dos quais 1 frequenta o ensino primário,  1 ainda sem idade escolar vive em casa própria.
Diz que com o valor do empréstimo ira comprar chapas de zinco, varões, cimento, barrotes areia, pedra, arames ,pregos para dar continuidade da sua obra .
O seu sonho é terminar a obra, mobilar para oferecer um lar melhor  a sua família, fazer um muro de vedação oficializar sua relação casando se graduar e crescer profissionalmente .
Tem como desafios financeiros tem  estado a trabalhar, e quer fazer negocio para reforçar a renda familiar e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos com os empréstimos anteriores adquiriu o espaço, iniciou a construção e fez uma casa de banho melhorada.
texts.en:
Abel is 37 years old. He is a professor, married with 2 children, a small child and a child going to grade school. He lives in a house that he owns.
He will use this loan to buy zinc roofing sheets, rods, cement, beams, stone, sand and nails to continue building his home.
His dream is to finish the works, furnish the house and provide a better place for her family to live. Build a brick fence and get officially married. He wants to graduate and grow professionally.
He struggles financially, but he is determined to work and he also wants to set up a business that can help him increase his rent. He will also ask for future loans to cover his needs and reach is goals.  He bought a place with his previous loans and he began construction of the house and he improved the water closet conditions.

loans.use: to buy zinc roofing sheets, rods, cement, beams, stone, sand and nails to continue building his home

loans.name: Jose Napoleon

texts.es: Don Jose de 53 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto con su esposa en casa propia, se dedica a ser agricultora su principal siembra es el maiz y frijol. el desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito el cual le permita comprar: abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas, entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Don Jose is 53 years old. He is a very responsible man regarding his home obligations, and has always been known for giving his family the best he can. He currently lives with his wife in his own home. He makes a living as a farmer, his main crops being corn and beans. He wants to increase his sales, which is why he is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan. This will allow him to buy: compost, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, and other things. He hopes he can count on the help he is requesting, because he has no other monetary income. This way he can continue feeding his family without limitations.

loans.use: to buy: compost, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, and other things.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en: Virginia believes education is a key to success in life. She wants to see her grandchildren finish their college studies. She wants her grandchildren to earn a degree and become successful citizens. With the loan of Php 22,000, she will be able to pay for the tuition and school fees of her granddaughter.

loans.use: to pay for tuition and school fees

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn has owned and managed her farm for almost 15 years. And the good news is that she's earning well. She was able to pay back her previous loan and now she requests another loan to pay for farm labor and to purchase fertilizer for her farm in order to be able to produce a good quality product and deliver it in the market and to her loyal customers. In the future, Jocelyn wants to have her own ricemill.

loans.use: to pay for farm labor and purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Minviluz

texts.en:
Minviluz is 61 years old and married with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Minviluz has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more stock of rice to sell.

Minviluz has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice to sell.

loans.name: Rogevie

texts.en:
Rogevie is a 21-year-old, married mother of one child.

Rogevie is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Rogevie requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Rogevie has been in this business for 3 years now and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rogevie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a 34-year-old father of five children who lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He deals in buying and selling cocoa and has gotten additional income from his cocoa garden for 15 years now. He works hard and has plans to educate his children, buy land and expand his cocoa growing to make more profits. His main challenges are price changes, expensive labor and inadequate capital to sustain the business. He is requesting a loan to buy cocoa to sell to cocoa companies. He hopes to become a leading cocoa supplier in his area.

loans.use: to buy cocoa for resale to cocoa buying companies.

loans.name: Jhon Jairo

texts.es: Jhon es un joven microempresario de 23 años que heredó de su padre esta profesión, un tendero por tradición y en su negocio de tienda de víveres se ha consolidado en el sector donde reside al sur de Barranquilla por su amplio surtido y variedad. Aunque su experiencia es muy amplia, en su propio negocio apenas cuenta con dos años de funcionamiento, sin embargo ha ofrecido bienestar a su cónyuge e hijo por su esfuerzo y compromiso diario, puesto que labora 15 horas diarias  a partir de las 6 a.m. hasta las 9 a.m. para que sus clientes tengan la oportunidad de realizar sus compras de productos que hacen parte de la canasta familia.  Jhon está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir surtido de víveres; legumbres, arroz, aceite, carne, pollo, entre otros con la finalidad de que sus clientes encuentren todo en un mismo lugar. Jhon desea tener un stock con el que pueda responder oportunamente a la demanda.  Su meta a corto plazo será duplicar sus ventas y a futuro comprar su vivienda.
texts.en: Jhon is a young 23-year-old microentrepreneur who inherited this profession from his father, a shopkeeper by profession, and due to his ample stock and variety he has established himself in his grocery store business in the area where he lives in the south of Barranquilla. Although his experience is very extensive, he has been in business for himself for barely two years. Nevertheless, he has offered comfort to his partner and son through his daily effort and commitment, since he works 15 hours a day from 6 a.m. until 9 p.m. so that his customers have the opportunity to purchase staple goods. Jhon is applying for his first Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo in order to stock food; legumes, rice, oil, meat, and chicken, among others, with the goal that his customers will find everything at the same place. Jhon wants to have a stock with which he can respond to demand in a timely way. His short-term goal is to double his sales and in the future buy his house.

loans.use: to stock food; legumes, rice, oil, meat, and chicken, among others

loans.name: Zosima

texts.en:
Zosima is a 49-year-old, married mother of two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Zosima has a scrap buying business in the Philippines. Zosima requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more scrap to sell.

Zosima has been in this business for 25 years. In the future, Zosima would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more scrap to sell

loans.name: Edmond

texts.en: Edmond is thirty years old and lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He deals in cocoa, mainly buying and selling, and earns additional income from poultry farming. He started the business in 2014 mainly to get income although challenged by increasing transport costs and limited capital. He wants to expand and sell to more cocoa agents in the future. Edmond has requested a loan of two million UGX to buy more cocoa to sell. He works hard to ensure that he is able to achieve his dream of building a permanent house.

loans.use: to buy cocoa for resale.

loans.name: Ruth Mariela

texts.es:
Ruth es una mujer de carácter dulce y servicial, ella descubrió vocación siendo comerciante, supo combinar esto con su trabajo de madre de dos pequeños. Su esposo ha sido un gran apoyo para su pulpería. Ella lleva un par de años en este negocio, ahorrando y sabiendo invertir ha logrado prosperar.    
En estos momentos, ella ha recurrido a Kiva y MiCrédito, para que se le otorgue un préstamo que le permita invertir para comprar productos como jabones líquidos, detergente, comida enlatada y otros, que todavía no oferta en su negocio. En un futuro desea hacer de su pulpería una distribuidora importante de su pueblo, además de invertir en otros negocios. Su principal meta es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Ruth is a woman of sweet and helpful character. She discovered her calling being a businesswoman. She knew how to combine this with her work as a mother of two small children. Her husband has been a great support for her grocery store. She has had this business for a few years. Saving and knowing how to invest, she has achieved prosperity.

Now she has turned to Kiva and MiCrédito to grant her a loan that will allow her to invest in buying products such as liquid soaps, detergent, canned food, and other items that she still does not offer in her business. In the future she wants to make her grocery store an important distributor in her town, and also invest in other businesses. Her main goal is to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy products such as liquid soap, detergent, canned food, and other items.

loans.name: Maria Ines

texts.es:
Inés, es madre de tres hijos, estudio hasta noveno grado, porque su familia era de muy escasos recursos economicos, está casada y su esposo es jornalero y trabaja en la agricultura; actualmente sus hijos están estudiando y son los únicos que dependen económicamente de ellos.

Inés, tiene experiencia en el área agrícola, sus padres le enseñaron a trabajar desde que era muy joven, para que aprendiera a ser independiente y responsable, actualmente solo se dedica a ayudarle a su esposo con sus cultivos y les enseña a sus hijos para que aprendan a cultivar también; el lugar donde ellos trabajan se encuentra a tres kilómetros de su vivienda aproximadamente y se desplazan a pie o en caballo, en algunas ocasiones las jornadas de trabajo se hacen por la mañana.

Inés, necesita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes como sulfato y formula para obtener un mayor rendimiento en su milpa y ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, principalmente por el alto costo de la vida.

Inés, sueña con poder tener una casa más grande, porque donde actualmente vive es bien pequeño para su familia.- También sueña con ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales y que logren lo que ella no pudo lograr.
texts.en:
Inés is the mother of three children. She studied through ninth grade, because her family had very few financial resources. She is married and her husband is a day laborer and works in agriculture. Currently her children are students and they are the only ones who depend on them financially.

Inés has experience in farming. Her parents taught her to work from the time she was very young so that she would learn to be independent and responsible. Currently she only helps her husband with his crops and teaches her children so that they learn to grow crops too. The place where they work is approximately three kilometers from her house and they travel there on foot or on a horse. Sometimes they do their work in the morning.

Inés needs the loan in order to buy fertilizers such as sulfate and formula in order to obtain a better yield on her parcel of land and help her husband with the household expenses, mainly because of the high cost of living.

Inés dreams of being able to have a bigger house, because where she currently lives is pretty small for her family. She also dreams of seeing her children become professionals and that they achieve something she could not.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers such as sulfate and formula

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
Catalina is a 61-year-old housewife who, together with her husband Valentino, 58, work hard despite their age to support the education of their 3 children.  Her source of income is a "sari-sari" or general store where she has been selling household products for 8 years. However, with the increasing cost of education, she needs to augment her income. She needs additional capital to buy goods like rice, groceries, and toiletries for the store.  A loan of PHP 10,000 will go a long way to fill her store with these items. Catalina will be truly grateful if you could be part of fulfilling her dream of seeing her children finish their studies.

All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans. Catalina meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the word of God.

loans.use: To buy rice, groceries, toiletries, and other goods needed for her general store

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose, from Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental, is 64 years old and married with five adult-age children.

He is a copra buyer and at the same time has a copra production business. His business has existed for more than 20 years and has been assisted financially by Paglaum MPC. Recently, he asked for a loan to buy coconut for copra production.

loans.use: to buy coconut for copra production

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.en:
Alejandra is 49 years old and has nine children. Alejandra is married and has one child in school.

Alejandra is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Alejandra requested a PHP 14000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Alejandra has been in this business for 5 years, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Alejandra would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.es: Oswaldo tiene 48 años de edad y vive con su esposa y su hijo en casa propia, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, desde hace 20 años su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia y tiene mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar cada día su labor, ya tiene mucha clientela pues lo buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, por los precios accesibles pero sobre todo porque siempre realiza el trabajo al gusto del cliente; el solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hierro, metal, herramienta etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Oswaldo is 48 years old and lives with his wife and son in his own house. He has had a metal structure workshop for 20 years. His business is located near his place of residence and he has a lot of experience that helps him to improve his work every day. He already has a lot of customers since they seek him out because of the quality of his work and the accessible prices but above all because he always does the work to the customer's taste. He is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy iron, metal, tools, etc. and in this way have a better income.

loans.use: to buy iron, metal, tools, etc.

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita from Ozamiz City is 69 years old and is a widow with four children of adult age.

She is a pensioner member of Paglaum MPC where she had availed loans that she successfully paid.

Currently, she avails a loan to pay for a medical check up and purchase maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to pay for a medical check up and purchase maintenance medicines.

loans.name: Winnie

texts.en:
Winnie is 58 years old and a retired bank employee. He is married with five children of adult age. All his children have graduated college.

His younger daughter wants to work abroad and needs a placement fee. Winnie asks for a loan from Paglaum MPC where he is an active member of the said cooperative.

loans.use: to pay the placement fee for his daughter.

loans.name: Reina Paz

texts.en:
Reina Paz is 52 years old and lives in Rizal, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children now at their adult and school age.

Reina Paz has engaged in the hog fattening activity for three years already. She also has support from her husband who is an agriculturist. She earns approximately PHP2,500 each month from this activity.

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing feed and vitamins for her hog raising activity.
Reina Paz has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Reina Paz hopes to expand her hog fattening business.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Denia

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, Denia works hard to support her family.

She has a business farming rice in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Denia is borrowing PHP 26,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of fertilizers and other farm supplies for her business farming rice.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Denia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Javier Antonio

texts.es: Javier, tiene 32 años de edad, es soltero, actualmente vive solo pero tiene un hijo y reside en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Barbara. Hace 6 años se dedica a la agricultura con la producción de maíz y frijol, con esta actividad obtiene ingresos para la manutención de su hijo. Este cultivo lo realiza en una propiedad en zona productora y la producción la vende en el mercado local. Anteriormente se dedicaba a la construcción como maestro de obra. Ha invertido ya 2 préstamos anteriores a su cultivo y con este actual es el tercer ciclo el cual es por 11,000 Lempiras para dar mantenimiento y seguir comprando abono y limpieza a su cultivo para mejorar la cosecha. Su meta es tener siempre la producción y vivir de su cultivo y seguir creciendo, que gracias al crédito tendrá oportunidades de superarse.
texts.en: Javier is 32 years old. He is single. Currently he lives alone, but he has a son and he lives in the municipality of Azacualpa, Santa Barbara. Six years ago he started working in farming, producing corn and beans. With this work he obtains income for child support for his son. He grows these crops on a property in a productive area and he sells the produce in the local market. Previously he worked in construction as a foreman. He has already invested 2 previous loans in his crops and with this current one it is the third cycle. This one is for 11,000 lempiras to perform maintenance and continue buying manure and weeding his crops in order to improve the harvest. His goal is to always have the crop and to live on his crops and to continue growing, since thanks to the loan he will have opportunities to better himself.

loans.use: to buy manure and weed the corn and bean crop

loans.name: Nerly

texts.en:
Nerly is 52 years old. She is married and has three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Nerly has a general store business in the Philippines. Nerly requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Nerly has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Nerly would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Ami

texts.fr: Mère  de deux enfants, Ami est une femme mariée résidant à Tokoin. Agée de39 ans, Ami produit et vend des gâteaux et des biscuits faite à base de la farine de blé et s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché. Ami vend ses marchandises en circulant les quartiers environnant et à  domicile. Ami sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des sacs de farine de blé, de l’huile et du sucre en vue d’en fabriquer plus de gâteaux et de biscuits afin de répondre favorablement aux attentes de ses clients puis soutenir son mari à bien s’occuper de leurs enfants.
texts.en:
The mother of two, Ami is married and residing in Tokoin. She is 39 years old, and she produces and sells cakes and cookies made from wheat flour. She gets her supplies four times a month at the market. She sells her merchandise at her home and by going through nearby neighborhoods.

Ami is requesting this loan to purchase sacks of wheat flour, oil, and sugar with the aim of producing more cakes and cookies, so as to respond favorably to the expectations of her customers, as well as to support husband in caring for their children.

loans.use: to purchase 2 sacks of wheat flour, a container of oil, and a bag of sugar

loans.name: Rene Willian

texts.es: Rene es un hombre trabajador de 42 años de edad que se dedica desde hace 20 años, a prestar sus servicios de reparación de televisores y equipos de sonido,  por ello cuenta con muchos clientes que solicitan sus servicios, por ser de excelente calidad. Rene cuenta con casa propia desde hace 8 años, y en ella vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos una niña de 14 años y un varón de 10 años de edad. Rene ha logrado mantener por muchos años su negocio, y ahora él desea comprar más herramientas y repuestos para ofrecer a sus mejores servicios, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en repuestos y herramientas para mejorar su taller de televisores y equipos de sonido, mejorando sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Rene is a working man, 42 years old, who has for some 20 years, repaired televisions and sound equipment. As a result, he can count on many customers who solicit his services, due to the excellent quality of his work. Rene has owned his own house for the last eight years, and lives there with his life's companion and their two children, a 14-year-old girl and a 10-year-old boy.

Rene has been able to maintain his business for many years, and now he wishes to purchase more tools and replacement parts so he can offer his best services. For that reason, he is requesting a loan through FUSAI to invest in parts and tools to improve his TV and sound equipment repair shop, thereby increasing his earnings.

loans.use: invest in replacement parts and tools to enhance his television and sound equipment repair shop, improving his earnings.

loans.name: Milagro Esperanza

texts.es: Doña Milagro de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija, sus dos nietos y su yerno, ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos desde hace 18 años, su negocio está ubicado en una zona muy transitada por eso posee muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza y con la ayuda de su hija y yerno logran solventar los gastos que se le presentan en el hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de zapatos por mayor para poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Milagro, 58 years old, lives in her own house with her daughter, her two grandchildren, and her son-in-law. She has sold shoes for 18 years. Her business is located in a very busy area, so she has a lot of customers. With her sales and with the help of her daughter and son-in-law, they are able to cover the household expenses. She is asking for a loan to buy wholesale shoes in order to be able to have a better income.

loans.use: to buy wholesale shoes

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita is driven by a passion for selling. At the age of 56, married, living in Ozamiz City, she runs a store that primarily supports her family. Everyday she never tires of tending her store. 

Anecita is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She religiously repaid her obligations without default. This loan will be used to pay for inventories of sugar, milk, oil, and noodles to sell. Having enough inventories translates to income opportunities. In the future, she dreams of sustaining her store to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for inventories of sugar, milk, oil, and noodles to sell

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Nowadays, every average-income Filipino owns a cellphone, and these gadgets are usually loaded every day in very retail amounts to be used for text messages and voice calls.

With this common practice, Sharon thought it wise to engage in the e-loading business and it proved profitable. She does this in a small area of her home where she also sells a few household items in retail, like single sachets of coffee, laundry powder soap, shampoo, and bottles of soda drinks. From this business, she is able to help her husband Roel, a truck driver, to raise their children and support their studies.

However, Sharon believes she can earn more to sustain the family's growing needs if she can have additional capital primarily to pay for cellphone electronic loads and additionally to purchase goods for her small store. She will be very grateful if she could be given a loan of PHP 10,000 for this purpose.

She meets with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and also draw strength and inspiration from her studies of the Word of God. All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for cellphone electronic loads for her e-loading business.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en: Virginia busies herself with her hog growing business. She has mastered this type of business from choosing the right piglet for fattening and for breeding up to selling it with a good market value. This business activity provides for her family needs and is primarily financed by the cooperative where she is an active member. Recently, she asked for a loan from Paglaum MPC to buy additional piglets and animal feed.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and animal feed.

loans.name: Cristie

texts.en:
Cristie is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Cristie is 24 years old and has one child in school.

Cristie has an abacca weaving business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy abaca fiber and other materials needed in her business.

She has been in this business for three years. In the future, Cristie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy abaca fiber and other materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Zenia

texts.en:
Zenia is 38 years old and married. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell.

Zenia has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Julienne

texts.fr: Femme mariée de 65 ans, Julienne est une femme qui habite à Tokoin. Avec deux enfants à sa charge, Julienne est une revendeuse des objets en plastiques. Julienne s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile. Julienne sollicite ce prêt pour commander des douzaines de bassines, d’assiettes et de  sceaux en plastiques en vue de satisfaire parfaitement les attentes de ses clients et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire afin d’aider son mari à subvenir aux charges et besoins quotidiens de ses enfants.
texts.en: Julienne, a 65-year-old married woman, lives in Tokoin with her two children she supports. A retailer of plasticware, she gets her supplies twice a month at the market, and she resells the products in front of her home. Julienne is requesting this loan to order dozens of plastic tubs, plates, and buckets with the aim of satisfying completely the expectations of her customers and realizing a good profit margin, so as to help out her husband in cover the children’s day-to-day needs.

loans.use: to purchase 10 dozen plates, 2 dozen tubs, and 5 dozen buckets

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 43 years old, married, and has two children who are in school.

She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Emma has been in this business for five years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Emma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es:
Esperanza, de 30 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, debido a la secases económica que vivía su familia no continuo; está casada y su esposo se dedica a la reparación de radiadores de vehículo, es madre de 3 hijos, una de ellas ya está casada y dependen económicamente solamente 2 hijos.   

Esperanza, desde hace 5 años se dedica a la venta de ropa, ella aprendió este negocio por medio de una amiga, a quien le ayudaba a vender; pero a aparte de eso también se dedica al destazo de pollos de engorde, esa es otra fuente de ingresos que ella posee; para poder comercializar la ropa se desplaza a los cantones aledaños y camina una distancia promedio de 5 kilometros por día.

Esperanza, necesita el préstamo para comprar más ropa como camisas, pantalones, blusas, short, entre otros,  para diversificar su negocio y tener satisfechos a sus clientes, ella espera aumentar sus ventas y con las ganancias que obtenga, espera mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de su familia.

Esperanza, sueña con poder ayudar a culminar los estudios de su hija y verla convertida en una profesional, ella espera mejorar su negocio y tener un local fijo donde tenga todos sus productos.
texts.en:
Esperanza, 30 years old, studied through third grade. Due to the financial scarcity in which her family lived she did not continue. She is married and her husband repairs vehicle radiators. She is the mother of 3 children. One of them is already married and only 2 children depend on them financially.

For 5 years Esperanza has sold clothing. She learned this work through a friend, who helped her to sell, but apart from that she also cuts up broiler chickens. That is another source of income she has. In order to be able to sell the clothing she travels to surrounding cantons and walks an average distance of 5 kilometers per day.

Esperanza needs the loan in order to buy more clothing such as shirts, pants, blouses, and shorts, among others, to diversify her business and keep her customers satisfied. She hopes to increase her sales, and with the profits she obtains she hopes to improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

Esperanza dreams of being able to help her daughter finish her education and seeing her become a professional. She hopes to improve her business and to have a fixed shop where she has all of her products.

loans.use: to buy more clothing such as shirts, pants, blouses, and shorts, among others.

loans.name: Kadji

texts.fr: Kadji est une femme mariée résidant à Adidogomé avec quatre enfants à charge. Kadji est une revendeuse de charbon de bois qui s’approvisionne cinq  fois par mois au marché et le revend à domicile. Pour financer son achat, Kadji nécessite ce prêt pour commander des sacs de charbon de bois afin réaliser plus de bénéfice et soutenir son mari dans les charges de la famille puis permettre une bonne éducation à leurs enfants.
texts.en: Kadji is a married woman residing in Adidogomé with four children she supports. She is a retailer of charcoal and gets her supplies five times a month at the market. She resell her merchandise at her home. To finance her purchase, Kadji needs this loan to order sacks of charcoal, so as to realize more profit, to support her husband in covering family expenses, and then to allow a good education for their children.

loans.use: to purchase 8 sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 57 years old and married with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more stock of rice to sell.

Marilou has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice to sell.

loans.name: Bernadeth

texts.en:
Bernadeth is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 43 years old and has one child in school.

She has a buy and sell firewood business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more firewood to sell.

Bernadeth has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more firewood to sell

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en:
Jackson is a hard-working married man with 3 children who lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. 

He is a retailer dealing in general merchandise to support and sustain his family. He plans to stabilize his business and family income in the near future but faces challenges of inadequate capital and price fluctuations of the goods he sells.

Jackson is requesting a loan to buy more maize flour, crates of soda, soap, sugar and water to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize flour, crates of soda, soap, sugar, and water to sell

loans.name: Emillana

texts.en:
Emillana is 58 years old. She is married with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Emillana has a fishing business in the Philippines. Emillana requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Emillana has been in this business for five years. In the future, Emillana would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment

loans.name: Ndugu Nipe Shauri B Group

texts.fr: Munda nikure est commerçant qui s’entraide avec son épouse, président du groupe solidaire «Ndugu Nipe Shauri B», client de l’IMF Hekima, marié, âgé de 41 ans, père des 8 enfants, qui 5 sont scolarisés et 3 sont encore gosses. Il est propriétaire d’une boutique, où il vend de divers produits manufacturés sur la route principale de la ville depuis 5 ans. Il va s’approvisionner en sacs de froment, sucre, savon Omo et des huile de table. Il commença son business après récolte dans son champ. Il souhaite acheter une parcelle et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, il remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Munda Nikure is a merchant and the president of the solidarity group “Ndugu Nipe Shauri B”. He and his wife mutually assist one another. A client of the microfinance institution Hekima, he is married, 41 years old, and the father of eight children, of whom five are in school, and three are still very young.

Munda Nikure has been the owner of a shop, where he sells a variety of factory products on a main road in town, for five years. He is going to stock up on sacks of wheat, sugar, Omo soap, and cooking oil. He began his business after harvesting his field. His wish is to purchase a parcel of land and to provide food for his children. In conclusion, he thanks Hekima for its support of unbanked entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to stock up on wheat, sugar, Omo soap, and cooking oil

loans.name: Yocasta Magaly

texts.es:
Yocasta es una joven, con muchas ganas de superación, a sus veintidós años de edad, cursa su quinto y último año de la carrera de Marketing y Publicidad.  Sus padres le han ayudado mucho para que salga adelante. El camino académico no ha sido fácil para ella, pero ha sabido ser perseverante, porque tiene clara su meta, que es  ser una mujer exitosa. 
En este momento crucial para su vida profesional, Yocasta ha decidido recurrir a Kiva y MiCrédito, para que se le otorgue un crédito que le permita pagar los gastos de su forma de culminación de estudios y además pagar un curso de inglés, dado que eso incrementaría sus oportunidades laborales. En un futuro desea entrar al mundo del mercadeo de una empresa de gran renombre para la región centroamericana.
texts.en:
Yocasta is a young person with a lot of desire to overcome. At twenty-two years old, she is in her fifth and last year of the Marketing and Advertising course. Her parents have helped her a lot so that she can move ahead. The academic road has not been easy for her, but she has known how to be persistent because she has a clear goal, which is to be a successful woman.

At this crucial moment for her professional life, Yocasta has decided to turn to Kiva and MiCrédito in order to be given a loan that will allow her to pay the expenses to finish her studies and also to pay for an English course, since that that will increase her work opportunities. In the future, she wants to enter the marketing world of a company famous in Central America.

loans.use: to pay the expenses to finish her studies and also to pay for an English course

loans.name: Hector Antonio

texts.es: Hector de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica al cultivo de granos basicos y flores ornamentales desde hace 15 años, comercializa sus prodcutos en los pueblos aledaños y ya tiene clientes establecidos, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de sacos de abono asi como muestra la fotografia para poder tener un buen cultivo.
texts.en: Hector is 49 years old, and he lives in his own home with his family. He has made a living farming staple grains and ornamental flowers for 15 years. He sells his products in neighboring towns, and he now has an established client base. With the profit that he earns, Hector manages to take care of some of the expenses of his household. He is requesting a loan to buy bags of fertilizer as shown in the photograph in order to be able to have a good harvest.

loans.use: to buy bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in leather, thread, needles, etc., for his shoemaking workshop

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 38 years old. She is married with 2 school-aged children. They live in Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental. She and her husband are balut vendors. After having good sales and saving money, she signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC for access to financial assistance. 

Gina believes that she will earn more if she produces her own balut to sell. Now that she has more customers, she employs her friends as balut vendors. Expanding her business requires additional capital, which she seeks from the cooperative. She requests the amount of PHP 50,000.00 to purchase more eggs for her balut-making business. 

Gina still strives hard to exploit the good fortune she now has and continuously hopes to increase her income so that she can build a decent house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more eggs for balut-making business

loans.name: Ndugu Nipe Shauri A Group

texts.fr: Muhimanyi est commerçant qui s’entraide avec son épouse, secrétaire groupe solidaire «Ndugu Nipe Shauri A», client de l’IMF Hekima, marié, âgé de 30 ans, père des 3 enfants qui sont encore gosses. Il est  propriétaire d’une boutique, où il vend divers produits manufacturés sur la route principale de la ville depuis 5 ans. Il va s’approvisionner en sacs de riz, matelas, sucre savons et des huiles végétales. Ce sont ses parents qui l’avaient aidé pour commencer son activité. Il souhaite acheter une parcelle et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, il remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Muhimanyi is a merchant. He and his wife mutually assist one another. The secretary of the solidarity group “Ndugu Nipe Shauri A”, he is a client of the microfinance institution Hekima, 30 years old, and the father of three children, who are still very young.

Muhimanyi has been the owner of a shop where he sells a variety of commerical products on a main road in town, for five years. He is going to stock up on sacks of rice, mattresses, sugar, soaps, and vegetable oils. His parents had helped him to start his business. His wish is to purchase a parcel of land and to provide food for his children. In conclusion, he thanks Hekima for its support of unbanked entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to stock up on sacks of rice, mattresses, sugar, soaps, and vegetable oils.

loans.name: Richard-

texts.en:
Richard is a 25-year-old, single man living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is currently working with Bundibugyo District Hospital. He deals in human medicine, which he sells in his drug shop to supplement his income. He also earns money from a government salary. He is very hard working and has two drug shops. He hopes to buy land and build a residential house in town.

Richard used the previous loan to buy medicines to sell and now is requesting a loan to buy building materials like sand, cement and bricks to construct a pit latrine.

loans.use: to buy building materials like sand, cement and bricks to construct a pit latrine.

loans.name: Fatima Margarita

texts.es:
Fátima, estudio hasta tercer año de bachillerato, actualmente es madre soltera y tienen un hijo de 5 años de edad que aún no está estudiando, con ella viven su hermana y su hijo y son los únicos que dependen económicamente de ella.   

Fátima, se dedica a la elaboración de pupusas, aprendió este negocio por medio de una amiga a quien le ayudaba a vender anteriormente, pero también se dedica a la venta de licuados, su local de venta lo tiene en su propia casa y en su negocio se involucra su hermana.

Fátima, necesita el préstamo para mejorar su negocio y comprar harina de arroz, maíz, tomate, quesillo, chicharrón y frijoles, sus ganancias aumentarán y con eso pretende mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. 

Fátima, sueña con tener un local de venta en un lugar que sea más comercial, también espera poco a poco ampliar su negocio y generar las suficientes ganancias para poder sacar adelante a su hijo y verlo convertido en un profesional.
texts.en:
Fátima studied through the third year of higher-level secondary school. Currently she is a single mother and has a 5-year-old son who is still not in school. Her sister and her son live with her and are the only ones who depend on her financially.

Fátima makes pupusas. She learned this work through a friend who previously helped her to sell, but she also sells milkshakes. She has her store in her own house and her sister is involved in her business.

Fátima needs the loan in order to improve her business and to buy rice flour, corn, tomato, cheese, pork cracklings, and beans. Her profits will increase and with this she intends to improve her family's living conditions.

Fátima dreams of having a store in a more commercial area. She also hopes to expand her business little by little and generate sufficient profits to be able to move her son ahead and see him become a professional.

loans.use: to improve her business and to buy rice flour, corn, tomato, cheese, pork cracklings, and beans

loans.name: Yesenia Elizabeth

texts.es: Yesenia de 27 años de edad, es madre soltera que vive muy feliz junto a sus 2 hijas de 3 y 8 años de edad. Desde hace mucho tiempo, Yesenia se dedica a la venta de tortillas en su hogar, actividad que realiza en las mañanas y tardes; es así como solventa las necesidades básicas de su familia. Anteriormente, Yesenia solicito un crédito a FUSAI, el cual invirtió en la compra de productos para la elaboración de tortillas y compró una plancha para los días que llueva poder elaborar las tortillas dentro de la vivienda; los resultados fueron positivos porque pudo mejorar sus ingresos y sus clientes aumentaron; por ello su familia están muy agradecidos.
