Nuevamente, Yesenia solicita un crédito a FUSAI para poder continuar invirtiendo en productos para su negocio, de esta forma vaya creciendo poco a poco su negocio. Ella comprará: maíz, cal para la preparación de tortillas.
texts.en: Yesenia, 27 years old, is a single mother who lives very happily with her 2 daughters, who are 3 and 8 years old. Yesenia has sold tortillas in her home for a long time. She does this work in the mornings and afternoons; this is how she covers her family's basic needs. Previously, Yesenia requested a loan from FUSAI, which she used to buy products for making tortillas, and she bought a griddle for days when it rains in order to be able to make tortillas inside the house. The results were positive for her because she was able to improve her income and her customers increased, for which her family is very grateful. Yesenia is again asking FUSAI for a loan in order to be able to continue investing in products for her business. In this way her business will grow bit by bit. She will buy corn and lime for making tortillas.

loans.use: to invest in corn and lime for making tortillas

loans.name: Candelaria Elizabeth

texts.es: Candelaria es una mujer trabajadora de 25 años de edad que se dedica a atender su chalet, el cual está ubicado dentro de un centro escolar, por lo que cuenta con muchos clientes y sus ingresos son constantes, lo que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y mejorar cada día sus condiciones de vida. Candelaria vive en su vivienda que aunque es muy humilde es propia, por lo que se siente feliz, ya que logra brindar estabilidad a sus dos hijos una niña de 5 años y un varón de 3 años de edad, con los que vive también en compañía de su compañero de vida. Candelaria desea surtir más su negocio, ya que cada día sus clientes demandan mayor cantidad de productos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: golosinas, pan dulce, bebidas frías, entre otros productos para surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
Candelaria is a hardworking 25-year-old woman who makes a living managing her chalet. It is located inside a school center, and for this reason she has many customers and a stable source of income. This has enabled her to provide for her household and improve their living conditions everyday. Candelaria lives in a home which, although it is humble, is her own. For this reason, she is happy since she is able to give stability to her two children; a 5-year-old daughter and a 3-year-old son. Her life partner also lives in this home with them.

Candelaria would like to expand the inventory of her business, since customers are demanding a greater variety of products. For this reason, she is requesting a loan with FUSAI to invest in sweets, sweet bread, and cold drinks among other products in order to stock her business.

loans.use: to invest in sweets, sweet bread, and cold drinks other among things to stock her business.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the needed capital to start up a "sari-sari", or general store, business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-scale borrower like her. 

Recently, she took a loan to restock her store with basic commodities such as canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with items such as canned goods, oil, and soy sauce

loans.name: Leydi Esperanza

texts.es:
Leydi, es una joven estudiante, que tiene muchas ganas de ser exitosa. Ella actualmente cursa su tercer año de la carrera de contabilidad, es una de las mejores alumnas de su clase. Su madre y hermana mayor, quienes tuvieron que migrar a otro país para mejorar su situación, son las principales personas que la ayudan para que salga adelante. 
Ella, ha recurrido a un préstamo de Kiva y MiCrédito, porque confía y ve el financiamiento como una gran oportunidad para pagar los gastos de culminacion de su licenciatura, sin detenerse o preocuparse por otra cosa que no sea el estudio. En un futuro desea ser contadora de una gran institución bancaria.
texts.en:
Leydi is a young student with a lot of desire to be successful. She is currently in her third year studying accounting and is one of the best students in her class. Her mother and older sister, who had to migrate to another country to improve their situation, are the main people who help her to get ahead.

She has turned to a loan from Kiva and MiCrédito because she trusts and sees the financing as a great opportunity to pay for her degree, without stopping or worrying about anything else except studying. In the future she wants to be an accountant at a great banking institution.

loans.use: to pay for her degree.

loans.name: Emelina

texts.pt:
A senhora Emelina de 35 anos de idade   é mãe solteira de 2 filhos a frequentar o ensino primário e sustenta sua irmã enviando, vive na casa de seus pais.
Diz que com este crédito irá comprar cimento, pedra, areia, varões, e pagar a mão-de-obra para dar continuidade a construção da sua casa que esta na fase da cobertura.
O seu sonho é terminar a obra, mobilar,  e mudar se para a sua própria casa e que com os empréstimos anteriores conseguiu iniciar a construção de sua casa.
Diz que seus desafios são os financeiros tem  estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as mesmas e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Emelina is 35 years old. She is a single mother of 2 children who attend grade school and she supports her sister by sending her money. She lives at her parents' house.
She will use this loan to buy cement, stone, sand, rods, and to pay for manual labor to continue building her home. She is in the stages of building the roof.
She struggles financially, but she is determined to work and she wants to ask for more loans in the future to cover her needs and reach her goals.

loans.use: to buy cement, stone, sand, rods, and to pay for manual labor

loans.name: Rogerio

texts.pt:
O senhor Rogério de 39 anos de idade   trabalha numa empresa de segurança como supervisor,  casado pai de 4 filhos dos quais 1frequenta o ensino secundário,  2 no primário  e 1 ainda sem idade escolar ,vive em casa própria.
Diz que com o empréstimo ira comprar chapas de zinco, varões, cimento para dar continuidade a  construção de sua casa.
O seu sonho é terminar a obra oferecendo melhores condições a sua família e adquirir uma viatura para uso pessoal.
Tem como desafios financeiros tem  estado a trabalhar,e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Rogério is 39 years old. He works for a security company as a supervisor and he is married with 4 children, 1 in high school, 2 in grade school and a small child. He lives in a house that he owns.
He will use this loan to buy zinc roofing sheets, rods, cement to continue building his home.
His dream is to finish the works so he can offer better living conditions to his family and in the future buy a car for personal use.
He struggles financially, but he is determined to work and he wants to ask for more loans to cover his needs and reach his goals.

loans.use: to buy zinc roofing sheets, rods, cement to continue building his home.

loans.name: Roque

texts.pt:
O senhor Roque de 30 anos de idade   é trabalhador dos caminhos de ferro  como assentador de via , casado pai de 2 filhos dos quais 1 a estudar outro ainda menor sustenta 1 irmão que vive com ele na casa própria.
 Diz que com este de crédito pretende comprar cimento, varões, pedra, e areia  para fazer o reboco de sua casa.
O seu sonho é terminar a obra, mobilar e fazer uma barraca na sua casa para reforçar a renda familiar.
Tem como desafios financeiros tem  estado a trabalhar,e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Roque is 30 years old. He works as a railroad worker laying the rails. He is married with 2 children, a small child and a child going to school. He also supports a brother. He lives in a house that he owns.
He will use this loan to to buy cement, rods, stone and sand to finish drywalling his home.
His dream is to finish the works, furnish the house and set up a booth out of the home to increase his household rent.
He struggles financially, but he is determined to work and he wants to ask for more loans to cover his needs and reach his goals.

loans.use: to buy cement, rods, stone and sand to finish drywalling his home.

loans.name: María Veronica

texts.es: María de 43 años de edad es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de diferentes platos típicos, actividad que realiza desde hace 9 años y que le ha permitido sostener la economía de su hogar apoyada en este negocio y tratar de brindar lo mejor a su familia. Ella habita en vivienda propia al lado de su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 16 y 7 años de edad, por lo que se siente muy feliz de poder brindarle a sus hijos un lugar seguro donde vivir. María desea invertir en su negocio de venta de minutas, ya que desea contar con una mayor cantidad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: frutas, jarabes, azúcar, leche entre otros productos para ofrecer minutas a sus clientes. El crédito anterior María lo invirtió en su carretón, ya que sintió que este negocio le brindaría mayores ganancias, por lo que se dedica a la venta de minutas.
texts.en:
María, aged 43, is a hard working woman who sells a variety of traditional foods, a job she has been doing for nine years. This has allowed her to sustain her household economically, and helped her to try to provide the best for her family.

She lives in her own home with her spouse and two children, aged 16 and 7. She is very glad that she is able to provide her children with somewhere secure to live.

María wishes to invest in her shaved ice business, as she would like to be able to offer her customers a larger quantity of products. This is why she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy: fruits, syrups, sugar, milk, and other products to be able to offer shaved ice to her customers.

María used her previous loan to buy her cart, as she felt that this business would provide her with a higher income, which is why she is now selling shaved ice.

loans.use: to buy fruits, syrups, sugar, milk, and other products to be able to offer shaved ice to her customers.

loans.name: Maria Petronila

texts.es:
Petronila, 37 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, por falta de recursos económicos no continúo con sus estudios, pues tenía que ayudar a sus padres a trabajar y aportar económicamente a su familia.- Actualmente está casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, tienen dos hijos de las edades de 18 y 15 años.  
 
Petronila, se dedica a los oficios domésticos en su casa, aparte de dedicarse a esta actividad ella tiene una tienda en su casa, esa es su principal fuente de ingresos, ella tiene la tienda desde hace diez años y todos ayudan y colaboran en atenderla, es beneficioso para ella tener la tienda en su casa, porque no tiene que salir de su casa a trabajar.

El financiamiento del préstamo para invertirlo en su tienda específicamente comprará tres quintales de azúcar, cinco  quintales de frijoles, diez quintales de maíz, entre otras cosas, de esta manera podrá obtener ingresos económicos para  poder sostener a su familia con los gastos necesarios en su hogar.

Petronila, desea ayudarle a su hijo menor para que pueda estudiar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Petronila, 37 years old, studied through sixth grade. Due to a lack of financial resources, she did not continue with her studies, since she had to help her parents to work and contribute financially to her family. Currently she is married and her husband works in agriculture. They have two children who are 15 and 18 years old.

Petronila takes care of the household tasks. Apart from that, she has a store in her house. That is her main source of income. She has had the store for ten years and everyone helps and contributes to looking after it. It is beneficial to her to have the store in her house, because she does not have to go out of her house to work.

She will use the loan to invest in her store. Specifically, she will buy three quintales [a quintal is 46 kg or about 100 lbs] of sugar, five quintales of beans, ten quintales of corn, among other things. In this way she will be able to obtain a better income to be able to support her family with the necessary household expenses.

Petronila wants to help her younger son so that he can study for a university degree.

loans.use: to invest in her store. Specifically, she will buy three quintales of sugar, five quintales of beans, and ten quintales of corn, among other things

loans.name: Giovanni Enrique

texts.es: Giovanni de 23 años de edad, vive muy feliz junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos de 8 y 13 años de vida. Giovanni se caracteriza por ser un hombre muy trabajador y responsable que quiere dar lo mejor a su familia. Giovanni se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para hombre y mujer por mayor, lo realiza de forma ambulante en los alrededores de su comunidad; es así como el cubre las necesidades básicas de su familia. Giovanni solicita un crédito a FUSAI para poder invertir en compra de mercadería para poder surtir más su negocio, de esta forma que su negocio crezca poco a poco y que sus ingresos puedan mejorar para poder dar un futuro mejor a sus hijos. Giovanni comprará: ropa interior de hombre y mujer.
texts.en:
Giovanni is 23 years old and lives happily with his wife and two children aged 8 and 13. Giovanni is known for being a hard-working and responsible man who wants to provide the best for his family.

Giovanni earns a living selling wholesale underwear for men and women. He does this by travelling around his community in order cover the basic needs of his family.

Giovanni is applying for loan from FUSAI in order to buy merchandise to stock his business. This way his business will be able to grow gradually which will improve his income in order to give his children a better future. Giovanni will buy underwear for men and women.

loans.use: to buy underwear for men and women in order to sell it around his community.

loans.name: Noe Alexander

texts.es: Noe de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el posee un taller de mecánica automotriz ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace 6 años, tiene muchos clientes por su buen trabajo, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Noe está solicitando un crédito para la compra de una caja de herramientas, micas y sostenes o burros de motores ya que los que actualmente posee están muy deteriorados, y a si poder para seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Noe, aged 35, lives in his own home with his wife and their three children.

He has owned a vehicle repair shop in the place where he lives for six years now. He has many customers because of the quality of his work. With the income that he earns, he manages to cover some of his household expenses.

Noe is requesting a loan to buy a toolbox, tail light lenses, and engine hoists or engine stands because the ones that he has are in a very bad condition. With this purchase, he will be able to continue with his work and, thus, obtain a better income.

loans.use: to purchase a toolbox, tail light lenses, and engine hoists or engine stands.

loans.name: Glória

texts.pt:
A senhora Glória de 56 anos de idade   é  comerciante e agricultora, solteira mãe de 2 filhos já maiores  sustenta 01 neto que vive  com ela na casa própria.
Diz que com este crédito irá comprar cimento, barrotes, pedra, areia, varões,  chapas de zinco e pagar a mão-de-obra para dar continuidade a construção da sua barraca na sua casa.
No futuro quer fazer criação de frangos, crescer no negocio adquirir uma viatura para facilitar no seu negócio.
Tem como desafios insuficiência de fundos e com os valores anteriores conseguiu melhorar as condições de sua casa e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as mesmas e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Glória is 56 years old. She is a businesswoman and a farmer. She is a single mother of 2 children of age and she supports a grandson who lives with her in a house that she owns.
She will use this loan to to buy cement, rods, stone, sand, beams, zinc sheets and to also pay for manual labor to continue building her house and also set up a booth out of her home.
In the future, she wants to raise chicken and grow her business as well as buying a car to help with it.
She struggles financially, but she was able to use her previous loans to improve her home conditions and her goal is to ask for more loans to cover her needs and reach her goals.

loans.use: to buy cement, rods, stone, sand, beams, zinc sheets and to also pay for manual labor to continue building her house and also set up a booth out of her home.

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz is 57 years old. She lives in Gusa Calatunan, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. Luz actively participates in the various programs and services that the Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) offers. She hopes to maintain her PMPC membership in good standing with a good repayment record.

Luz is requesting a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks to repair her home. She hopes to live comfortably with a decent house. Luz is thankful that all her financing needs of her retail business are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in an new assortment of cosmetics, nail polish, perfumes, body creams, personal grooming products, and other items for every occasion.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 46 years old and married. For the past 15 years, she has run a general store in the Philippines where she sells a variety of items such as canned goods, snack food, personal care products, and other groceries. Lucia works very hard to provide for her family.

Lucia is requesting a 25,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell

loans.name: Hatife

texts.pt:
O senhor Hatife de 30 anos de idade   é segurança,  casado,  pai de 4 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam o ensino primário,  1 ainda sem idade escolar sustenta sua mãe enviando ,vive em casa própria.
Diz que com o valor do empréstimo ira comprar chapas de zinco, varroes, cimento, barrotes areia, pedra, arames ,pregos para dar continuidade da sua obra .
O seu sonho é terminar a obra, mobilar para oferecer um lar melhor  a sua família, fazer um muro de vedação .
Tem como desafios financeiros tem  estado a trabalhar,e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos com os empréstimos anteriores ampliou sua casa com mais dois quartos.
texts.en:
Hatife is 30 years old. He is married with 4 children, 3 in grade school and a small child. He also supports his mother sending her money. He lives in a house that he owns.
He will use this loan to buy zinc sheets, rods, cement, sand bars, stone and nails to continue building his home.
His dream is to finish the works, furnish the house and give his family a better place to live. He will also like to build a fence.
He struggles financially, but he is determined to work and he wants to ask for more loans to cover his needs and meet his goals. He used his previous loans to make additions to the house and build two rooms.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheets, rods, cement, sand bars, stone and nails to continue building his home.

loans.name: Zacarias

texts.pt:
O senhor Zacarias é segurança, tem 51 anos de idade , é casado e pai de 6 filhos dos quais apenas 02 estudam os restantes ja sao maiores de idade.
Com o valor do crédito pretende comprar sementes adubos, produtos quimicos e gasolina para a sua machamba.
Tem como sonho ampliar sua machamba e adquirir uma viatura para escoar os produtos da machamba para os mercados.
O seu maior desafio e a insuficiencia de fundos, para supera-los faz machambas, pesca e revende reforcando a renda de sua familia, mas diz que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para tal vai pagar pontualmente .
texts.en:
Zacarias is a security guard. He is 51 years old. He is married and father of 6 children, 2 still in school, and the rest are of age.
He will use this loan to buy seeds, compost, chemical products ans gas for his business.
His dream is to expand his crops and buy a vehicle to transport his produce to different markets.
He struggles financially, but he works hard in his garden as well as fishing, and he supports his family selling his produce.
He wants to ask for more loans in the future, so he is determined to pay this one one time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, chemical products ans gas for his business.

loans.name: Sebastian

texts.en:
Sebastian is just 20 years old and lives in the municipality of Dabeiba. He owns a farm where he grows different kinds of vegetables. It is work that he learned thanks to his father that taught him everything necessary to do his job. His family isn’t in the best economic situation, so he feels a lot of responsibility with his job.

The problem that this man found in his business is that the inputs are really expensive, and the profits and needs that he has don’t allow him to invest in his farm. He’s asking for a loan so he can buy some fertilizers and seeds and pay his employees.

He dreams of seeing his farm grow big, with a lot of products, so he can have many clients. You can help Sebastian to be successful and accomplish his dreams. A loan will take him near to his goals and dreams.

loans.use: to buy some fertilizers, seeds and pay his employees.

loans.name: Darnita

texts.en:
Darnita signed up for her membership with PMPC and availed herself of needed capital to start up a sari-sari (variety) store business. She is thankful for the capital PMPC extended to a small time loan recipient like her. Darnita has been able to turn the tide in her favor and makes good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of her good fortune. 

Darnita is requesting a loan to restock her store with basic commodities such as canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to create a descent home for her family.

loans.use: to restock commodities like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce

location.town: Sindangan - Dapaon, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Yefersson Ssteven

texts.es:
Yefersson, un joven de 21 años, vive en el municipio de El Bagre, una pequeña ciudad donde las oportunidades de salir adelante son difíciles y la competencia comercial es bastante dura.

Este joven de mente emprendedora y grandes deseos de salir adelante tiene el proyecto de iniciar con un negocio de comidas rápidas en el parque principal del municipio.

Con la ayuda de un préstamo, Yefersson podrá cumplir su sueño de ser independiente y poder generar sus propios ingresos, con los que pagara sus estudios y aportara a los gastos de su hogar.

El dinero será invertido en la compra de un carro de comidas y en la compra de surtido e ingredientes para la preparación de sus alimentos.

Colabora a un joven emprendedor, de mente creativa y grandes sueños!
texts.en:
Yefersson, a young man aged 21, lives in El Bagre, a small city in which opportunities to get ahead are difficult and commercial competition is quite fierce.

This young man has an entrepreneurial mind and big dreams of getting ahead. He is planning to start up a business selling fast foods in the town's main park. With the help of a loan, Yefersson can complete his dream of becoming independent and generating his own income, which he will use to pay for his studies and contribute to household costs. The money will be used to by a food cart, and to buy supplies and ingredients to prepare his foods.

Collaborate with a resourceful young man with a creative mind and great dreams!

loans.use: to buy a food cart and the supplies and ingredients he needs to prepare his foods.

loans.name: Henrique

texts.pt:
O  senhor Henrique de 26 anos de idade   é  solteiro,  ainda sem  filhos  e a viver na casa de seus pais faz machambas no regadio próximo da sua casa.
 Com o valor do empréstimo  ira comprar adubos, medicamentos e sementes para a sua machamba onde produz milho.
O seu sonho é ser um dos melhores produtores na sua zona, ampliar a sua machamba adiquirir um tractor para lavoura e usar o mesmo para ajudar outros agricultores no cultivo de suas machambas e adiquirir tambem uma viatura para escomento dos produtos para os mercados. 
Tem como desafios financeiros tem  estado a trabalhar e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as mesmas e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Henrique is 26 years old. He is single with no children. He lives with his parents and he has a garden in a lot next to the house.
He will use this loan to buy compost, chemicals and seeds to help his corn production.
His dream is to become one of the best producers in his area, expand his crops, buy a tractor and use it to help other farmers and their crops. He also wants to get a vehicle to transport his produce to different markets. 
He struggles financially, but he is determined to work and he wants to ask for more loans to cover his needs and reach his goals.

loans.use: to buy compost, chemicals and seeds

loans.name: Isaias

texts.pt:
O senhor Isaías de 40 anos de idade   trabalha como fotografo a conta própria,  solteiro pai de 3 filhos dos quais 2 frequenta o ensino secundário, 1 no primário e vive em casa própria.
Diz que com o empréstimo ira comprar chapas de zinco, portas, janelas,varões, cimento para dar continuidade a  construção de sua casa.
O seu sonho é terminar a obra oferecendo melhores condições a sua família e tornar se um grande empresario.
Tem como desafios financeiros tem  estado a trabalhar,e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Isaías is 40 years old. He is a freelance photographer, he is single with 3 children, 2 in high school and 1 in grade school. He lives in a house that he owns.
He will use this loan to buy zinc sheets, doors, windows, rods and cement to continue building his home
His dream is to finish the works and improve his family living conditions and one day become a great businessman.
He struggles financially, but he is determined to work and he wants to ask for more loans to cover his needs and reach his goals.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheets, doors, windows, rods and cement

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena landed at the right place for her needed capital when she joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). She is grateful that she has been given the opportunity to avail loan products. PMPC came to Elena's rescue by lending her money when she needed it the most.

Now, Elena has availed another loan for the next cropping season. She borrowed money for land and seedbed preparation. Elena perseveres and always believes in herself to reach her goals to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparation.

loans.name: Alba Yanira

texts.es: Alba es una mujer muy trabajadora que se dedica desde hace 1 año a la venta de tortillas, además cuenta con una tienda de productos básicos, por lo que se siente muy feliz de poder sostener la economía de su hogar. Alba vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 15 años de edad la cual se encuentra estudiando con su apoyo. Alba desea invertir en su negocio, ya que cada día cuenta con más clientes que solicitan sus productos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: maíz por mayoreo, lácteos, granos básicos, entre otros productos para surtir su tienda y mejorar su venta de tortillas.
texts.en:
Alba is a very hardworking woman who, for the last year, has worked selling tortillas, and also has a store selling staple goods. She is very happy that she is able sustain the economy of her household.

She lives in a house she owns with her life partner, and 15 year old daughter, who is currently in school with her support. Alba wishes to invest in her business, and she now has more customers who are requesting more products. For this reason, she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy wholesale corn, dairy products, dry grains and other things to stock her store and improve her tortilla sales.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn, dairy products, dry grains and other things to stock her store and improve her tortilla sales.

loans.name: Democrito

texts.en:
Democrito is 50 years old and lives in Ramon Magsaysay, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. He is married and has three children.

Democrito owns and operates a business providing transport to local community members for a living. He has been doing this for five years. He has requested a loan of PHP 30,000 to purchase a slightly used motorcycle for his transportation business. Democrito is a new member of PMPC.

In the future, Democrito hopes to save money for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase a slightly used motorcycle for his transportation business.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Jesusa is 52 years old and resides at Dapaon, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married and blessed with two child who are school age.

Jesusa joined PMPC in order to access the programs and services of the co-op. Recently, she's accessing her eighth loan in the amount of PHP 20,000 for additional working capital for her existing business. She will use it to buy a variety of commodities as she sells a variety of food products in the local community.

loans.use: to buy a variety of commodities.

location.town: Sindangan - Dapaon, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Ritafe

texts.en:
Ritafe is a businesswoman from Poblacion, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She is 40 years old, married and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari store and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family.

Ritafe is a full fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. Now, she applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

Ritafe continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

location.town: Sindangan-Poblacion, Leon B. Postigo, Zamboanga De

loans.name: Janneth

texts.en:
Janneth has been helping her husband to work their own farm to make a living. She successfully repaid a previous loan that she used for organic fertilizer for her farm. Janneth’s budget, even with the previous loan, was not enough to cover the entire farm. 

Janneth is requesting a new loan to buy additional organic fertilizer for her farm and vegetable garden. She is hopeful of gaining more income from her farm as she invests more capital into improving it.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for her vegetable garden

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
El señor Luis es un mecánico de motos muy experimentado habitante del municipio de Cerete.

Ha adquirido muchas habilidades a través del trabajo empírico.

Adicional a su labor como mecánico también tiene un pequeño almacén de venta de repuestos para motos en el cual ofrece distintos tipos de repuestos en diferentes marcas.

Tiene una condición especial y es que él no puede acceder fácilmente a servicios bancarios ya que no cuenta con historial crediticio; es por eso que Interactuar le da la mano e intenta hacer que progrese.

Es un hombre muy trabajador y honrado que conoce el significado que tienen las motos para sus dueños y es por esto que siempre trata de ofrecer un excelente servicio, de buena calidad y de una manera eficiente.

El solicita un préstamo para surtir su almacén con gran cantidad de repuestos, de este modo podrá tener los productos disponibles para sus clientes
texts.en:
Señor Luis is a very experienced motorcycle mechanic who lives in the city of Cerete. He has acquired his abilities through on-the-job experience. In addition to his work as a mechanic, he has a small store selling various motorcycle parts of different brands.

He has a unique situation in that he can't easily access banking services since he doesn't have a credit history. For this reason, Interactuar has given him a hand and is trying to help him progress. He is a very hardworking and honest man who knows the importance of motorcycles to their owners. For this reason, he always tries to offer quality and efficient service. He is requesting a loan to stock his store with a large quantity of spare parts. In this way, he will be able to have available products for his customers.

loans.use: to stock his store with a large quantity of spare motorcycle parts, in order to have products available for his customers.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Julieta works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from boarding house rentals. Julieta is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Julieta has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Maimuna

texts.en:
Maimuna, 32, has five children. She and her children live in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She trades in both new and used clothing. She mainly buys clothes to sell to men and women. To supplement her income, Maimuna owns a cocoa garden.

Maimuna is a hardworking woman, determined to raise and educate her children. She started her business five years ago and is proud of the progress, although challenged by increasing transport costs, competition and limited capital.

She has requested a loan to buy more clothes to sell to her customers. She hopes to have a classic shopping centre in future to increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for resale to her customers.

loans.name: Héctor David

texts.es:
Héctor, de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, dejo de estudiar porque su padre lo llevaba a trabajar todos los días y no tenía tiempo para poder estudiar; está soltero y en su casa solo vive con sus padres y un hermano que es menor que él.

Héctor, se dedica a la agricultura, siembran maíz y frijol, pero también cultiva hortalizas de distintas variedades, esto lo hace junto a su padre y su hermano, ya que todos los trabajos son de forma familiar; Héctor, se dedica a este rubro porque su padre le enseño como trabajar la tierra de una buena manera, también se dedican al cuido de ganado, porque con los residuos de cosecha ellos los alimentan, su horario de trabajo inicia a las 5:00 a.m. y termina a las 12:00 meridiano, luego trabaja eventualmente durante la tarde, pero no es muy frecuente porque tiene que estar pendiente de alimentar el ganado.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar abono, plaguicidas, herbicidas para aplicárselos a sus cultivos, así como también pagara mano de obra para que le ayuden a limpiar el lugar donde sembrará, porque desea cultivar más esta temporada, para poder reponer un poco las pérdidas que tuvo debido a la falta de lluvia en esta temporada recién pasada, teniendo el dinero en mano podrá comprar todo de una sola vez y aplicarlo en el tiempo justo.

En un futuro quiere poder comprar más ganado y seguir cultivando cada año más la tierra, para tener más granos con los cuales poder alimentar a su familia, así como también venderlos en su comunidad para poder generar un ingreso de dinero extra, con el cual desea poder construir una casa propia, porque donde vive es casa de sus padres y él desea construirla y casarse y formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
Héctor, 37 years old, studied until sixth grade. He stopped studying because his father took him to work everyday and he did not have time to study. He is single and in his house he only lives with his parents and a brother who is younger than him.

Héctor works in agriculture. He plants corn and beans, but he also grows vegetables of distinct varieties. He does this together with his father and his brother, since all of the work is family work. Héctor works in this field because his father taught him how to work the land in a good way. They also work raising cattle, because with the excess harvest they feed them. His work schedule begins at 5:00 a.m. and ends at 12:00 noon. Later, he eventually works in the afternoon, but it is not very frequent because he has to look after feeding the cattle.

He needs the loan to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and herbicide to apply to his crops, and he will also pay for labor to help him clean the place where he will plant because he wants to grow more this season in order to recover a bit of the losses that he had due to the lack of rain in this most recent season. Having the money in hand, he will be able to buy everything all at once and apply it at the right time.

In the future he wants to be able to buy more cattle and continue each year growing on more land, in order to have more grains with which he can feed his family, and also sell them in his community in order to generate extra income, with which he wants to build his own home because he lives in his parents' house and he wants to build it and marry and form his own family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and herbicide to apply to his crops.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is known in the Caniangan, Tangub City area, for her sweet tuba (native wine from coconut sap) that she has for local customers. She is 49 years old married with seven school-age children.

Rosalinda wanted to finish the construction of her house, so she asked for a loan from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). The amount that she receives will be used to purchase bags of cement, sand, and gravel for house completion.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement, sand, and gravel for house completion.

loans.name: Araujo

texts.pt:
O senhor Araújo de 42 anos de idade   é professor, casado pai de 5 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam o ensino secundário,  1 no primário  e 1 ainda sem idade escolar ,vive em casa própria.
Diz que com o empréstimo ira comprar portões, varões, cimento para a construção de um muro de vedação do seu quintal.
O seu sonho é terminar a obra, ampliar sua casa, e ampliar também a sua machamba onde produz diversos tipos de hortícolas.
Tem como desafios financeiros tem  estado a trabalhar,e pretende tomar mais vezes para suprir as dificuldades e alcançar os seus objetivos
texts.en:
Araújo is 42 years old. He is a professor, married with 5 children, 3 of them in high school, 1 in grade school and a small child. He lives in a house that he owns.
He will use this loan to buy metal fences, rods, cement to build a wall around his property.
His dream is to finish the works and expand his crops where he produces different green vegetables.
He struggles financially, but he is determined to work and he wants to ask for future loans to cover his needs and reach his goals.

loans.use: to buy metal fences, rods, cement to build a wall around his property.

loans.name: Celeste

texts.pt:
A senhora Celeste , de 47 anos de idade operaria agrícola, solteira e mãe de 03 filhos  todos independentes , vive na casa própria com o neto .
Com o valor do empréstimo de 12000( doze mil meticais ) será aplicado na compra de barrotes , Areia  para mudar a cobertura da sua casa .
No futuro pretende ampliar a casa , visto que a casa ainda não tem sala nem varanda muito menos a cozinha e casa de banho. 
Liquidar o empréstimo,  para poder pedir mais vezes ate concretizar o seu sonho.
texts.en:
Celeste is 47 years old. She is a farm worker, she is a single mother of 3 children, all independent. She lives in a house that she owns with her grandson.
She will use this 12,000 MZN loan to buy rods, sand to finish drywalling his home.
In the future she would like to make additions to the home, as at the moment the house doesn't have a living room or a porch, let alone a kitchen or a bathroom. 
She wants to finish paying for this loan on time to be able to have access to future ones and one day fulfill her dreams.

loans.use: to buy rods, sand to finish drywalling his home

loans.name: Brenda

texts.en:
Brenda is driven by a passion for selling. She never gets tired of tending her store.

She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken out several loans already. For these loans, she religiously met her obligations without record of default.

Now, she is borrowing again. She will use this loan to buy an inventory of sugar, milk, oil and noodles to sell. Having enough inventory will mean opportunities for more income.

For the future, she dreams of sustaining her store to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for an inventory of sugar, milk, oil and noodles to sell.

location.town: Sindangan-Poblacion, Leon B. Postigo, Zamboanga De

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: La señora Maria de 27 años de edad, casada, tiene un hijo dependiente de sus ingresos, con domicilio en la ciudad de Cochabamba, se dedica a la actividad bovina, para lo cual cuenta con ganado vacuno propio, de la producción obtenida genera sus ingresos, a esta actividad se dedica desde hace 7 años, cuenta con la suficiente experiencia para hacer frente a cualquier complicación, para realizar su actividad cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo, además su esposo se dedica a prestar servicios de transporte (taxista), ambas actividades son fuente de sus ingresos, ambos muestran ser personas muy responsables y con muchas ganas de superarse, la señora Maria requiere un préstamo para la compra de insumos para su ganado ya que por las condiciones climatológicas, no cuentan con mucho forraje propio y por la escases necesita comprar insumos secos, esto para que no disminuya su producción y disminuya el nivel de sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Señora Maria is 27 years old and married. She has one child who is dependent on her income. Her residence is in the city of Cochabamba and she works with cattle. She has her own cattle, and her income is generated from their production. She has earned her living in this activity for seven years and she has enough experience to face any complication.

Maria has her husband's help in carrying out her activity; in addition, he works providing transportation services (taxi driver). Both activities are their sources of income, and Maria and her husband show themselves to be very responsible people with a strong desire to better themselves.

Señora Maria needs a loan for the purchase of supplies for her cattle, as she does not have much forage of her own because of climatological conditions. Because of the scarcity, she needs to buy dry feed so that their production and her level of income will not diminish.

loans.use: to buy supplies and forage to improve her cattle's production of milk and obtain a better income for her family

loans.name: Yina Paola

texts.es:
Venta de mercancía a traves de catalogo es lo que mantiene viva la ilusión de Yina, ya que su sueño es salir adelante, mejorar su situación económica y poder apoyar a su familia, pues considera que lo mas importante en la vida es el trabajo duro y la perseverancia.
Trabaja incansablemente todos durante 8 horas para generar su propio sustento. 

Ella nunca pensó en que podía crecer y ahora que interactuar le da la oportunidad de prestarle dinero, quiere aprovechar para realizar la compra de artículos como ropa, cosméticos y elementos para el hogar.
texts.en:
Selling merchandise by catalog is what keeps Yina’s hope alive since her dream is to succeed, improve her economic situation, and be able to support her family. She considers working hard and perseverance to be the most important things in life. She works tirelessly for eight hours every day to earn her livelihood.

She never thought she would be able to expand her business; now that Interactuar gives her the opportunity to borrow money, she wants to use it to buy items like clothing, cosmetics, and home supplies.

loans.use: to buy items such as clothing, cosmetics, and home supplies.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia, 39, is married with school-age children. She is from Baybay, Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental.

She is a member in good standing with Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, through which she availed financial assistance to start up her hog-raising business. She has successfully repaid her previous loans and has requested another loan to purchase bags of animal feed and vitamins.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Lady Lyn

texts.en:
Lady Lyn, 29, is married and has one child, who is in school. Lady Lyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for four years and has borrowed eight times from the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to sustain her business.

Lady Lyn has requested a loan of 9,500 Philippine pesos through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

For the future, Lady Lyn would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma, 50, is a widow from Baybay, Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. She operates a tailoring business, which sustains her needs.

Wilma is on her way toward constructing a concrete house, which she wants to have completed. Recently, she asked for a loan from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative to purchase cement, sand, gravel, hollow blocks and steel rods.

She wants her house to be completed now, while her business is going well.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, hollow blocks and steel rods.

loans.name: Gilberto Agapito

texts.es:
Don Gilberto es agricultor orgánico  que tiene 27 años de edad cuida el medio ambiente tiene 2 hijos de (4,5) años los cuales van a la escuela y su esposa es negociante de un fréjol llamado chocho, tiene 12 años en el negocio y sus expectativas a futuro son tener una plantación de tara, una tienda de artículos de primera necesidad y brindar una educación profesional a sus hijos. El préstamo sera utilizado para la compra de fertilizante e incrementar la producción del cultivo de tara.
Le gusta el negocio de la tara porque es un cultivo que no necesita de mucha inversión, las plantas tienen un prolongado
periodo de vida de mas de 100 años. El cual le permite mantener su familia y educar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gilberto is an organic farmer, who cares about the environment. He is 27 years old and has two children, aged four and five, who go to school. His wife works as a merchant selling a type of bean called "chocho." 

He has been following this occupation for 12 years now, and his future goals include having a plantation of "tara" (a small leguminous tree or thorny shrub native to Peru), having a basic necessities store, and providing his children with a high-level education. 

He will use the loan to buy fertilizers and to increase his production of "tara."

He likes growing "tara" because this is a type of crop that doesn't require a huge investment; the plants have a life expectancy of over 100 years; and this business enables him to provide for his family and give his children an education.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for his "tara" crops.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es: María de 56 años es una habitante del municipio de Soledad que emprendió su microempresa de dulces artesanales tras encontrarse en una situación difícil; luego de su desvinculación laboral en una dulcería, con su liquidación adquirió la infraestructura necesaria para empezar a elaborar dulces a base de frutas naturales y distribuirlos a poblaciones del Departamento.  Su exjefe continuó apoyándola en esta actividad al sentir un gran aprecio por ella, por los años en que fue su colaboradora y conoció aspectos de su vida personal entre ellos que está separada de su cónyuge y es responsable del sustento de su hogar.  Hoy en día cuenta con 22 años comercializando sus productos a través de un catálogo, donde exhibe las diferentes presentaciones de conservas, bocadillos y frutitas de leche a sus clientes a quienes ofrece facilidad de pago. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir en materia prima para la preparación de los dulces, inversión que es muy significativa para manejar nuevo surtido de dulces y embalajes.  Su meta a futuro es tener un local en el centro del municipio y continuar apoyando a su familia.
texts.en:
María, aged 56, who lives in the town of Soledad, launched her artisan sweet business after finding herself in a difficult situation: after leaving her job in a sweet shop, her severance pay gave her the infrastructure necessary to start to make sweets using natural fruits, and to distribute them through the towns in the region.

Her ex-boss continued to support her in this work, feeling great appreciation for her and for the years that she was a coworker, and knowing about aspects of her personal life, including the fact that she has separated from her partner and is now responsible for sustaining the household.

She now has 22 years experience selling her products through a catalog, in which she displays the different conserves, guava jelly and fruit sweets to her customers, to whom she offers payment facilities. She is currently applying for her first loan with Kiva, through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy ingredients to make the sweets, an investment which will be important for managing a new selection of sweets and their packaging.

Her goal for the future is to have premises in the center of the town, and to continue to support her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making sweets.

loans.name: Antonia Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Antonia de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tortillas desde hace 20 años, su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes, ella esta solicitano un credito para la compra de maiz por quintales y cal para ontinuar con su trabajo.
texts.en: Antonia is 56 years old and lives in her own home with her husband. She has earned a living making and selling tortillas for 20 years. Her business is located in her home, and she has a lot of customers. She is requesting a loan to buy quintals [large sacks] of corn, and lime powder in order to continue with her work.

loans.use: to buy quintals [large sacks] of corn, and lime powder.

loans.name: Lorena Guadalupe

texts.es: Lorena de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboracion de canastas artesanales para arreglos florales, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace varios años, inicio con una herencia que le dejo su padre, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mimbre, botes de lata y varas de bambu todo por mayor para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Lorena, aged 30, lives in a home she owns with her partner and two children.

She earns a living making artisan baskets for floral arrangements, which is an activity she has been doing for several years. She began the business using an inheritance left by her father.

With her earnings he is able to pay some of the household expenses. She is requesting a loan to buy wicker, tin cans and bamboo canes, all wholesale, to continue with her work as it is her only source of income.

loans.use: to buy wicker, tin cans and bamboo canes, all wholesale.

loans.name: Pablita

texts.en: Pablita has been a farmer for almost 30 years in Tugas, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She is 62 years old, and is a widow with two adult age children. Presently, she is juggling managing her convenience store and supervising her farm preparing for the next cropping season. She asks for assistance from Paglaum MPC to pay for labor costs in land preparation such as plowing, harrowing, leveling and seed bed preparation. Pablita is looking forward to a good yield this time.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs in land preparation such as plowing, harrowing, leveling and seed bed preparation.

loans.name: Roselito

texts.en:
Roselito is 26 years old and single with one infant child from Dipolog City, Zamoanga del Norte.

Roselito is an ornamental and flowering plants grower. His business primarily supports his needs and those of his child. He has a hog raising right in his own backyard for added income. He is also an active member of Paglaum MPC and asks for a loan to purchase ornamental plants to sell.

loans.use: to purchase ornamental plants to sell

loans.name: Lorife

texts.en: Lorife is 30 years old, is married, and is from Tangub City. She has a farmer working with her husband since they've been married. Her chosen business is producing well. She wants to make use of the money she's earned by building her new house. She asks for a loan from Paglaum MPC to buy "amakan" (weaved bamboo strips), sticks, nails, and plywood for completing her house.

loans.use: to buy "amakan" (weaved bamboo strips), sticks, nails, and plywood for completing her house.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 32 years old and married with 3 children, 2 of whom are going to school in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He deals in selling men's clothes and has been in that business since 2013. He also grows and sells cocoa and owns a retail shop to supplement his income. He dreams of expanding his business to new market areas. However, he is limited by inadequate capital alongside seasonality changes. He has asked for a loan to buy merchandise to sell. He is very hopeful that in future he will transform his business into a wholesale shopping centre.

loans.use: to buy men's clothes for resale.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en: Maricel is a farmer in Garang, Tangub City. She is 43 years old and married with 4 adult age children. She is also supported by her children working abroad and receives monthly allotments from them. She is a good member of Paglaum MPC without any record of default payments. Now, she asks for a loan to purchase bags of fertilizers and bottles of insecticides.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers and bottles of insecticides

location.town: Tangub - Garang, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Vergelio

texts.en:
Vergelio, 34, has been a farmer for almost 10 years in San Apolinario, Tangub City. He is married with four school-age children.

He is a skillful farmer, in that he always has good produce. He is a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, from which he avails financial assistance for his farming activities.

Recently, he requested a loan to purchase bags of fertilizer and bottles of insecticide.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer and bottles of insecticide.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa, 70, is a strong-willed woman who will do anything for her family. She is a widow and lives in Calacaan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental.

She operates a rice production business, which is primarily financed by Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative. She has a quarterly income of approximately 15,000 Philippine pesos, which sufficiently provides for the needs of her family.

Recently, she requested another loan, this one to purchase bags of fertilizer and bottles of insecticide.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer and bottles of insecticide.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a 48 year old lady with 4 children aged 14, 16, 20 and 22 living in Fort Portal Uganda where all of them are attending school.

Grace is a farmer growing bananas and rearing cattle for milk production. She is facing the hardship of a banana virus that destroys her banana crops and disturbs her plan for expansion to a large scale. However, Grace is looking forward to buying a car for her family for a quicker means of transport with her family to school, church and other places.

Grace has asked for a loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Samina is a responsible mother of 1 child. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been providing transport services by driving a taxi for 9 years. Her husband is responsible for fulfilling the needs of his entire family.

Samina's husband needs to make repairs on his taxi because its current condition is not good. It requires more maintenance on a daily basis. Due to insufficient financial means, her husband is unable to cover the cost. Therefore Samina has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan Samina's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily. And her husband can provide better transport services and earn more income. Samina also plans to save some of the profits from her husband's income so they can meet their family's needs in the future.

Samina is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's taxi.

loans.name: Thắm

texts.en:
Thắm is 37 years old and married. She has worked in agriculture, raising poultry for more than 10 years. Thắm lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village, moreover this region often suffers from natural disasters such as floods or drought. Her income from this business is not high enough to do what she really needs to do for a comfortable life.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having Biogas system. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build Biogas system. In 2015, Thắm joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She hopes that this loan could make her little dream come true.

With her business profit, Thắm hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a Biogas system.

loans.name: An

texts.en:
Mrs. An is 63 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 10 years. An lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in the village, moreover this region often suffers from natural disasters such as floods and drought. The income from her business is not high enough to do what she really wants to comfort her life.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is her latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a new toilet. In 2015, An joined the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She hopes that this loan could make her little dream come true.

With her business profits, An hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: To purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a new toilet

loans.name: Febe Eunice

texts.es:
Febe, de 31 años de edad, estudio hasta primer año de bachillerato, está casada, su esposo trabaja como albañil, es madre de 3 hijos, de 12, 10 y 8 años de edad y los 3 están estudiando.

Febe, se dedica a trabajar como sastre, también tiene un pequeño negocio de pupusas, como sastre tiene 10 años de trabajar y en el negocio de pupusas tiene alrededor de 5 meses de tenerlo.- Antes, solo trabajaba en los oficios del hogar, ahora sus negocios están en su casa y eso le favorece porque no tiene que caminar para llegar hasta su lugar de trabajo, en la venta de pupusas se involucra una cuñada de ella que es la persona que le ayuda,  así como también su hijo mayor le ayuda. 

Febe, necesita el préstamo para comprar una máquina de coser que le vende un vecino, porque la que ella tiene se le daño y le sale mejor comprar esa máquina que comprar el repuesto para la otra, el crédito ayudara para que pueda seguir trabajando en la sastrería y darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.

l sueño de Febe, es construir una mejor vivienda para su familia, porque donde viven actualmente es una vivienda construida de bahareque y de alguna manera esta le genera inseguridad.
texts.en:
Febe is 31 years old and studied through the first year of high school. She is married, and her husband is a brick mason. She is the mother of three children ages 12, 10, and 8 years old, and all three are in school.

Febe earns a living working as a tailor, and she also has a small business selling pupusas. She has worked as a tailor for 10 years, and she has had her pupusa business for around 5 months. Before this she only worked doing household chores, and now her businesses are in her home, which is better for her because she doesn't have to walk all the way to her workplace. Her sister-in-law is involved in selling pupusas, and she helps Febe; Febe's oldest child helps her as well.

Febe is requesting a loan to buy a sewing machine that her neighbor is selling her because the one she has got damaged, and it is better for her to buy this machine than to buy the replacement part for the other one. The loan will help her so that she can continue working as a tailor, and give her children a better quality of life.

Febe's dream is to build a better house for her family, because they currently live in a house made of straw and mud, and to some degree this makes her feel insecure.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine that her neighbor is selling her because the one she has got damaged.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a responsible mother of 8 children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her son has been providing transportation services by driving a taxi for 13 years. Her son is responsible for fulfilling the needs of his entire family.

Parveen's son needs to cover the maintenance cost of his taxi because its current condition is not good. It requires more maintenance on a daily basis. Due to insufficient finances, her son is unable to pay for the maintenance cost. Therefore Parveen has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan Parveen's son can afford the maintenance cost. And he will be able to provide better transport services and earn more income. Parveen also plans to save some of the profits from her son's income so they can meet their family's needs in the future.

Parveen is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: repair her son's taxi.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia has been a hog grower for almost twenty years and has supported her husband in rearing their children. She is 65 years old from Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. She's doing well with her business. In fact, she had sent all her children to school through college.

Lydia says that everything was made possible by the financial assistance of Paglaum MPC. Recently, she has taken a loan to purchase bags of animal feed and vitamins.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is 55 years old, married and has 3 adult age children.

She has operated a convenience store for a long time, which provides her with a monthly income of 6,500.00 PHP.

Currently, she is asking for a loan to restock her store with confectioneries, condiments and consumable goods.

loans.use: to restock her store with confectioneries, condiments and consumable goods.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Last 2006, Nilda signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC. She is grateful that she has access to financial assistance for her farming activities.

She cultivates her own land and has good production output. Nilda is asking for a loan to pay for land preparation like plowing, harrowing, leveling and seed bed preparation.

loans.use: to pay for land preparation like plowing, harrowing, leveling and seed bed preparation

loans.name: Celeste

texts.en:
Celeste, 35, is married with three school-age children. She is from Upper Dicayas, Dipolog City.

She is engaged in a direct selling business, which gives her an approximate income of 20,000 Philippine pesos per month. She is supported by Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, with which she nurtures a membership with no records of default.

Celeste recently borrowed an amount to purchase construction materials, such as cement, sand, gravel, steel rods and galvanized iron sheets. She wants to live comfortably and finish the construction of her house while her children are still in high school.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials, such as cement, sand, gravel, steel rods and galvanized iron sheets.

loans.name: Riffat

texts.en:
Riffat is a 37-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is the responsible mother of four children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. For the past many days, his rickshaw has not been working properly; therefore, he is unable to generate any amount of income. He wants to repair it as soon as possible. However due to lack of money, her husband finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. Therefore, Riffat has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business.

Riffat is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's rickshaw.

loans.name: Thabina Women Group

texts.en:
The person raising her hand in the photo and with a black top is Hanna, a member of Thabina Women Group. She is 54 years old, married, and has 4 children. She participates in group activities and has been trained by Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in savings and resource mobilization, which both enabled her to make some savings and start operating a green grocery shop within her locality.

Hanna also supplies surplus products to the other nearby markets. She is applying for a Kiva loan so that she can add more stock and access larger markets and thus earn more profits. This will enable her to support her family with their basic needs.

Hanna is grateful to Kiva and their lenders and promises to repay her loan portion on schedule.

loans.use: to add more stock of green groceries to sell at other markets and earn a better income.

loans.name: Isfandiyor

texts.en:
Isfandiyor is a bright boy. He was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1996. He is single and lives with his mother.

Isfandiyor is a student. He studies at medical university with excellence. He is an active, responsible, punctual and communicable person. He is well-known among friends and teachers. His father died years ago. His mother alone feeds and ensures their family. It is hard for her to cover all expenditures only with her salary. Isfandiyor heard about a Kiva project that finances and supports students in their education. He appealed to IMON and Kiva, asking for a loan to pay his higher education costs. He hopes to be supported and awaits your compassion.

loans.use: to pay for his studies at medical university.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 46 years old and is married with 4 children. She lives in Maloro, Tangub City. She offers manicure and pedicure services to her neighborhood and is also supported by her husband who is a government employee. She is doing well on her activity that she is able to send all her children to school.

She is glad that she can always turn to Paglaum MPC whenever she needs immediate financial assistance. This time, she asks for a loan to pay tuition and other school feesfor her son.

Evangeline hopes to see all her children graduate from college.

loans.use: to pay tuition and other school fees for her son.

loans.name: Pedro Joaquin

texts.es:
Pedro es un hombre de treinta y nueve años de edad, de mente creativa y personalidad energética, tiene veinte años trabajando como fotógrafo, este mundo le parece simplemente fascinante, con mucho esfuerzo logro poner su propio estudio de fotografía y gracias a un primer préstamo de Kiva y MiCrédito, logro adquirir equipos de última tecnología, lo que hizo crecer su negocio notablemente. 
Este hombre con ojos de artista, solicita la ayuda de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, para que se otorgue un préstamo que le permita comprar algunas luces, flahesesh y otros artículos que harán mejorar la calidad de fotos que produce. Su esposa y sus tres hijos son su principal fuente apoyo. En un futuro desea poner una escuela de fotografía.
texts.en:
Pedro is a thirty-nine year old man with a creative mind and an energetic personality. He has worked as a photographer for twenty years, and the world is simply fascinating to him. With a lot of effort, he managed to set up his own photography studio. Thanks to his first loan from Kiva and MiCrédito he was able to acquire state-of-the-art equipment which significantly grew his business.

This man with the eyes of an artist is asking for the support of Kiva and MiCrédito so he is granted a loan that will let him buy some lights, flashes, and other items that will improve the quality of the photos he takes. His spouse and their three children are his main source of support. In the future, he hopes to open a photography school.

loans.use: to buy lights, flashes, and other items.

loans.name: Eliza

texts.en:
Eliza is 42 years old, married with 3 school age children from Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. She owns and operates a convenience store that is finance by Paglaum MPC. She has been in this retailing business for five years and is doing well.

Eliza wants to exploit the opportunity of having good sales so she wants to restock her store while business is strong. She asks for a loan to purchase consumable goods like noodles, canned goods, condiments and confectioneries.

loans.use: to purchase consumable goods like noodles, canned goods, condiments and confectioneries

loans.name: Imogen

texts.en:
Imogen is 40 years old and married with 3 school age kids. She is from Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte.

She signed up for membership with Paglaum MPc to have access to its programs and services. Her business ventures, such as her integrated farming system where she grows variety of high yielding crops and hog fattening, were supported by the cooperative. She's making a good return on her investments this time that she wants to have a concrete house. This is why she asks for a loan.

The amount that she is requesting shall be used to purchase bags of cement, hollow blocks, steel rods, plywood, boards, and etc.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement, hollow blocks, steel rods, plywood, boards etc.

loans.name: Maria Cecilia

texts.es: La señorita Maria Cecilia tiene 27 años vive en casa de sus padres, no tiene hijos, ella estudio Ingeniería Informática, proviene de una familia trabajadora con buenos valores y buena administración de sus recursos económicos. La señorita Maria Cecilia es una persona emprendedora y ha luchado para poder terminar sus estudios a nivel profesional, actualmente se encuentra desarrollando software a medida para empresas que así lo requieren, por otro lado también trabaja como asistente en un Bufete de Abogados, incrementando sus conocimientos también en esa área demostrando capacidad de administración. La señorita Maria Cecilia necesita un préstamo para comprar otro equipo de computación y así poner en práctica todos sus conocimientos aprendidos e incrementar su capacidad de servicio desarrollando sistemas con diferentes tecnologías de programación y así también realizarse como profesional  ejerciendo lo que estudió para hacer que sus ingresos  mejoren y de esta manera ayudar a su familia. Demostró una buena organización y control de sus ingresos lo que representa un buen manejo de su negocio.
texts.en:
Señorita Maria Cecilia is 27 years old. She lives in her parents' house and has no children. She studied Computer Engineering and comes from a hardworking family with good values and good management of their financial resources.

Señorita Maria Cecilia is an enterprising person who was determined to be able to complete her professional education. Currently, she is developing custom software for businesses that need it. In addition, she works as an assistant in a law office, increasing her knowledge of that area and demonstrating her capacity for administration.

Señorita Maria Cecilia needs a loan to buy other computer equipment in order to put into practice all the knowledge she has learned and to increase her service capacity, developing systems with different programming technologies. This way, she will also be fulfilled as a professional, practicing what she studied in order to improve her income and thereby help her family. She has demonstrated good organization and control of her income, which represents good business management.

loans.use: to purchase computer equipment and increase her ability to provide her clients with software packages in order to generate a better income.

loans.name: Niel

texts.en:
Niel is a fish vendor and has been working as such for five years. He is 31 years old, married, and comes from Silanga, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental.

He is also a member of Paglaum MPC where he has taken a loan for his fish selling business.

Currently, he seeks a loan to buy more stock of fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fish to sell.

loans.name: Genoveva

texts.en:
Genoveva has always loved farming. She cultivates her rice land in Tudela, Misamis Occidental and has yielded good earnings doing this type of work.

Recently, she applied a loan to pay for land and seedbed preparations. This will ensure that the rice field is ready for planting.

Genoveva knew that she has to get things right to yield more income for this cropping season.

In the future, Genoveva hopes to buy hauling truck for easy transport of produce.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparations

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 55 years old and lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children.

Daisy has a fish vending business and owns a fishing boat. She earns approximately PHP 6,000 each month doing this type of work.

She has requested a loan to purchase a second-hand motor for her fishing boat .

Daisy has been a member of PMPC for 10 years.

loans.use: to purchase a second-hand motor for her  fishing boat.

loans.name: Shama

texts.en:
Shama is a 33-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan, residing in Rawalpindi with her spouse and five children. Her husband has been running his own tailoring shop in the local market for five years. He alone is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family.

Shama's husband needs to buy different types of tailoring accessories such as pieces of cloth, laces, needles and sewing machine accessories. But due to some financial constraints, her husband is not in suitable condition to buy these items. Therefore Shama has applied for a Kiva loan through its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, she will financially assist her husband to purchase the above tailoring accessories to fulfill his business needs so that he can earn more profitable income.

Shama is very thankful to KIVA and BRAC Pakistan for this financial assistance.

loans.use: to purchase tailoring accessories for her husband's business.

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en: Visitacion is an expert farmer. She has been in this type of business for almost 40 years. She is a hands-on farmer together with her husband. These farming activities were financed by Paglaum MPC programs intended for farmers like her. Recently, she took a loan to purchase bags of fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Akou

texts.fr: Akou est une femme mariée résidant à Adidogomé avec quatre enfants à charge. Akou est une revendeuse de charbon de bois et de souches qui s’approvisionne une  fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile. Pour financer son achat, Akou  nécessite ce prêt pour commander des sacs de charbon de bois afin réaliser plus de bénéfice et soutenir son mari dans les charges de la famille puis permettre une bonne éducation à leurs enfants.
texts.en:
Akou is a married woman living in Adidogomé with four dependent children.

Akou is a charcoal and wood retailer who procure supplies once a month from the market and retails form a house storefront.

Akou needs this loan to finance her purchase. She will use it to order bags of charcoal to make larger profits and support her husband with household expenses. Then they will be able to provide a good education from their children.

loans.use: to buy twenty bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en: Fe is 51 years old, widowed and has five adult children. She is from Catagan, Tangub City. She is a farmer on her own land, which she has cultivated for almost 20 years. She has a good harvest and has provided sufficiently for her family. Recently, she took a loan to pay for labor costs of land preparation, such as plowing, harrowing, leveling and seed bed preparation.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs of land preparation, such as plowing, harrowing, leveling and seed bed preparation.

loans.name: Marvin Gregorio

texts.es:
Marvin tiene muchos planes por delante, este emprendedor de 34 años de edad inició su pulpería hace dos años, con unos ahorros que había guardado junto a su esposa. Dinero que se ha ido invirtiendo muy bien que ha podido llevar adelante con pasos firmes su negocio. Afortunadamente él cuenta con el apoyo de su hermano, quien le manda remesas para apoyarlo a hacer crecer su negocio.
Entre otras metas, sueña con establecer un cibercafé, pues mira buen mercado en su vecindario. Sin embargo, primero desea seguir invirtiendo en su pulpería para hacerla crecer más. Por esta razón, solicita un préstamo para comprar arroz, papel higiénico, verduras, gaseosas, pan, entre otros productos que se venden en grandes cantidades a diario. Esto le permitirá ahorrar a la hora de comprar y vender a un precio más favorable. De manera que podrá ahorrar para cumplir con el sueño del cibercafé.
texts.en:
Marvin has many plans for the future, he is an entrepreneurial 34 year old who started his grocery store two years ago, using savings he had made with his spouse. Money that he has invested has allowed him to drive his business firmly forward.

Unfortunately, he relies on the support of his brother, who sends him money to support him in the growth of his business.

Among other goals, he dreams of setting up a cyber cafe, which looks to be a sound business in his area.

However, he first of all he wishes to continue investing in his grocery store to so that it can continue to grow. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy rice, toilet paper, vegetables, sodas, bread, and other products which he sells in large quantities on a daily basis. This will allow him to save on buying costs, and sell at a more favorable price.

This way, he will be able to save in order to fulfill his dream of opening a cyber cafe.

loans.use: to buy rice, toilet paper, vegetables, sodas, bread and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds for corn and beans, pesticides, pay for manual labor, and pay to rent the land where he plants.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en: Gina and her husband are farmers in Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She is 41 years old with three kids.
