She has asked for a loan from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative because she wants enough inventory of fertilizer for her corn production business. She will use the loan to purchase bags of fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Rehana

texts.en: Rehana is a 45-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of four children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. For the past many days, his rickshaw has not been working properly, Because of this, her husband is unable to generate any amount of income. Her husband wants to repair it as soon as possible. However, due to the lack of money, her husband finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. Therefore, Rehana has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Rehana is very much thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's rickshaw.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Akossiwa est une femme mariée âgée de 34 ans qui vit à Adidogomé. Mère de quatre enfants, Akossiwa est une marchande de friperies qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à domicile et dans les quartiers environnant. Akossiwa demande ce prêt pour commander des draps et des rideaux afin de répondre aux attentes de ses clients et gagner une bonne marge bénéficiaire pour aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire.
texts.en:
Akossiwa is a 34-year-old married woman living in Adidogomé.

A mother of four, Akossiwa is a second-hand textile retailer who procures merchandise twice a month from the market and retails it from her house and in neighboring areas.

Akossiwa is requesting this loan to order bed sheets and curtains. This will make it possible to meet her customers’ expectations and to make a good profit margin to help her children with their school education.

loans.use: to buy twenty bed sheet sets and twenty sets of curtains.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is a 37-year-old woman residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is the mother of three children. Her husband owns a printing shop. He is the guardian of the family and responsible for fulfilling the needs of all family members. Shazia has been running her own beauty salon for the past three years. She contributes her income to manage the household.

Shazia needs to buy different types of cosmetics and supplies for her beauty salon — such as creams, hair brushes and other accessories — but due to financial constraints she is not capable of buying these items. Therefore Shazia has applied for a Kiva loan. This loan will help her to buy the relevant items for her business so she can provide better services to her customers and earn maximum profits to fulfill the needs of her business and family.

Shazia is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for this financial assistance.

loans.use: to increase her salon business.

loans.name: Blanca Udelia

texts.es:
Blanca, de 41 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está casada, su esposo trabaja de seguridad en una empresa hidroeléctrica, es madre de tres hijos, de 26, 16 y 11 años de edad, pero con ella solo viven dos de sus hijos.

Blanca, se dedica a trabajar como costurera desde hace 24 años, este trabajo lo aprendió porque impartieron cursos de corte y confección y ella asistió y fue así como aprendió este oficio; antes trabajaba como empleada doméstica.

Blanca, necesita el préstamo para comprar hilo de diferentes colores y grosor, agujas, elásticos, adornos y tela; este crédito mejorará su calidad de vida, porque podrá tener los materiales que necesita para coser y poder dar un servicio con rapidez a sus clientes.

El sueño de Blanca es, que sus hijos se preparen académicamente, para que puedan tener un trabajo digno de donde puedan sobrevivir económicamente; pero también quiere construir una habitación para uno de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Blanca, aged 41, studied up to third grade. She is married, and her husband works as a security guard for a hydroelectric company. She is the mother of three children—aged 26, 16, and 11—but only two of them live with her.

Blanca has been earning a living working as a seamstress for 24 years now. She learned this trade by taking some dressmaking courses. Before that, she used to be a housemaid.

Blanca needs the loan to purchase reels of thread in different colours and thicknesses, needles, elastics, trimmings, and fabric. This loan will improve her quality of life because she will be able to have the materials that she needs to work and provide her customers with a quick service.

Blanca's dream is for her children to have an education so that they can have a decent job that enables them to survive financially. She also wants to build a bedroom for one of her children.

loans.use: to buy reels of thread in different colours and thicknesses, needles, elastics, trimmings, and fabric.

loans.name: Violita

texts.en: Violita is driven by a passion for selling. At the age of 60, married, and living in Tudela, Misamis Occidental, she runs a store that primarily supports her family. Everyday, she never gets tired of tending her store. Violita is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She religiously paid her obligations without any record of default. Now, she borrowed another loan to pay for inventories of sugar, milk, oil, and noodles to sell. Having enough inventories will  mean income opportunities. In the future, she dreams of sustaining her store to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for inventories of sugar, milk, oil, and noodles to sell.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.en: Manuela is managing her eatery business in Tudela. She mastered the business when she and her husband were in the early years of their marriage. This has been doing well and supporting the needs of the family. She has local customers and will also accept catering for added income. Recently, she borrowed a loan to purchase more kilos of meat and spices for her eatery business. She wants to expand her business and would be more happy to open a small canteen at a nearby school.

loans.use: to purchase more kilos of meat and spices for her eatery business

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Maribel signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the needed capital to start up a "sari-sari", or general store, business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-scale borrower like her. 

Maribel is making good sales these days and she wants to take advantage of that good fortune. Recently, she took a loan to restock her store with basic commodities such as canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with items such as canned goods, oil, and soy sauce.

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en:
Avelina is a businesswoman from Tudela. She is 75 years old, married, and has expertise in selling. She runs a little "sari-sari" store and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. 

Avelina is a full fledged member of PMPC and has already taken several loans. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. She applied for this loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. 

Avelina continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana, 40, is a college undergraduate who lives in a rural village of Bago City. She is married to Temogen, who works as a casual employee in Bago City. They have two children, aged 12 and six. Their monthly family income is only 5,200 Philippine pesos, or $113.

Ana wants to help her husband but she didn’t have the means until she learned about a two-month training program offered by Bagosphere, a vocational school. The training could lead to a call-center job. Now that she has passed Bagosphere’s selection process, she needs your help to finance her tuition.

Ana dreams of having adequate income and becoming successful in her career. Once she starts earning, she can provide for her family’s basic needs, then save some money for her children’s education.

Your assistance in funding her loan will help Ana realize her dreams.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for a two-month call-center training program that can get her a job that pays about $270 a month.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en: Anita is a strong-willed woman who will do anything for her family. She is 36 years old, married and lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She operates a hog-raising business, which is primarily financed by Paglaum MPC. The business gives her quarterly income that sufficiently provides for the needs of her family. Recently, she availed another loan to buy heads of piglets and purchase bags of animal feed.

loans.use: to buy heads of piglets and purchase bags of animal feed.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en: Emma landed at the right place for her needed capital when she joined PMPC. She knew this would be her last chance to get back on her feet when she went broke after her first business went bad. PMPC came to the rescue for Emma by lending her money when she needed it the most. Now, she availed another loan for the next cropping season. She borrowed an amount for land and seedbed preparation. Emma perseveres and always believe in reaching her goals to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparation

loans.name: Essi  Mawussi

texts.fr: Mère de deux enfants, Essi est une femme mariée qui habite à Adidogomé. Agée de 33 ans, Essi est une revendeuse de sachets en plastique qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend de quartier en quartier. Esssi sollicite ce prêt pour commander des sachets de cinq, dix francs et des emballages. Avec le bénéfice qui en résultera, Essi va pour aider son mari à bien occuper de ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire.
texts.en:
Essi is a mother of two and a married woman living in Adidogomé. She is 33 years old.

Essi is retailer of resealable plastic bags. She procures merchandise at the market twice a month and retails door-to-door.

Essi is requesting this loan to order five- and ten-XOF bags and wrappers. With the profits resulting from it, she will help her husband take care of her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy forty boxes of five-XOF bags, twenty-four boxes of ten-XOF bags, and thirty bags of wrappers.

loans.name: Levis Joel

texts.es:
Levi, de 33 años de edad, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios del hogar, debido a la falta de recursos económicos solo pudo estudiar hasta octavo grado, su pareja hace 16 meses tuvo una niña que es la alegría de la casa, en su casa también vive su mamá porque él desea cuidarla.

Levi, se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura desde que era un niño, porque su padre le enseño este trabajo, ahora gracias a ese trabajo puede darle a su familia los granos básicos que necesitan para su alimentación; hace 5 años comenzó a trabajar en una fábrica de bloques, pero solo desempeñaba este trabajo durante la mañana; también se dedica a pintar  desde hace 2 años y cuando no tiene ningún tipo de trabajo, se dedica a trabajar con un amigo en su negocio de poner puertas y ventanas de vidrio, todo lo hace para cubrir las necesidades de su familia, es un hombre luchador y emprendedor, su horario de trabajo es inestable porque nunca entra a la misma hora. 

Levi, necesita el crédito para comprar abono, plaguicidas y herbicidas para aplicárselos a sus cultivos de maíz y frijol, de esta manera podrá asegurar una buena cosecha, porque teniendo estos productos a tiempo en su casa, podrá aplicárselos a sus cultivos en el tiempo justo para que sus plantas no pierdan la fuerza y puedan dar los granos esperados, los cuales le servirán para la alimentación de su familia.

El sueño de Levi, es tener los ingresos suficientes para construir de un material más resistente su casa, donde su esposa y su hija tengan una mejor calidad de vida y más un lugar más higiénico.
texts.en:
Levi is 33 years old. He is in a relationship. His partner is a homemaker.  Due to a lack of financial resources, he was only able to go to school until the eighth grade. Sixteen months ago, his partner had a baby girl, who is the joy of the household. His mother also lives in the home, because he wants to look after her.

Levi has worked in agriculture since he was a child, because his father taught him this work. Now, thanks to this work, he is able to give his family the basic staple goods that they need for nutrition. 

Five years ago he began working in a cement block factory, but he only did this work in the morning. He has also worked as a painter for the last 2 years, and when he doesn’t have any kind of work, he works with a friend in his business hanging glass doors and windows. 

He does all of this to cover his family’s needs. He is a determined and enterprising man. His work schedule is not consistent, because he never starts at the same time. 

Levi needs the loan to buy fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides to apply to his corn and bean fields. This way he can ensure a good harvest, because by having these products in his house early, he can apply them to his crops at the appropriate time so that his plants will not lose vigor, and will provide the expected yield. These will help to nourish his family.

Levi’s dream is to have sufficient income to build his home of stronger materials, where his wife and his daughter can have a better quality of life and a cleaner place to live.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides to apply to his corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Zykey

texts.en:
Zykey is a 20-year-old college undergraduate who lives in Bago City. She belongs to a family of eight. Her father is a farm worker and her mother is a housewife. Zykey is the second child in the family. Her oldest brother works as a welder in Cebu while her other brother and sisters are still studying. The family’s total monthly income of PHP 9,000 ($195) is not even enough for their basic needs. 

Zykey would like to earn more for herself and for her family. She believes that the training at Bagosphere will allow her to realize this goal. Zykey aims to have a stable job with a high salary and to help her family battle poverty. Your support in funding her loan will help Zykey have a better life.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for a 2-month call center training program that can get her a job paying about $270 monthly

loans.name: Eden

texts.en: Eden is a 26-year old high school graduate who lives in a rural village in San Enrique. She is married to Lolito, a farmer and also a village councilor. They have a four-year-old child. Their total monthly family income is only PHP 10,000 ($217). Eden wanted to help her husband but didn’t have the means until she learned about the two-month training program at Bagosphere that could lead to a high paying job. Now that she has passed Bagosphere’s selection process, she needs your help to finance her tuition. Once Eden starts earning, she can help provide for her family’s basic needs and then save money for her child’s education.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for a two-month call center training program that can get her a job paying about $270 monthly.

loans.name: Juana Yolanda

texts.es: La señora Juana es una persona de una edad de 26 años, vive en el departamento de Chuquisaca municipio de Monteagudo, la señora Juana vive  junto a su padre, cuenta con la capacitación en corte y confección de ropa tanto deportivas  como ser shores, busos, poleras y de otros de las cuales ella genera sus ingresos para ayudar a mantener a su padre y hermanos  iniciando la actividad no tiene  esposo ni pareja.  La señora Juana requiere un préstamo el cual destinara para la compra  máquinas y materia prima para confección de ropa deportiva y de vestir, y así de esa manera  ella podrá iniciar sus actividades de trabajos de confesiones de ropa deportiva y de tal manera generar  ingresos de su actividad y podrá tener mejores condiciones de vida que le ayuden a prosperar tanto en su vida profesional como de emprendedora. Ya que ella cuenta con la capacitación necesaria para poder hacer frente a su nuevo reto.
texts.en:
Señora Juana is a 26-year-old person. She lives in the department of Chuquisaca, in the city of Monteagudo with her father.

Señora Juana has training in cutting and sewing athletic wear like shorts, sweatshirts, t-shirts, and other items. With this work, she is generating income to help take care of her father and siblings by starting a business. She doesn't have a husband or partner.

Señora Juana needs a loan that will be destined for the purchase of machines and raw materials to sew athletic and ready-to-wear clothing. In this way, she will be able to start her activity of taking jobs making athletic wear in order to generate income from her business and to have better living conditions; this will help her to prosper in her professional life and as an entrepreneur. She already has the training necessary to be able to face her new challenge.

loans.use: to purchase machines and raw materials to sew athletic and ready-to-wear clothing in order to generate a better income.

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Ablavi est une veuve femme  âgée de 41 ans résidante à Adidogomé. Mère de trois enfants, Ablavi prépare du riz  qu’elle revend dans un hangar à  la devanture de son domicile. Ablavi s’approvisionne du nécessaire deux fois par mois  au marché et demande ce prêt pour commander des  sacs de riz.  Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Ablavi compte améliorer sa prestation de vente et aider ses enfants à avoir un épanouissement et une bonne éducation scolaire.
texts.en:
Ablavi is a 41-year-old married widow living in Adidogomé. She is a mother of three.

Ablavi prepares rice that she retails from a storefront in her house. Ablavi procures what she needs twice a month from the market and is requesting this loan to order bags of rice.

With the profit that will result from it, Ablavi intends to improve her retail experience and help her children flourish and get a good school education.

loans.use: to buy five bags of rice.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es: A una hora de distancia está el lugar más cercano para que Hector pueda tener acceso a cargar su celular, aparte de ello debe pagar por este servicio, ya que en  la comunidad de Olanchito, Yoro donde  vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos no hay acceso a energía eléctrica y por lo cual deben tener iluminación con velas y lámparas a base de kerosén para poder realizar las labores diarias. Hace 25 años que Héctor es agricultor de hortalizas y granos básicos con lo cual se  ha esforzado mucho para brindarle a su familia la mejor calidad de vida posible, es por esto que siguiendo este objetivo, él solicita financiamiento a SOLUZ Honduras para adquirir este sistema que le ayudara a tener acceso no solo a iluminación sino también a comunicación, lo cual hará que su familia viva de una mejor manera, ya que su esposa podrá realizar sus actividades diarias con mayor facilidad por las noches y sus hijos tendrán suficiente iluminación para realizar sus tareas o estudiar .
texts.en:
The nearest place in which Hector can charge his cellular phone is an hour away, and he must also pay for this service, as there is no electricity in the community of Olanchito, Yoro, where he lives with his wife and four children. They have to use candles and kerosene lamps in order to have light for doing everyday tasks.

Hector has been a farmer for twenty-five years. He grows vegetables and basic grains, and he has worked very hard at this, in order to give his family the best possible quality of life. To this end, he is requesting a loan with SOLUZ Honduras in order to acquire this system, which will help him to have not only access to light, but also to communication. This will enable his family to live better, as his wife will be able to carry out her daily activities more easily at night, and his children will have enough light to do their homework, or study.

loans.use: to purchase a solar system that will be beneficial to Hector and his family, and will give them a better quality of life.

loans.name: Juancho

texts.en: Juancho is an 18-year-old college undergraduate who lives in La Castellana. He belongs to a family of eight. His father is a contractual driver while his mother is a housewife. Juancho has five siblings, two of them already married. His elder sister works in a call center in Manila while his other two siblings are still studying. Their total monthly family income of PHP 9,000 ($195) is barely enough to provide for their basic needs. This motivated Juancho to find a means to help the family have more income. He underwent the selection process of Bagosphere and successfully passed it to qualify for the two-month training program that could lead to a high paying job. Juancho would like to enhance his communication skills and to become a successful call center agent for a prestigious BPO company. Your generosity in funding his loan would greatly help Juancho to achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to pay for tuition for a two-month call center training program that can get him a job paying about $270 monthly.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en: Anita has a wide experience in farming. She has mastered the farming activities of growing, caring for, harvesting and earning income as well. Anita has supported her husband doing this type of work.  As a farmer, Anita has nurtured her membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. She knows she can always turn to the Cooperative for her financial needs. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds so she will have good results with healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.  Someday, she hopes to purchase another piece of rice land to cultivate that will potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds so she will have good results with healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en: Visitacion is a hardworking mother from Calamba. She is 62 years old and a businesswoman who makes copra. She buys whole coconuts for this. Visitacion has signed up for membership with the cooperative to gain access to insurance and credit. She applied for a loan to buy whole coconuts for making copra. Visitacion hopes to succeed in this business to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy whole coconuts to make copra (dried coconut meat used for oil production)

loans.name: Magdaleno

texts.es:
Magdaleno, de 74 años de edad, no tiene ningún grado de estudio por diversos motivos familiares y económicos, está soltero, pero vive en su casa con dos sobrinos que van a la escuela y están a su responsabilidad.

Magdaleno, siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde pequeño, su familia ha fomentado la agricultura de generación en generación; él considera que antes las producciones eran más sostenibles y que ahora no son tan saludables debido a la gran contaminación ambiental que se ha generado en el planeta.- Magdaleno, tiene un amigo que le alquila a buen precio el terreno para producir sus granos y su horario de trabajo no está establecido.

Magdaleno, está solicitando el préstamo para comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, comprar productos fito-sanitarios, pagar  mano de obra y pagar el alquiler de la tierra donde siembra, esto mejorara grandemente su calidad de vida, porque el sustento principal de su familia es la siembra de granos básicos.

Los sueños de Magdaleno, son darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus sobrinos y ayudarlos para que estudien un carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Magdaleno is 74 years old. Due to various family and financial reasons, he has not been to school. He is single, but he lives in his home with two nephews that go to school and are under his care.

Since he was small, Magdaleno has always worked in agriculture. His family has passed agriculture from generation to generation.

He believes that production used to be more sustainable, and that now it is not so healthful due to the high levels of environmental contamination that have been generated around the planet. Magdaleno has a friend who rents him the land to produce his basic grains at a good price.

His work schedule is not defined.

loans.use: to buy seed for corn and beans and to buy pesticides, pay for labor, and pay the rent on the land where he grows his crops.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en:
Teodora is operating a copra (coconut meat) production business. She is a widow with one school-age child.

Her chosen business activity has given her sufficient income to sustain the needs of her family.

Recently, she availed herself of a loan to purchase coconut for copra production.

loans.use: to purchase coconut for copra production.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en: Imelda is engaged in running a grocery store. She has been operating her business for six years and earns a monthly net income of 8,200 PHP. Imelda is 48 years old and single. She is from the village of Calamba, Misamis Occidental. In 2005, Imelda joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Imelda is requesting her 12th loan of 14,900 PHP, which will be used for the expansion of her existing business. She wants to buy more kilos of fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.use: to buy more kilos of fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Rachel

texts.fr:
Mme RACHEL est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. Le plus âgé a 26 ans et le moins âgé a 16 ans. 04 enfants vont à l’école et elle a 11 personnes en charges.
Mme  est transformatrice d’aliments depuis 12 ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans le marché de son quartier.
Elle veut acheter avec l’argent octroyé, 10 sacs de pain de singe.
Elle veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour agrandir son activité. Elle ambitionne payer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ms. Rachel is married and a mother of four. The eldest is twenty-six and the youngest is sixteen. Four of the children go to school. Eleven people depend on her.

Ms. Rachel has been preparing food for twelve years. She purchases merchandise from her local market.

With the loan money, she wants to purchase ten bags of baobab fruits. She wants to use the profits generated by the loan to grow her business.

Her ambition is to pay for her children’s education.

loans.use: purchase ten bags of baobab fruit.

loans.name: Farzana

texts.en:
Farzana is a responsible mother of four children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been providing transport facilities by driving a taxi for 40 years. Her husband is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family. Her husband needs to do maintenance on his taxi because the current condition of his taxi is not good. It requires more maintenance charges on a daily basis. Due to insufficient financial means, her husband is unable to do the maintenance on his taxi. Therefore, Farzana has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan, Farzana's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily and provide better transport facilities to earn a profitable income. Farzana also plans to make savings with the profit from her husband's income to meet her family's needs in the future.

Farzana is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's taxi.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en: Sonia landed at the right place for her needed capital when she joined PMPC. Sonia has been rescued by PMPC for lending her money when she needed it the most. Now, she availed another loan for the next cropping season. She borrowed an amount for land and seedbed preparation. Sonia perseveres and always believes in reaching her goals to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparation

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Mère de deux enfants, Akouvi est une femme célibataire âgée de 48 ans qui vit à Adidogomé. Akouvi est une restauratrice de beignets qui s’approvisionne du nécessaire une fois par mois au marché. Akouvi sollicite ce crédit pour commander des bols du haricot, de l’huile et du charbon de bois. Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera, Akouvi va pouvoir étendre son activité et promouvoir l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Akouvi is a mother of two. She is a forty-eight year old single woman living in Adidogomé.

Akouvi is a fried dough saleswoman who procures what she needs once a month from the market. Akouvi is requesting this loan to order bowls of beans, oil, and charcoal.

With the profit margin that will result from it, Akouvi will be able to expand her business and promote her children’s education.

loans.use: purchase forty-three bowls of beans, one can of oil, and one bag of charcoal.

loans.name: Marto Abelio

texts.es:
Marto, de 73 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, debido a la guerra civil que sufrió nuestro país las escuelas fueron cerradas y no pudo continuar estudiando y cuando se presentó nuevamente la oportunidad de estudiar, tenía que ayudarle a su padre con los trabajos agrícolas.- Ahora, está casado, su esposa se dedica a  los oficios domésticos, tienen 6 hijos, todos están acompañados y en su casa solo viven su esposa, dos nietos y él, pero solo su esposa depende económicamente de él.

Marto, se dedica a la agricultura en pequeño desde que era un niño, su padre le enseño a realizar este trabajo y es así como él puede mantener a su familia y cosechar maíz y frijol, para poder darle a su familia  lo necesario; pero además de esta actividad, también se dedica a la ganadería, pero desafortunadamente perdió su ganado y ahora pretende volver a comprar más. 

Marto, necesita el préstamo para comprar dos terneras, para que crezcan y produzcan leche para colocar una venta de lácteos como queso, crema, cuajada y quesillo y así podrá tener nuevos y mejores ingresos económicos para darles lo mejor a su familia.

Marto, sueña con tener 10 vacas lecheras y tener un negocio de lácteos para exportar sus productos a otros lugares; también planea poder remodelar su casa, porque debido al tiempo se le han deteriorado algunas partes.
texts.en:
Marto is 73 years old and studied up to Grade 2. Because of the civil war the country went through schools were closed and he couldn't continue to study. When the opportunity to study occured again he had to help his father with the agricultural work. Now he is married, his wife does housework. They have six children all of them in relationships. He lives in his house with his wife and two grandchildren with only his wife depending on him economically.

Marto has worked in small scale farming since he was a boy. His father taught him how to do this work. This is how he can support his family and provide them with what they need, harvesting corn and beans. Besides this business he also works with livestock but unfortunately he lost his cattle and now he wants to buy more again.

Marto needs the loan to buy two calves, so they grow and produce milk to start sales of dairy products like cheese, cream, curd and quesillo (a local cheese). Doing this he can have new and greater economic revenue to provide his family with the best.

Marto dreams of having 10 milk cows and having a dairy business to export his products to other places. He also plans to remodel his house as due to the passing of time some parts of it are dilapidated.

loans.use: to buy two calves.

loans.name: Davron

texts.ru: Его зовут Даврон. Ему 55 лет. Он занимается земледелием, сколько себя помнит. Даврон сам выбрал эту деятельность. Он учился на агронома и вернулся обратно, на родину и использовал весь свой опыт, который получил в учебном учреждении. В этом году Даврон уже готовится посадить новый урожай. Для этого сначала ему необходимо очистить землю и обработать поле минеральным удобрением. По этой причине он обратился за финансовой поддержкой. Даврон на заемные деньги решил приобрести минеральные удобрения. Он надеется, что благодаря кредиту он совершить свой план и посадит хороший урожай.
texts.en: Davron is 55 and he has been involved in agriculture for as long as he can remember.  This is an activity that he chose; he decided to become an agronomist and went to study in a foreign institute.  When he came back home, he started to put in practice the experience he had acquired abroad.  At the moment, Davron is getting ready for the next planting season.  In order to do this, he first needs to clear his land and prepare the soil with mineral fertilizers.  For this reason, he is asking for some financial support.  He will be using his loan to buy mineral fertilizers.  He hopes that his loan will help him to carry out his plan and that he will get a nice harvest.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Juan Asunción

texts.es:
El Sr. Juan tiene 9 hijos y tiene 15 años en el negocio de la tara en un productor orgánico de tara que viene cuidando
el medio ambiente de manera responsable, le gusta el negocio de la tara porque demanda de poca inversión en donde solo se 
realiza la limpieza de la parcela y posteriormente se realiza la cosecha. El préstamo ayudara a seguir trabajando bajo en enfoque orgánico e incrementar la producción de la parcela.
Entre algunos inconvenientes se tiene la presencia de plagas, pero como se utiliza un control biológico este permite asegurar el negocio. Sus expectativas a futuro son mejorar su vivienda, incrementar la producción.
texts.en: Juan has nine children, and he also has fifteen years of experience in the tara industry as an organic tara producer who has been responsibly caring for the environment. He likes the tara business because it requires little investment, in that you only have to keep the land clean, and then afterwards gather the harvest. The loan will help Juan to continue farming organically, and to increase the yields of his land. Among the problems he faces is the presence of diseases, but because he uses biological control, this allows him to keep his business secure. His hopes for the future are to improve his home, and increase his production.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer for tara trees.

loans.name: Emilie

texts.fr: Emilie est une femme mariée qui vit à Tokoin avec ses deux enfants à charge. Agée de 35 ans, Emilie est une femme dynamique et courageuse  qui vend des friperies en circulant les quartiers environnant afin de disposer d’une bonne capacité financière. Pour atteindre ses objectifs, Emilie s’approvisionne au marché et sollicite ce prêt pour commander des draps afin de financer son commerce et trouver un bon rendement pour subvenir à ses besoins quotidiens et aider son mari à payer les frais scolaire des enfants dès la rentrée prochaine.
texts.en:
Emilie is a married woman living in Tokoin with her two dependent children. Aged 35, Emilie is a dynamic and hard-working woman.

She sells second-hand textiles door-to-door in nearby neighborhoods to enjoy good financial health. To reach her objectives, Emilie procures merchandise from the market.

She is requesting this loan to order bed sheets, finance her business, and obtain a good return on investment. She will thus provide for her daily needs and help her husband pay for the children’s school expenses as early as the beginning of the school year.

loans.use: to purchase eighty sets of sheets.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen se dedica a la actividad de venta de ropa. Ella solicita un préstamo de un millón cincuenta mil colones ( ₡ 1 050 000), para la compra de mercadería, esto con el propósito de ofrecer mayor variedad de prendas a sus clientes y de esta manera incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en: Carmen is in the business of selling clothes. She is requesting a loan of one million fifty thousand colones (1,050,000 CRC) for the purchase of merchandise, this in order to offer greater variety of clothes to her customers and this way increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell clothes.

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам проживает в районе Файзабад. Ему 31 год. Он вместе женой и 3 летным сыном проживает в районе. У него шустрая и заботливая жена. Она занимается шитьем женской одежды. Сам Рустам дома занимается купле продажей крупнорогатого скота около 3 лет. Он покупает скота и откармливает несколько месяцев, потом перепродает их на скотном рынке. Ему в этом бизнесе нравиться то, что он может сам контролировать свой бизнес. Рустам хочет расширить животноводческую деятельность, путем увеличения поголовье скота. Он берет кредит, чтобы закупить несколько поголовья крупных скотов и корм для скота. Рустам хочет, чтобы Вы помогли ему расширить деятельность. Он будет рад на Вашу помощь.
texts.en:
Rustam, age 31, lives in the Fayzabad district of Tajikistan with his wife and his three-year-old son.  His wife, an intelligent and caring woman, sews women's clothes. Rustam himself has been buying and selling cattle for about three years now.  He buys cattle, feeds his animals for a few months and then resells them at the cattle market.  He likes this field of activity because it gives him the ability to control his own business.  

Rustam wants to increase his cattle headcount in order to expand his activity.  He is taking this loan in order to buy a few head of cattle as well as animal feed.  He is hoping that you will help him with his expansion project, and he thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to buy a few head of cattle and some animal feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fried pork rinds, cheese, beans, corn, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Miriam Leonor

texts.es:
A los 19 años de edad, Miriam tuvo que convertirse en madre de un pequeño que vino a inspirarla, pues a tan solo meses de dar a luz, decidió emprender con su negocio de venta de ropa de forma ambulante. Para muchos la maternidad es un obstáculo a esa edad, sin embargo, para ella fue el inicio de un trabajo prometedor. Ahora ella tiene 23 años de edad y es madre soltera de dos pequeños, que la motivan para salir adelante como mujer empoderada. 
 Sus inicios en este negocio fueron con otro préstamo que la impulsó a salir a las calles en búsqueda un mejor futuro. Ahora tras tres años, también trabaja en secretaria académica en una universidad, lo que también le ha permitido sostenerse con su pequeña familia. Sin embargo, ella no quiere soltar su venta de ropa, pues sueña con tener una tienda establecida, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar camisas, pantalones, vestidos, entre otros estilos de ropa. Con el objetivo de seguir aumentando sus ingresos y por supuesto, el sustento de sus hijos. En sus planes está establecerse en su casa y dejar de vender de forma ambulante.
texts.en:
At the age of 19, Miriam became the mother of a little one who became her inspiration, since just months after giving birth, she decided to start her business in ambulatory clothing sales. For many, motherhood at that age is a handicap, nonetheless for her it was the beginning of a very promising job.

Now she is 23 years old and the single mother of two little ones, who motivate her to get ahead as an entrepreneurial woman. Her beginnings in this business were with another loan, which gave her the support to go out to the streets to seek a better future.

Now, after three years, she also works in the academic offices of a university, which helps her support her small family. Nonetheless, she doesn’t want to let go of her clothing sales, because she dreams of having an established store, for which she is seeking a loan to buy shirts, pants, and dresses, among other kinds of clothing.

With the goal of continuing to increase her income and of course, the support of her children, her plans include establishing herself in her home and leaving ambulatory sales.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants and dresses among other things.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es: Noemi de 63 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de tortas y pupusas, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario para elaborar sus tortas como: pan, tomates, cebollas, mayonesa, mortadelas, entre otros ingredientes y asi poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en su casa con los gastos que se le puedan presentar.
texts.en: Noemi, 63, lives in her own house with her family group. She works selling sandwiches and pupusas. With what she obtains from her sales she achieves covering some expenses of her home. She is applying for a loan that allows her to be able to buy all that she needs to make her sandwiches like: bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, mortadela, among other ingredients and therefore be able to have better income and continue helping in her house with the expenses that can come about.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, mortadela, among other ingredients.

loans.name: Ada Maricel

texts.es: Ada de 44 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia junto al lado de su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 12 y 17 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se gana la vida brindando sus servicios como agente de seguridad, es así como genera sus ingresos económicos con los que ha sacado adelante a sus hijos. Ada desea construir una pared perimetral en su vivienda para brindarles mayor seguridad a su familia ya que actualmente no brinda mucha seguridad es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, varillas de hierro, grava, ladrillos, etc., para la construcción de pared perimetral de su vivienda.
texts.en: Ada is 44 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and two children ages 12 and 7. She is a hard-working woman who earns a living providing services as a security agent. This is how she earns the income with which she supports her children. Ada wishes to build a perimeter wall around her home in order to provide greater security to her family because today there isn't much security. Therefore she seeks a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, iron bars, gravel, bricks, etc. in order to build a perimeter wall around her home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron bars, gravel, bricks, etc. in order to build a perimeter wall around her home.

loans.name: Loyda Johana

texts.es: Loyda de 24 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia junto al lado de su compañero de vida, su madre y su hijo de 8 meses de edad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que se gana la vida como agente en una empresa privada, es así como genera sus ingresos económicos con los que brinda todas las necesidades principales a su pequeño hijo y lleva los insumos a su hogar. Loyda desea construir una pared perimetral de ladrillo con el cual poder brindarles mayor seguridad a su familia ya que actualmente está hecho de madera con varas de bambú y no brinda mucha seguridad, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, ladrillos, grava, varillas de hierro, etc., para mejoramiento de su vivienda construyendo un muro.
texts.en: Loyda is 24 years old and lives in her own home with her husband, mother, and 8 year old son. She is a very hard-working woman who earns a living as an agent in a private business and it is through this work that she provides for all of her small child's needs and provides for her home. Loyda wishes to construct a perimeter brick wall in order to provide greater security to her family as today her fence is made of wood with bamboo bars and doesn't provide much security. Therefore she seeks a loan through FUSAI  to buy cement, sand, bricks, gravel, iron bars, etc. in order to improve her home by constructing a wall.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, gravel, iron bars, etc. in order to improve her home by constructing a wall.

loans.name: Julio Ernesto

texts.es:
Julio, es muy trabajador, estudio hasta segundo grado, está casado, su esposa es empleada y también se dedica a los oficios domésticos en su casa, es padre de dos hijos de 15 y 12 años de edad y que actualmente están estudiando en la escuela.

Julio, es panificador desde hace 15 años y es su principal fuente de ingresos económicos para él y su familia, esta actividad la aprendió gracias a que un tío de él, se dedicaba a esta misma actividad y él trabajó con su tío.- Julio, principalmente elabora pan francés y pan dulce, tiene una gran experiencia en esta actividad y gracias a ello realiza su trabajo con mucha calidad y también ha adquirido muchos clientes que prefieren sus productos, su jornada empieza a tempranas horas porque la panadería está ubicada lejos de su casa y tiene que trasladarse hasta allá, siempre recibe el apoyo de su esposa y también sus hijos.
 
El financiamiento del préstamo lo necesita para comprar una mesa metálica, utensilios, harina de pan, azúcar y levadura, con estas compras mejorara su producción y también sus ventas para ofrecer un mejor servicio a su cliente.

Julio, sueña con poder ampliar su panadería y ser productor y distribuir de pan hacía otros lugares en donde no tiene cobertura, además desea remodelar su vivienda, para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Julio is very hard-working. He studied up to Grade 2. He is married and his wife is an employee and also takes care of the housework in their home. He is the father of two children aged 15 and 12 years old who are currently in school studying.

Julio has worked as a baker for 15 years and it is the main source of income for him and his family. He learned this business thanks to an uncle who works in the same business and he worked with this uncle.

Julio mainly makes french bread and pastries. He has a lot of experience in the business and thanks to this he does his work with great quality and has also acquired many clients who prefer his products. His working day begins very early as his bakery is located far from his house and he has to travel there. He always has help from his wife and children.

He needs the financing of a loan to buy a metal table, utensils, flour for bread, sugar and yeast. With these purchases he will improve his production and also his sales offering better service to his clients.

Julio dreams of being able to expand his bakery and be a producer and distributor of bread to other places that aren't currently served. He also wants to remodel his house to have a better quality of living.

loans.use: to buy a metal table, utensils, flour for bread, sugar and yeast.

loans.name: Letty

texts.en:
Letty is a businesswoman who earns income through retailing various items. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurance and financial assistance. 

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks to use to renovate her house. She wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks to renovate her house.

loans.name: Letty

texts.en:
Letty is 75 years old and separated from her husband, leaving her with two adult children in Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines. She is a retired public school teacher who had spent most of her years molding and teaching young minds. She is grateful that her two children graduated and landed good jobs.

Letty recalls that their education was possible with the support of Kiva's field partner Paglaum MPC, where she is a member in good standing. Now she wants to see her grandchildren finish their college years. She has availed herself of a 50,000 PHP loan to pay her granddaughter’s tuition fees. She is grateful that the cooperative is always on her side whenever she needs financial assistance.

loans.use: to pay her granddaughter’s tuition fees.

loans.name: Berta Nely

texts.es:
Berta, de 50 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está acompañada, es madre de 4 hijos, lamentablemente uno de ellos murió y los otros 2 están casados y son independientes.

Berta, se dedica a engordar cerdos y pollos desde hace 5 años, este trabajo lo aprendió de sus padres, ella decidió dedicarse a este negocio, porque genera buenas ganancias; su esposo trabaja en una cooperativa, desempeñando todo tipo de trabajo que requiere el proceso del café, también se dedica a cultivar maíz y frijoles para el consumo de su familia.

Berta, necesita el préstamo para comprar semilla de frijol, abono, herbicidas y plaguicidas, para aplicarla a sus cultivos en el tiempo justo que los necesiten y así tener una buena cosecha. 

El sueño de Berta, es poder darle a su hijo la oportunidad que estudie, para que sea profesional y tenga la preparación académica que ella no pudo tener, por falta de recursos económicos y que su familia pueda tener mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
50-year-old Berta studied up until the third grade. She has a partner. She has four children. Unfortunately one of them died. The other two are married and independent.

For the past five years, Berta has made a living by fattening pigs and chickens. She learned this trade from her parents. She decided to start this business because it generates good profits. Her husband works in a cooperative and does every kind of work that is required to produce coffee. He also grows maize and beans for his family to eat.

Berta needs the loan in order to buy bean seeds, as well as compost, herbicides and pesticides to apply to her crops in the right season so she can have a good harvest.

Berta’s dream is to be able to give her son the opportunity to study and become a professional and have the education that she was not able to have due to a lack of economic resources. She also dreams of her family being able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bean seeds, as well as compost, herbicides and pesticides for her crops

loans.name: Ela Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, por falta de recursos económicos; está casada, es madre de 3 hijos, los cuales ya están casados, en su casa solo vive ella y su esposo.

Isabel, se dedica a cuidar de una pequeña tienda que tiene en su casa desde hace 10 años, en la cual  ofrece productos de la canasta básica, decidió dedicarse a este negocio porque es algo que genera buenas ganancias; su esposo trabaja en una cooperativa, desempeñando el cargo de camionero.

Isabel, necesita el préstamo para comprar más producto como, granos básicos y otros de primera necesidad para surtir más su tienda y dar a sus clientes una mejor atención, de esta manera también su negocio generara mejores ingresos. 

El sueño de Isabel, es ampliar más su negocio para generar mayores ganancias y que le permita mejorar su vivienda para tener más comodidad y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Isabel didn't have the opportunity to study because of a lack of economic resources. She is married, the mother of 3 children, which are already married. Only she and her husband live in her house. Isabel has worked looking after a small store that he has in her house for the past 10 years, in which she offers staple goods. She decided to work at this business because it's something that generates good income. Her husband works in a cooperative, unloading the cargo from a truck driver.

Isabel needs the loan to buy more product like basic grains and other staple goods to further stock her business and give her customers better attention. In this manner her business will also generate better income. Isabel's dream is to grow her store more in order to generate better income that will allow her to improve her home in order to have more comfort and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more product like basic grains and other staple goods to further stock her business.

loans.name: Sayidniso

texts.ru: Сайиднисо очень смелая и доброжелательная женщина. Ей 39 лет, живет она в Б. Гафуровском районе, города Худжанда. К сожалению, семейная жизнь у Сайиднисо не сложилась. После ухода мужа она осталась с 2-мя дочерьми.  Чтобы обеспечить семью всем необходимым Сайиднисо занимается шитьем. Благо работы и заказов у нее много. Однако дочь Сайиднисо серьезно больна. На лечение требуется специальные лекарства. Сайиднисо со всей душой просит Вас помочь ей в лечении дочери. Так как ее дети это единственная опора в ее жизни.
texts.en: Sayidniso is a very courageous and kind-hearted woman.  She is 39 and lives in Khujand, a city in the Ghafurov district of Tajikistan.  Unfortunately, her family has gone through some difficult times.  Her husband left her and Sayidniso remained with two daughters to raise.  In order to support her family, Sayidniso works as a seamstress.  Thanks to her work and to the orders that she receives, she doesn't lack anything.  However, her daughter is very ill and her medical treatment involves special medications.  Sayidniso is asking you, with all her heart, to help her bear the cost of her daughter's treatment.  Her children are her only support in life.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's medical treatment.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.en: Jenny is a 26-year-old single woman who started working in a bridal shop almost a year ago to cover the needs and expenses of her family that consists of four. Jenny is an ambitious woman who is working hard to develop her own business. Today she is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to buy makeup to sell. She hopes to succeed in this first step and expand her business later on to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy makeup to sell.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Don felix de 52 años de edad vive junto a su esposa en casa propia, él se dedica a la venta de tortas y hamburguesas de manera ambulante por los diferetes mercados, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar embutido, carne de soya, pan, aderezos, verdura etc. y asi poder seguir con sus ventas para obtener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Felix is 52 years old and lives with his wife in his own home. He has a business selling sandwiches and hamburgers as a street vendor in different markets. With the income he is able to pay some of his household expenses. He seeks a loan from INTEGRAL to buy lunch meat, tofu, condiments, vegetables, etc. and in this way be able to continue with his sales in order to obtain better income.

loans.use: to buy lunch meat, tofu, condiments, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine, 46 years old, is married and lives in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She operates a sari-sari store (convenience store) that gives her sufficient monthly income. Like other businesswomen, she experienced a downfall in her business and needed financial assistance to get back on her feet.

Josephine learned about Paglum MPC and signed up for membership. She asked for a loan and restarted her business. Josephine is now making good sales so she wants to grab the opportunity to expand her business by restocking with additional inventory. She has asked for a loan to restock her store with consumable items such as canned goods, noodles, soy sauce and others.

loans.use: to restock her store with consumable items such as canned goods, noodles, soy sauce and others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron bars, nails, labor, etc. in order to build a lattice fence on the border of her home.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar de 43 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposa y sus 3 hijos de 2, 7 y 13 años de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida brindando sus servicios de vigilante en una empresa privada y que con mucho esfuerzo ha sacado adelante a sus hijos y brindado lo insumos necesarios para su hogar, además de recibir de su esposa el apoyo económico con algunos insumos básicos para el hogar. Oscar desea realizar algunas mejoras a su vivienda construyendo un cuarto habitación más grande el cual brinde mayor comodidad y espacio a su familia, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lamina, tablas, clavos, cemento, arena, mano de obra, etc., para el mejoramiento de su vivienda.
texts.en:
43-year-old Oscar lives in his own house with his wife and three children, who are 2, 7, and 13 years of age. He is a hard-working man who earns a living by offering his services as a security guard at a private company. With a lot of effort, he has managed to support his children and provide the necessities for his household. He receives some financial support from his wife, who has a little income.

Oscar wants to make some improvements to his home. He wants to build a larger living room, which will give his family more comfort and space; for this reason, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI, which he will invest in metal sheets, boards, nails, cement, sand, and labour in order to improve his home.

loans.use: to pay workers and buy metal sheets, boards, nails, cement, and sand in order to make improvements to his home

loans.name: Mirsaid

texts.en:
Mirsaid was born in northern Tajikistan in 1997. He is a kind young man who is single and lives with his parents. His mother is a businesswoman and his father is a farmer. The family’s standard of living is normal for the area.

Mirsaid is a freshman student and studies fulltime in the department of Law, Business and Policy at the university. He would like to get an advanced degree and be helpful to his local community.

Mirsaid was told about Kiva and its field partner IMON International and decided to use their services. He has applied for a 3,029 TJS loan to pay his university tuition fees. He awaits Kiva lenders’ kindness and support.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition fees.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa has been a member of Kiva's field partner Paglaum MPC since 2011 when she took out her first loan to start up her roadside eatery. She successfully repaid that loan without default payments.

Recently, she has applied for a 10,000 PHP loan, her ninth from Paglaum MPC, to buy more meat, condiments, vegetables and spices for her business. She hopes to maintain her good record with the cooperative so she will always be able to apply there whenever she needs financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy more meat, condiments, vegetables and spices for her roadside eatery.

loans.name: Robinson

texts.en:
Robinson, 55 years old, is married and has four children, two still attending school and needing allowances. Robinson is involved in the transport business and he also farms. His wife sells grocery items in their store.

Robinson wants to improve the family's income so he is now asking for additional capital of PHP 50,000 to invest in their businesses. He will buy canned goods and soft drinks and carry out maintenance of the jeepney. Someday, he hopes to achieve financial stability for his family's overall welfare.

loans.use: to buy canned goods and soft drinks and to maintain the jeepney.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine has a banana farm in Calamba, Misamis Occidental. This is her primary source of income for her family.

Josephine makes it a point to prepare her land properly to have the maximum yield and a good income. Recently, she took a loan from Paglaum PMC to pay for the irrigation costs of her land. 

Josephine wishes to sustain her business and be able to supply bananas in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to pay to irrigate her land.

loans.name: Florentina

texts.es:
Florentina, de 47 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, no sabe leer ni escribir, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos, todos son mayores de edad y solamente dos viven con ella, pero trabajan.

Florentina, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a la agricultura, específicamente siembra granos básicos como maíz y frijol, de esta forma cosecha los alimentos para el resto del verano y una parte de sus cosechas las vende, de esta forma a sacado adelante a su familia.

El financiamiento del préstamo lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas para sembrar frijoles y pagar la mano de obra, este préstamo le será de mucho beneficio porque cosechará y obtendrá ingresos económicos.
 
Florentina, desea remodelar su casa, también desea poder hacer grandes siembras de maíz y frijol, para poder así seguir teniendo más ingresos económicos y tener una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Florentina, 47 years old, had no opportunity to study; she cannot read or write. She is a single mother and has four children, all adults; only two live with her, but they work. Florentina works in household chores and in farming; she plants specifically basic grains such as corn and beans. This way, she grows the food for the rest of the summer and sells part of her crops; she has thus gotten her family ahead.

She needs the loan funding to buy agricultural inputs for planting beans and paying the workforce. This loan will be very beneficial to her because she will harvest and earn income.

Florentina wants to remodel her house. She also wants to be able to do large plantings of corn and beans to therefore be able to continue having more income and have a better life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs to plant beans and pay the workforce.

loans.name: Gladys Amparo

texts.es: Gladys es una estilista profesional con una amplia trayectoria que se realizó como empresaria independiente en el año 2014, adecuó un espacio en las instalaciones de su vivienda para el óptimo funcionamiento de su sala de belleza en donde tiene la oportunidad de ejercer la profesión que deseaba desde su casa y compartir con su familia. En sus inicios laboró en varias peluquerías de la ciudad y posteriormente ofrecía sus servicios a domicilio, sin embargo con sus ahorros consideró que sería mejor ubicarse en un lugar estable y que sus clientes pudieran conseguirla todos los días de la semana a partir de las 10 a.m. en horario extendido. Los servicios que ofrece en su salón son corte de cabello, cepillado, tintes, desrizado, iluminaciones, limpiezas faciales entre otros tratamientos que estén a la vanguardia. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en insumos de peluquería y adecuaciones al cielo raso  y pintura del local. Esta inversión es muy significativa para mejorar el servicio puesto que el cliente tendrá la oportunidad de estar en un lugar mejor acondicionado  y escoger tratamientos de acuerdo a sus necesidades.  Gladis desea a largo plazo climatizar su negocio y así poder tener más capacidad y agilidad en el servicio.  Su meta es continuar trabajando para ayudar en la educación de sus nietos los cuales viven con ella.
texts.en:
Gladys is a professional stylist with so much success that she became an independent operator in 2015. She modified a space in her home for a beauty salon in order to exercise her profession from her home and share with her family. In the beginning she worked in various salons in the city and then offered her services in homes. With the savings she decided it would be better to locate herself in a stable location and her clients could access her every day from 10 AM onward. She offers hair cuts, hair arrangements, coloring, straightening, highlights, facials and other treatments that are popular.

Today she seeks her first Kiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo to buy hair salon supplies and improvements to the ceiling and paint of the salon. This investment is very significant to improve service so that her customers have a well-appointed place and can choose treatments according to their needs. Gladis wishes in the long term to air-condition her business and in this way have greater capacity and flexibility in her services. Her goal is to continue working to help pay for the education of her grandchildren who live with her.

loans.use: to buy hair salon supplies and improvements to the ceiling and paint of the salon.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora has been operating her convenience store for quite some time. She started her business with initial capital of PHP 500 that she saved from her husband's wages. She rolled up her business proceeds and she now has her own store constructed just outside her house.

Leonora is making good sales knowing there are only a few stores located in her area. She has attended the financial literacy training offered by Paglaum MPC and learned that you have to stock the store with sufficient supplies based on the demands of your immediate market. Leonora is asking for a loan to purchase canned goods, noodles, soy sauce, oil and vinegar. Having this inventory would mean good sales for her.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, noodles, soy sauce, oil and vinegar

loans.name: Jihothon

texts.ru: Чихотхон проживает в районе Хуросон. Он вместе отцом и матерью проживает в районе. Чихотхон молодой парень, но он шустрый, активный, самостоятельный парень. У него имеет собственный бизнес. Чихотхон дома занимается купле продажей мелко рогатого скота около 3 лет. Он покупает скота и откармливает несколько месяцев, потом перепродает их на скотном рынке. Ему в этом бизнесе нравиться то, что он может сам контролировать свой бизнес. Еще Чихотхон свободное время занимается таксистом. Он больше старается, чтобы помочь отцу обеспечить семью. Но его машина сейчас находится в мастерской. Для ремонта ему нужно купить автозапчасти и оплатить за услуги мастера. Чихотхон решил взять кредит и восстановить автомашину. Он будет рад на Вашу помощь.
texts.en:
Jihothon lives in the Khuroson district of Tajikistan with his father and mother.  He is a very young man still, but he is intelligent, dynamic and independent.  He already has his own business, which he started about three years ago. He buys and sells small livestock; he purchases a few animals, fattens them for a few months, and then resells them at the cattle market.  He likes this field of work because it gives him the ability to control his own business.

In his spare time, and in order to help his father support the family, Jihothon also works as a taxi driver.  However, at the moment, his car is at the repair shop.  In order to fix his car, Jihothon needs to buy spare parts and pay for the mechanic's work. Jihothon has decided to take a loan to have his car repaired. He will be very happy to receive your support.

loans.use: to buy some spare-parts and to have his car repaired.

loans.name: Morena Guadalupe

texts.es: Morena es una mujer trabajadora que cuenta con 35 años de vida, y desde hace 5 años cuenta con su negocio de venta de productos básicos en su vivienda, en donde vende productos tales como: maíz, frijol, azúcar, saches de champú, huevos, leche, pan dulce, café, etc. Ella habita en vivienda propia desde hace 12 años al lado de su esposo y sus 2 hijos una niña de 3 años y un varón de 7 años de edad. Morena desea que su negocio le brinde mayores ganancias, y es por ello que desea invertir en ropa y juguetes de platico para surtir su negocio, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pantalones, faldas, blusas, camisetas, entre otros productos para continuar mejorando su negocio, ya que con el crédito anterior ella invirtió en su negocio.
texts.en: Morena is a hard-working woman of 35 years, and for the last five years, she has run a business out of her home that sells basic products. She sells goods such as corn, beans, sugar, packets of shampoo, eggs, milk, sweet bread, coffee, etc. She has lived in her own home for 12 years, alongside her husband and two children: a 3-year-old girl, and a 7-year-old boy. Morena wants her business to bring in higher profits, and it's for this reason she wants to invest in clothing and plastic toys to supply it. She is requesting a loan through FUSAI to invest in pants, skirts, blouses, and T-shirts, among other products, to continue improving her business now that her last loan has been used to do the same.

loans.use: to invest in pants, skirts, blouses, and T-shirts, among other products, to continue improving her business.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine has been a member of Paglaum MPC for more than ten years and has maintained her credit history of no defaults payments. She is known in Tabon, Jose Dalman, Zamboanga del Norte for her mouth-watering snacks that she delivers to various stores and school canteens.

Josephine is glad that her business is financed by the cooperative and that she received training in improving her products. She is receiving bulk orders and wants to have enough inventory of ingredients. Josephine has asked for a loan to purchase ingredients such as flour, sugar, cooking oil, butter, cheese, baking soda and others, for her snack vending business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as flour, sugar, cooking oil, butter, cheese, baking soda and others, for her snack vending business

location.town: Sindangan - Tabon, Jose Dalman, Zamboanga del Nort

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is married to a rice farmer in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She and her husband cultivate their own rice paddy, which yields good harvests in turn for their hard work.

When Lucia learned about Kiva's field partner Paglaum MPC and the financial assistance extended to rice growers like her, she signed up for membership. She has applied recently for a PHP 14,900 loan to buy fertilizer and insecticides for her paddy.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticides for her rice paddy.

loans.name: Abel

texts.en:
Abel is a first-year student at Kepler. He grew up with his six siblings on a farm in southern Rwanda. After a rigorous application process based on grades, test scores, and personal interviews, he was accepted from over 6,000 applicants this year. Abel chose Kepler because it will give him the abilities to work independently as well as in groups.

Abel plans to major in Communications with a Concentration in Business, and will graduate from Kepler with a BA from an accredited US university. After graduating, he hopes work in the private sector, while helping his family and community.

loans.use: To pay for a laptop required for a US college degree

loans.name: Sambou's Group

texts.en: Sambou’s group live in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. Sambou makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Choeurt's Group

texts.en: Choeurt’s group live in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. Choeurt makes a living cultivating rice to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is a 26-year-old single woman who started working in a veterinary clinic three years ago to cover her needs and expenses. She is an independent woman who works hard to satisfy her needs without anyone's help.

Due to her limited salary, Sarah is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to prepare for her wedding day to make it the very special day as she always dreamed. She is very excited for this day for she will finally be with her man.

loans.use: to prepare for her wedding day to make it the very special day as she always dreamed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and cultivate the land.

loans.name: Charlita

texts.en: Charlita is 55 years old, married and lives in Gusa, Calatunan, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She is a hog grower who is financed by Paglaum MPC. Currently, she avails herself of a loan to buy additional heads of piglets & bags of animal feed.

loans.use: to buy additional heads of piglets & bags of animal feed.

loans.name: Farida

texts.en: Farida is a careful mother. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1977. She is married and has four children. She is living in a small town with her family. Her husband is an entrepreneur. She is an honest, active and funny tailor. She likes her activity and wants to teach students - girls. She is a gentle and attentive mother who supports and takes care of her children. She is a good housekeeper and wife. Her second child is going to enter university. She is willing to educate all her children at higher degree institutions. She is asking for a loan to pay her child’s tuition fees. The KIVA loan will help her to educate her child. She awaits your kindness and support.

loans.use: to educate her child.

loans.name: Noralyn

texts.en: Noralyn is 43 years old and married with school age kids. She is from R. J. Macias, Sindagan, Zamboanga del Norte. She operates a hog fattening business that contributes to her monthly income. This business venture sufficiently supports the needs of the family. Currently, she avails herself of a loan to purchase bags of animal feed for her hog fattening business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feed for her hog fattening business.

location.town: Sindangan-R.J. Macias, Sindangan, Zamboanga del No

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn wants to prepare for the next cropping season. She wants to prepare well, especially for the much needed land and seedbed preparations. 

She wants to have enough supply of corn fertilizer, and as such, she has applied for a loan from the PMP Cooperative. She hopes to save enough for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy corn fertilizer.

loans.name: Rizza Mae

texts.en: Rizza Mae is a hog grower from Gusa, Calatunan, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She is 33 years old, married and an active member of Paglaum MPC. Currently, she is taking out a loan to purchase bags of animal feed and vitamins.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Protus

texts.en:
Protus is a Kiva borrower. He describes himself as reliable. He operates a motorcycle transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. His primary customers are locals.

He describes his biggest business challenge as breakdowns of his motorcycle. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to repair his motorcycle.

Protus' business goal is to own 3 motorcycles within 5 years. He hopes that, in the future, he will live a comfortable life. He will use the anticipated profits to educate his children.

loans.use: to repair his motorcycle.

loans.name: Narek

texts.en:
Narek is farmer living in Gandzaqar village of Tavush region. He lives with his father and brother and together with them is involved in farming. Their farm currently includes 6 piglets and 25 hens. They also cultivate beans, corn and potato and sell the gathered harvest in nearby markets. Agriculture is very important source of income for Narek and his family, and that's the reason they work hard to develop it. Narek asks this loan to purchase a sow and forage for feeding the livestock.

Narek has taken a loan from a financial institution before, but because of the family's poor conditions at that time, he wasn't able to pay it back. However, over these years of tireless work, Narek was able to develop his farm, which is profitable enough to cover monthly payments.
Narek has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The second-chance loan program provides loans to people who have bad credit history behind them and have no access to credit products. Let's help this hard-working family to prove that everybody can overcome life’s difficulties through hard and devoted work.

loans.use: to pay for a sow and forage for feeding his livestock.

loans.name: Lawrence`

texts.en:
Lawrence` is married and has 4 children. He describes himself to be disciplined. For the past 7 years, Lawrence` has operated a retail business selling drinking water, soda and snacks. His primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient capital.

Lawrence` will use the KES 25,000 loan to buy more stock of drinking water, soft drinks and other snacks. His business goal is to have a wholesale business within 5 years. This is Lawrence`s fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. His previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of drinking water, soft drinks and other snacks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Labiba

texts.en:
Labiba is a 46-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband and five school-aged children. Due to bad financial conditions, she and her husband cooperate together to fulfill their family needs and be able to live in a good way.

Labiba decided to start her own job. She opened a shop in 2010 where she offers a great variety of used shoes at good prices. Today, she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase a new collection of shoes so that she can improve her business operations. In this way she will be able to increase her sales and therefore her revenues.

loans.use: to purchase a new collection of shoes

loans.name: Miriam Esther

texts.es: Miriam de 60 años es una empresaria independiente que deleita a centenares de clientes residenciados en el municipio de Barranquilla con sus deliciosas comidas típicas; hayacas y pasteles, así mismo elabora postres de frutas y no obstante aprovecha el gran número de clientes que conoce para comercializarles mercancías varias. Esta polifacética ama de casa, cuenta con cinco años en esta actividad, la cual inició por iniciativa de sus hijos quienes la apoyaron en su proyecto de negocio y que hoy en día es su principal medio de sustento al haber enviudado.  Sus principales clientes son amigos, vecinos y referidos a quienes les ofrece sus comidas y productos por encargos, los cuales cancelan de inmediato o con facilidad de pago.  En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá  en la compra de prendas de vestir; blusas, jeans, suéteres y vestidos, ella planea viajar a Medellín la capital de la moda en Colombia, en donde encontrará nuevas colecciones de ropa a precios de oportunidad y excelente calidad.  Esta inversión será un éxito puesto que nos acercamos a las festividades de amor y amistad, una temporada en la que el comercio de ropa se activa y su meta a futuro es continuar ampliando su base de clientes para  tener los recursos para educar a su última hija profesionalmente.
texts.en:
60-year-old Miriam is an independent businesswoman who delights hundreds of people living in the municipality of Barranquilla with her delicious traditional dishes, such as tamales and cakes. She also makes fruit desserts and makes the most of the large number of clients she knows by selling them different merchandise as well. This multifaceted housewife has been doing this work for five years. It was her children’s idea and they helped her with her business plan.
